h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ tikanipātassa ^a^V2.0071^ea^ ^a^M2.0069^ea^ ^a^P2.0167^ea^ paṭhame ^b^bhayānī^eb^tiādīsu ^b^bhaya^eb^nti cittutrāso. ^b^upaddavo^eb^ti anekaggatākāro. ^b^upasaggo^eb^ti upasaṭṭhākāro tattha tattha lagganākāro.

[03] tesaṃ evaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ -- pabbatavisamanissitā corā janapadavāsīnaṃ pesenti -- ``mayaṃ asukadivase nāma tumhākaṃ gāmaṃ paharissāmā''ti. te taṃ pavattiṃ sutakālato paṭṭhāya bhayaṃ ^a^V2.0072^ea^ santāsaṃ āpajjanti. ayaṃ ^b^cittutrāso^eb^ nāma. ``yathā no te corā kupitā anatthampi āvaheyyu''nti hatthasāraṃ gahetvā dvipadacatuppadehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha tattha bhūmiyaṃ nipajjanti ḍaṃsamakasādīhi khajjamānā, gumbantarāni pavisantā khāṇukaṇṭake maddanti. tesaṃ evaṃ vicarantānaṃ vikkhittabhāvo ^b^anekaggatākāro^eb^ nāma. tato coresu yathāvutte divase anāgacchantesu ``tucchakasāsanaṃ bhavissati, gāmaṃ pavisissāmā''ti saparikkhārā gāmaṃ pavisanti. atha tesaṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gāmaṃ parivāretvā dvāre aggiṃ datvā manusse ghātetvā corā sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ vilumpitvā gacchanti. tesu ghātitāvasesā aggiṃ nibbāpetvā koṭṭhakacchāyābhitticchāyādīsu tattha tattha laggitvā nisīdanti naṭṭhaṃ anusocamānā. ayaṃ ^b^upasaṭṭhākāro lagganākāro^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^naḷāgārā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0168^ea^ naḷehi channapaṭicchannāgārā. sesasambhārā panettha rukkhamayā honti. ^b^tiṇāgāre^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^kūṭāgārānī^eb^ti kūṭasaṅgahitāni agārāni. ^b^ullittāvalittānī^eb^ti anto ca bahi ca littāni. ^b^nivātānī^eb^ti nivāritavātappavesāni. ^b^phusitaggaḷānī^eb^ti chekehi vaḍḍhakīhi katattā ^a^M2.0070^ea^ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭamhi suṭṭhu phusitakavāṭāni. ^b^pihitavātapānānī^eb^ti yuttavātapānāni. iminā padadvayena kavāṭavātapānānaṃ niccapihitataṃ akathetvā sampattiyeva kathitā. icchiticchitakkhaṇe pana tāni pidhīyanti ca vivarīyanti ca.

[03] ^b^bālato uppajjantī^eb^ti bālameva nissāya uppajjanti. bālo hi apaṇḍitapuriso rajjaṃ vā oparajjaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento katipaye attanā sadise vidhavaputte mahādhutte gahetvā ``etha ahaṃ tumhe issare karissāmī''ti pabbatagahanādīni nissāya antamante gāme paharanto dāmarikabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā anupubbena nigamepi janapadepi paharati. manussā gehāni chaḍḍetvā khemaṭṭhānaṃ patthayamānā pakkamanti. te nissāya vasantā bhikkhūpi bhikkhuniyopi attano attano vasanaṭṭhānāni pahāya pakkamanti. gatagataṭṭhāne bhikkhāpi senāsanampi dullabhaṃ hoti. evaṃ catunnampi parisānaṃ bhayaṃ āgatameva hoti. pabbajjitesupi dve bālā bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ paṭṭhapetvā codanaṃ ārabhanti. iti kosambivāsikānaṃ viya mahākalaho uppajjati. catunnaṃ parisānaṃ bhayaṃ āgatameva hotīti evaṃ yāni kānici bhayāni ^a^P2.0169^ea^ uppajjanti, sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjantīti yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V2.0073^ea^ kāyadvārādipavattaṃ kammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ sañjānanakāraṇaṃ assāti ^b^kammalakkhaṇo. apadānasobhanī paññā^eb^ti yā paññā nāma apadānena sobhati, bālā ca paṇḍitā ca attano attano cariteneva pākaṭā hontīti attho. bālena hi gatamaggo rukkhagacchagāmanigamādīni jhāpetvā gacchantassa indaggino gatamaggo viya hoti, jhāmaṭṭhānamattameva aṅgāramasichārikāsamākulaṃ paññāyati. paṇḍitena gatamaggo kusobbhādayo pūretvā vividhasassasampadaṃ āvahamānena catudīpikameghena gatamaggo viya hoti. yathā tena gatamagge udakapūrāni ceva vividhasassaphalāphalāni ca tāni tāni ṭhānāni paññāyanti, evaṃ paṇḍitena gatamagge sampattiyova paññāyanti no vipattiyoti. sesamettha uttānatthameva.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M2.0071^ea^ ^b^bālalakkhaṇānī^eb^ti ``bālo aya''nti etehi lakkhīyati ñāyatīti bālalakkhaṇāni. tānevassa sañjānanakāraṇānīti ^b^bālanimittāni. bālāpadānānī^eb^ti bālassa apadānāni. ^b^duccintitacintī^eb^ti cintayanto abhijjhābyāpādamicchādassanavasena duccintitameva cinteti. ^b^dubbhāsitabhāsī^eb^ti bhāsamānopi musāvādādibhedaṃ dubbhāsitameva bhāsati. ^b^dukkaṭakammakārī^eb^ti karontopi pāṇātipātādivasena dukkaṭakammameva karoti. ^b^paṇḍitalakkhaṇānī^eb^tiādi vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^sucintitacintī^eb^tiādīni cettha manosucaritādīnaṃ vasena yojetabbāni.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^P2.0170^ea^ ^b^accayaṃ accayato na passatī^eb^ti attano aparādhaṃ aparādhato na passati. ^b^accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ nappaṭikarotī^eb^ti ``aparaddhaṃ mayā''ti ñatvāpi yo dhammo, taṃ na karoti, daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā accayaṃ na deseti nakkhamāpeti. ^b^accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhātī^eb^ti parassa ``viraddhaṃ mayā''ti ñatvā daṇḍakammaṃ āharitvā khamāpentassa nakkhamati. sukkapakkho vuttapaṭipakkhato veditabbo.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V2.0074^ea^ ^b^ayoniso pañhaṃ kattā hotī^eb^ti ``kati nu kho, udāyi, anussatiṭṭhānānī''ti vutte ``pubbenivāso anussatiṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī''ti cintetvā lāḷudāyitthero viya anupāyacintāya apañhameva pañhanti kattā hoti. ^b^ayoniso pañhaṃ vissajjetā hotī^eb^ti evaṃ cintitaṃ pana pañhaṃ vissajjentopi ``idha, bhante, bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati. seyyathidaṃ, ekampi jāti''ntiādinā nayena soyeva thero viya ayoniso vissajjetā hoti, apañhameva pañhanti katheti. ^b^parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehī^eb^ti ettha padameva atthassa byañjanato padabyañjanaṃ. taṃ akkharapāripūriṃ katvā dasavidhaṃ byañjanabuddhiṃ aparihāpetvā ^a^M2.0072^ea^ vuttaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nāma hoti, evarūpehi padabyañjanehīti attho. ^b^siliṭṭhehī^eb^ti padasiliṭṭhatāya siliṭṭhehi. ^b^upagatehī^eb^ti atthañca kāraṇañca upagatehi. ^b^nābbhanumoditā^eb^ti evaṃ yoniso sabbaṃ kāraṇasampannaṃ katvāpi vissajjitaṃ parassa pañhaṃ nābhinumodati nābhinandati sāriputtattherassa pañhaṃ lāḷudāyitthero viya. yathāha --

[02] ``aṭṭhānaṃ kho etaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, anavakāso, yaṃ so atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ aññataraṃ ^a^P2.0171^ea^ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapanno saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpajjeyyāpi vuṭṭhaheyyāpi, natthetaṃ ṭhāna''nti (a0 ni0 5.166).

[03] ^b^yoniso pañhaṃ kattā^eb^tiādīsu ānandatthero viya yonisova pañhaṃ cintetvā yoniso vissajjitā hoti. thero hi ``kati nu kho, ānanda, anussatiṭṭhānānī''ti pucchito ``ayaṃ pañho bhavissatī''ti yoniso cintetvā yoniso vissajjento āha -- ``idha, bhante, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. idaṃ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃbhāvitaṃ evaṃbahulīkataṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattatī''ti. ^b^abbhanumoditā hotī^eb^ti tathāgato viya yoniso abbhanumoditā hoti. tathāgato hi ānandattherena pañhe vissajjite ``sādhu sādhu, ānanda, tena hi tvaṃ, ānanda, imampi chaṭṭhaṃ anussatiṭṭhānaṃ dhārehi. idhānanda, bhikkhu satova abhikkamati satova paṭikkamatī''tiādimāha. chaṭṭhādīni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V2.0075^ea^ sukkapakkho pubbabhāge dasahipi kusalakammapathehi paricchinno, upari yāva arahattamaggā labbhati. ^b^bahuñca puññaṃ pasavatī^eb^ti ettha lokiyalokuttaramissakapuññaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ dasame dussīlabhāvo dussīlyaṃ, dussīlyameva malaṃ ^b^dussīlyamalaṃ^eb^. kenaṭṭhena malanti? anudahanaṭṭhena duggandhaṭṭhena kiliṭṭhakaraṇaṭṭhena ca. tañhi nirayādīsu apāyesu anudahatīti anudahanaṭṭhenapi malaṃ. tena samannāgato ^a^M2.0073^ea^ puggalo mātāpitūnampi santike bhikkhusaṅghassāpi antare bodhicetiyaṭṭhānesupi jigucchanīyo hoti, sabbadisāsu cassa ``evarūpaṃ kira tena pāpakammaṃ kata''nti avaṇṇagandho vāyatīti duggandhaṭṭhenapi malaṃ. tena ca samannāgato puggalo gatagataṭṭhāne upatāpañceva labhati, kāyakammādīni cassa asucīni honti apabhassarānīti ^a^P2.0172^ea^ kiliṭṭhakaraṇaṭṭhenapi malaṃ. apica taṃ devamanussasampattiyo ceva nibbānasampattiñca milāpetīti milāpanaṭṭhenapi malanti veditabbaṃ. issāmalamaccheramalesupi eseva nayo.
[06] bālavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0076^ea^ paṭhame ^b^ñāto^eb^ti paññāto pākaṭo. ^b^ananulomike^eb^ti sāsanassa na anulometīti ananulomikaṃ, tasmiṃ ananulomike. ^b^kāyakamme^eb^ti pāṇātipātādimhi kāyaduccarite. oḷārikaṃ vā etaṃ, na evarūpe samādapetuṃ sakkoti. disā namassituṃ vaṭṭati, bhūtabaliṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti evarūpe samādapeti gaṇhāpeti. ^b^vacīkamme^eb^pi musāvādādīni oḷārikāni, attano santakaṃ parassa adātukāmena ``natthī''ti ayaṃ vañcanamusāvādo nāma vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti evarūpe samādapeti. ^b^manokamme^eb^pi abhijjhādayo oḷārikā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ visaṃvādetvā kathento pana ananulomikesu dhammesu samādapeti nāma dakkhiṇavihāravāsitthero viya. taṃ kira theraṃ eko upaṭṭhāko amaccaputto upasaṅkamitvā ``mettāyantena paṭhamaṃ kīdise puggale mettāyitabba''nti pucchi. thero sabhāgavisabhāgaṃ anācikkhitvā ``piyapuggale''ti āha. tassa ca bhariyā piyā hoti manāpā, so taṃ ārabbha mettāyanto ummādaṃ pāpuṇi. kathaṃ panesa bahujanāhitāya paṭipanno hotīti? evarūpassa hi saddhivihārikādayo ceva upaṭṭhākādayo ca tesaṃ ārakkhadevatā ādiṃ katvā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ mittabhūtā yāva brahmalokā ^a^M2.0074^ea^ sesadevatā ca ``ayaṃ bhikkhu na ajānitvā karissatī''ti ^a^P2.0173^ea^ tena katameva karonti, evamesa bahujanāhitāya paṭipanno hoti.

[03] sukkapakkhe pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādīnaṃyeva vasena ^b^kāyakammavacīkammāni^eb^ veditabbāni. kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana avisaṃvādetvā kathento anulomikesu dhammesu samādapeti nāma koḷitavihāravāsī catunikāyikatissatthero viya. tassa kira jeṭṭhabhātā nandābhayatthero nāma potaliyavihāre vasanto ekasmiṃ roge samuṭṭhite kaniṭṭhaṃ pakkosāpetvā āha -- ``āvuso, mayhaṃ sallahukaṃ katvā ekaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathehī''ti. kiṃ, bhante, aññena kammaṭṭhānena, kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti? kimatthiko esa, āvusoti? bhante, kabaḷīkārāhāro upādārūpaṃ, ekasmiñca upādārūpe diṭṭhe tevīsati upādārūpāni pākaṭāni hontīti ^a^V2.0077^ea^. so ``vaṭṭissati, āvuso, ettaka''nti taṃ uyyojetvā kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhitvā upādārūpaṃ sallakkhetvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. atha naṃ theraṃ bahivihārā anikkhantameva pakkositvā, ``āvuso, mahāavassayosi mayhaṃ jāto''ti kaniṭṭhattherassa attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocesi. ^b^bahujanahitāyā^eb^ti etassapi hi saddhivihārikādayo ``ayaṃ na ajānitvā karissatī''ti tena katameva karontīti bahujanahitāya paṭipanno nāma hotīti.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^khattiyassā^eb^ti jātiyā khattiyassa. ^b^muddhāvasittassā^eb^ti rājābhisekena muddhani abhisittassa. ^b^sāraṇīyāni bhavantī^eb^ti saritabbāni asammussanīyāni honti. ^b^jāto^eb^ti ^a^P2.0174^ea^ nibbatto. ^b^yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīya^eb^nti daharakāle jānitumpi na sakkā, aparabhāge pana mātāpituādīhi ñātakehi vā dāsādīhi vā ``tvaṃ asukajanapade asukanagare asukadivase asukanakkhatte jāto''ti ācikkhite sutvā tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ sarati na sammussati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ hotī''ti.

[03] ^b^idaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0075^ea^, ^b^bhikkhave, dutiya^eb^nti abhisekaṭṭhānaṃ nāma rañño balavatuṭṭhikaraṃ hoti, tenassa taṃ yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ. saṅgāmavijayaṭṭhānepi eseva nayo. ettha pana ^b^saṅgāma^eb^nti yuddhaṃ. ^b^abhivijinitvā^eb^ti jinitvā sattumaddanaṃ katvā. ^b^tameva saṅgāmasīsa^eb^nti tameva saṅgāmaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^ajjhāvasatī^eb^ti abhibhavitvā āvasati.

[03] idāni yasmā sammāsambuddhassa rañño jātiṭṭhānādīhi kattabbakiccaṃ natthi, imasmiṃ pana sāsane tappaṭibhāge tayo puggale dassetuṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ ābhataṃ, tasmā te dassento ^b^evameva kho, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hotī^eb^ti ettha catupārisuddhisīlampi pabbajjānissitamevāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^sāraṇīyaṃ hotī^eb^ti ``ahaṃ asukaraṭṭhe asukajanapade asukavihāre asukamāḷake asukadivāṭṭhāne asukacaṅkame asukarukkhamūle pabbajito''ti evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ saritabbameva hoti na sammussitabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^idaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0078^ea^ ^b^dukkha^eb^nti ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito uddhaṃ dukkhaṃ atthi. ^b^ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo^eb^ti ettako dukkhasamudayo, na ito uddhaṃ dukkhasamudayo atthīti. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. evamettha catūhi saccehi sotāpattimaggo kathito. kasiṇaparikammavipassanāñāṇāni pana maggasannissitāneva honti. ^b^sāraṇīyaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0175^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti ``ahaṃ asukaraṭṭhe...pe0... asukarukkhamūle sotāpanno jāto''ti yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ hoti asammussanīyaṃ.

[03] ^b^āsavānaṃ khayā^eb^ti āsavānaṃ khayena. ^b^cetovimutti^eb^nti phalasamādhiṃ. ^b^paññāvimutti^eb^nti phalapaññaṃ. ^b^sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā^eb^ti attanāva abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā. ^b^upasampajja viharatī^eb^ti paṭilabhitvā viharati. ^b^sāraṇīya^eb^nti ``mayā asukaraṭṭhe...pe0... asukarukkhamūle arahattaṃ patta''nti attano arahattapattiṭṭhānaṃ nāma yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ hoti asammussanīyanti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^santo^eb^ti atthi upalabbhanti. ^b^saṃvijjamānā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^lokasmi^eb^nti sattaloke. ^b^nirāso^eb^ti anāso apatthano. ^b^āsaṃso^eb^ti ^a^M2.0076^ea^ āsaṃsamāno patthayamāno. ^b^vigatāso^eb^ti apagatāso. ^b^caṇḍālakule^eb^ti caṇḍālānaṃ kule. ^b^venakule^eb^ti vilīvakārakule. ^b^nesādakule^eb^ti migaluddakānaṃ kule. ^b^rathakārakule^eb^ti cammakārakule. ^b^pukkusakule^eb^ti pupphacchaḍḍakakule.

[03] ettāvatā kulavipattiṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā nīcakule jātopi ekacco aḍḍho hoti mahaddhano, ayaṃ pana na tādiso, tasmāssa bhogavipattiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^dalidde^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^dalidde^eb^ti dāliddiyena samannāgate. ^b^appannapānabhojane^eb^ti parittakānnapānabhojane. ^b^kasiravuttike^eb^ti ^a^P2.0176^ea^ dukkhajīvike, yattha vāyāmena payogena jīvitavuttiṃ sādhenti, tathārūpeti attho. ^b^yattha kasirena ghāsacchādo labbhatī^eb^ti yasmiṃ kule dukkhena yāgubhattaghāso ca kopīnamattaṃ acchādanañca labbhati.

[03] idāni yasmā ekacco nīcakule jātopi upadhisampanno hoti attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ ṭhito ^a^V2.0079^ea^, ayañca na tādiso, tasmāssa sarīravipattimpi dassetuṃ ^b^so ca hoti dubbaṇṇo^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^dubbaṇṇo^eb^ti paṃsupisācako viya jhāmakhāṇuvaṇṇo. ^b^duddasiko^eb^ti vijātamātuyāpi amanāpadassano. ^b^okoṭimako^eb^ti lakuṇḍako. ^b^kāṇo^eb^ti ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo vā. ^b^kuṇī^eb^ti ekahatthakuṇī vā ubhayahatthakuṇī vā. ^b^khañjo^eb^ti ekapādakhañjo vā ubhayapādakhañjo vā. ^b^pakkhahato^eb^ti hatapakkho pīṭhasappī. ^b^padīpeyyassā^eb^ti vaṭṭitelakapallakādino padīpaupakaraṇassa. ^b^tassa na evaṃ hotī^eb^ti. kasmā na hoti? nīcakule jātattā.

[03] ^b^jeṭṭho^eb^ti aññasmiṃ jeṭṭhe sati kaniṭṭho āsaṃ na karoti, tasmā jeṭṭhoti āha. ^b^ābhiseko^eb^ti jeṭṭhopi na abhisekāraho āsaṃ na karoti, tasmā ābhisekoti āha. ^b^anabhisitto^eb^ti abhisekārahopi kāṇakuṇiādidosarahito sakiṃ abhisitto puna abhiseke āsaṃ na karoti, tasmā anabhisittoti āha ^a^M2.0077^ea^. ^b^acalappatto^eb^ti jeṭṭhopi ābhiseko anabhisitto mando uttānaseyyako, sopi abhiseke āsaṃ na karoti. soḷasavassuddesiko pana paññāyamānamassubhedo acalappatto nāma ^a^P2.0177^ea^ hoti, mahantampi rajjaṃ vicāretuṃ samattho, tasmā ``acalappatto''ti āha. ^b^tassa evaṃ hotī^eb^ti kasmā hoti? mahājātitāya.

[03] ^b^dussīlo^eb^ti nissīlo. ^b^pāpadhammo^eb^ti lāmakadhammo. ^b^asucī^eb^ti asucīhi kāyakammādīhi samannāgato. ^b^saṅkassarasamācāro^eb^ti saṅkāhi saritabbasamācāro, kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā ``idaṃ iminā kataṃ bhavissatī''ti evaṃ paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyasamācāro, attanāyeva vā saṅkāhi saritabbasamācāro, sāsaṅkasamācāroti attho. tassa hi divāṭṭhānādīsu sannipatitvā kiñcideva mantayante bhikkhū disvā ``ime ekato hutvā mantenti, kacci nu kho mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī''ti evaṃ sāsaṅkasamācāro hoti. ^b^paṭicchannakammanto^eb^ti paṭicchādetabbayuttakena pāpakammena samannāgato. ^b^assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño^eb^ti assamaṇo hutvāva samaṇapatirūpakatāya ``samaṇo aha''nti evaṃ paṭiñño. ^b^abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño^eb^ti aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute sumbhakapattadhare gāmanigamarājadhānīsu piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā sayampi tādisena ākārena tathā paṭipajjanato ``ahaṃ brahmacārī''ti paṭiññaṃ dento viya hoti. ``ahaṃ bhikkhū''ti vatvā uposathaggādīni pavisanto pana brahmacāripaṭiñño hotiyeva, tathā saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ gaṇhanto. ^b^antopūtī^eb^ti pūtinā kammena anto ^a^V2.0080^ea^ anupaviṭṭho. ^b^avassuto^eb^ti rāgādīhi tinto. ^b^kasambujāto^eb^ti sañjātarāgādikacavaro. ^b^tassa na evaṃ hotī^eb^ti. kasmā na hoti? lokuttaradhammaupanissayassa natthitāya. ^b^tassa^eb^ ^a^P2.0178^ea^ ^b^evaṃ hotī^eb^ti. kasmā hoti? mahāsīlasmiṃ paripūrakāritāya.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ catutthe catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ rañjetīti ^b^rājā^eb^. cakkaṃ vattetīti ^b^cakkavattī^eb^. vattitaṃ vā anena cakkanti cakkavattī. dhammo assa ^a^M2.0078^ea^ atthīti ^b^dhammiko^eb^. dhammeneva dasavidhena cakkavattivattena rājā jātoti ^b^dhammarājā. sopi na arājaka^eb^nti sopi aññaṃ nissayarājānaṃ alabhitvā cakkaṃ nāma vattetuṃ na sakkotīti attho. iti satthā desanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā yathānusandhiṃ apāpetvāva tuṇhī ahosi. kasmā? anusandhikusalā uṭṭhahitvā anusandhiṃ pucchissanti, bahū hi imasmiṃ ṭhāne tathārūpā bhikkhū, athāhaṃ tehi puṭṭho desanaṃ vaḍḍhessāmīti. atheko anusandhikusalo bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ pucchanto ^b^ko pana, bhante^eb^tiādimāha. bhagavāpissa byākaronto ^b^dhammo bhikkhū^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhammo. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti tameva vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^nissāyā^eb^ti tadadhiṭṭhānena cetasā tameva nissayaṃ katvā. ^b^dhammaṃ sakkaronto^eb^ti yathā kato so dhammo suṭṭhu kato hoti, evametaṃ karonto. ^b^dhammaṃ garuṃ karonto^eb^ti tasmiṃ gāravuppattiyā taṃ garukaronto. ^b^dhammaṃ apacāyamāno^eb^ti tasseva dhammassa añjalikaraṇādīhi nīcavuttitaṃ karonto. ^b^dhammaddhajo dhammaketū^eb^ti taṃ dhammaṃ dhajamiva purakkhatvā ketumiva ukkhipitvā pavattiyā dhammaddhajo dhammaketu ca hutvāti attho. ^b^dhammādhipateyyo^eb^ti dhammādhipatibhūtāgatabhāvena dhammavaseneva ca sabbakiriyānaṃ karaṇena dhammādhipateyyo hutvā. ^b^dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahatī^eb^ti dhammo assā ^a^P2.0179^ea^ atthīti dhammikā, rakkhā ca āvaraṇañca gutti ca rakkhāvaraṇagutti. tattha ``paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatī''ti vacanato khantiādayo ^b^rakkhā^eb^. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``kathañca, bhikkhave, paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati. khantiyā avihiṃsāya mettacittatāya anuddayāyā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.385). nivāsanapārupanagehādīni ^b^āvaraṇaṃ^eb^. corādiupaddavanivāraṇatthaṃ gopāyanā ^b^gutti^eb^. taṃ sabbampi suṭṭhu vidahati pavatteti ṭhapetīti attho.

[03] idāni ^a^V2.0081^ea^ yattha sā saṃvidahitabbā, taṃ dassento ^b^antojanasmi^eb^ntiādimāha. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- antojanasaṅkhātaṃ puttadāraṃ sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhāpento vatthagandhamālādīni cassa dadamāno sabbopaddave cassa nivārayamāno dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahati nāma. khattiyādīsupi eseva nayo. ayaṃ pana viseso -- abhisittakhattiyā bhadrāssājānīyādiratanasampadānenapi ^a^M2.0079^ea^ upagaṇhitabbā, anuyantā khattiyā tesaṃ anurūpayānavāhanasampadānenapi paritosetabbā, balakāyo kālaṃ anatikkametvā bhattavetanasampadānenapi anuggahetabbo, brāhmaṇā annapānavatthādinā deyyadhammena, gahapatikā bhattabījanaṅgalabalibaddādisampadānena, tathā nigamavāsino ^b^negamā^eb^ janapadavāsino ca ^b^jānapadā^eb^. samitapāpabāhitapāpā pana ^b^samaṇabrāhmaṇā^eb^ samaṇaparikkhārasampadānena sakkātabbā, migapakkhino abhayadānena samassāsetabbā.

[03] ^b^dhammeneva cakkaṃ vattetī^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhammeneva cakkaṃ pavatteti. ^b^taṃ hoti cakkaṃ appaṭivattiya^eb^nti taṃ tena evaṃ pavattitaṃ āṇācakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ hoti. ^b^kenaci^eb^ ^a^P2.0180^ea^ ^b^manussabhūtenā^eb^ti devatā nāma attanā icchiticchitameva karonti, tasmā tā aggaṇhitvā ``manussabhūtenā''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^paccatthikenā^eb^ti paṭiatthikena, paṭisattunāti attho. ^b^dhammiko^eb^ti cakkavattī dasakusalakammapathavasena dhammiko, tathāgato pana navalokuttaradhammavasena. ^b^dhammarājā^eb^ti navahi lokuttaradhammehi mahājanaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā. ^b^dhammaṃyevā^eb^ti navalokuttaradhammameva nissāya tameva sakkaronto taṃ garukaronto taṃ apacāyamāno. sovassa dhammo abbhuggataṭṭhena dhajoti ^b^dhammaddhajo^eb^. sovassa ketūti ^b^dhammaketu^eb^. tameva adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā viharatīti ^b^dhammādhipateyyo. dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇagutti^eb^nti lokiyalokuttaradhammadāyikarakkhañca āvaraṇañca guttiñca. ^b^saṃvidahatī^eb^ti ṭhapeti paññapeti. ^b^evarūpa^eb^nti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ na sevitabbaṃ, sucaritaṃ sevitabbanti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo. ^b^saṃvidahitvā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā kathetvā. ^b^dhammeneva anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattetī^eb^ti navalokuttaradhammeneva asadisaṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavatteti. ^b^taṃ hoti cakkaṃ appaṭivattiya^eb^nti taṃ evaṃ pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ etesu samaṇādīsu ekenapi paṭivattetuṃ paṭibāhituṃ na sakkā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^isipatane^eb^ti buddhapaccekabuddhasaṅkhātānaṃ isīnaṃ dhammacakkappavattanatthāya ceva uposathakaraṇatthāya ^a^V2.0082^ea^ ca āgantvā patane, sannipātaṭṭhāneti attho. padanetipi pāṭho, ayameva attho. ^b^migadāye^eb^ti ^a^M2.0080^ea^ migānaṃ abhayatthāya dinne. ^b^chahi māsehi chārattūnehī^eb^ti so kira raññā āṇattadivaseyeva ^a^P2.0181^ea^ sabbūpakaraṇāni sajjetvā antevāsikehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā gāmadvāragāmamajjhadevakulasusānādīsu ṭhitarukkhe ceva jhāmapatitasukkharukkhe ca vivajjetvā sampannapadese ṭhite sabbadosavivajjite nābhiaranemīnaṃ anurūpe rukkhe gahetvā taṃ cakkaṃ akāsi. tassa rukkhe vicinitvā gaṇhantassa ceva karontassa ca ettako kālo vītivatto. tena vuttaṃ -- ``chahi māsehi chārattūnehī''ti. ^b^nānākaraṇa^eb^nti nānattaṃ. ^b^nesa^eb^nti na esaṃ. ^b^atthesa^eb^nti atthi esaṃ. ^b^abhisaṅkhārassa gatī^eb^ti payogassa gamanaṃ. ^b^ciṅgulāyitvā^eb^ti paribbhamitvā. ^b^akkhāhataṃ maññe^eb^ti akkhe pavesetvā ṭhapitamiva.

[03] ^b^sadosā^eb^ti sagaṇḍā uṇṇatoṇataṭṭhānayuttā. ^b^sakasāvā^eb^ti pūtisārena ceva pheggunā ca yuttā. ^b^kāyavaṅkā^eb^tiādīni kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ nāmāni. ^b^evaṃ papatitā^eb^ti evaṃ guṇapatanena patitā. ^b^evaṃ patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti evaṃ guṇehi patiṭṭhitā. tattha lokiyamahājanā papatitā nāma, sotāpannādayo patiṭṭhitā nāma. tesupi purimā tayo kilesānaṃ samudācārakkhaṇe papatitā nāma, khīṇāsavā pana ekanteneva patiṭṭhitā nāma. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā appahīnakāyavaṅkādayo papatanti, pahīnakāyavaṅkādayo patiṭṭhahanti, tasmā. kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ pana evaṃ pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ -- pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ micchācāro musāvādo pisuṇāvācā micchādiṭṭhīti ime tāva cha sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti, pharusāvācā byāpādoti dve anāgāmimaggena, abhijjhā samphappalāpoti dve arahattamaggenāti.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^apaṇṇakapaṭipada^eb^nti aviraddhapaṭipadaṃ ekaṃsapaṭipadaṃ niyyānikapaṭipadaṃ kāraṇapaṭipadaṃ sārapaṭipadaṃ maṇḍapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ ^a^P2.0182^ea^ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti, na takkaggāhena vā nayaggāhena vā. evaṃ gahetvā paṭipanno hi bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā manussadevanibbānasampattīhi hāyati parihāyati, apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ ^a^M2.0081^ea^ paṭipanno pana tāhi sampattīhi na parihāyati. atīte kantāraddhānamaggaṃ paṭipannesu dvīsu satthavāhesu yakkhassa vacanaṃ gahetvā bālasatthavāho saddhiṃ satthena ^a^V2.0083^ea^ anayabyasanaṃ patto, yakkhassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā ``udakadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne udakaṃ chaḍḍessāmā''ti satthake saññāpetvā maggaṃ paṭipanno paṇḍitasatthavāho viya. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ --
[21] ``apaṇṇakaṃ ṭhānameke, dutiyaṃ āhu takkikā.
[22] etadaññāya medhāvī, taṃ gaṇhe yadapaṇṇaka''nti.. (jā0 1.1.1).

[03] ^b^yoni cassa āraddhā hotī^eb^ti ettha ^b^yonī^eb^ti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi nāmaṃ. ``catasso kho imā, sāriputta, yoniyo''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.152) hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāma. ``yoni hesā bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.226) kāraṇaṃ. ``na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhava''nti (ma0 ni0 2.457; dha0 pa0 396) ca ``tamenaṃ kammajavātā nivattitvā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ samparivattetvā mātu yonimukhe sampaṭipādentī''ti ca ādīsu passāvamaggo. idha pana kāraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^āraddhā^eb^ti paggahitā paripuṇṇā.

[03] ^b^āsavānaṃ khayāyā^eb^ti ettha āsavantīti ^b^āsavā,^eb^ cakkhutopi...pe0... manatopi sandanti pavattantīti vuttaṃ hoti. dhammato yāva gotrabhu, okāsato yāva bhavaggā savantīti ^a^P2.0183^ea^ vā ^b^āsavā,^eb^ ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā pavattantīti attho. antokaraṇattho hi ayaṃ ākāro. cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madirādayo āsavā, āsavā viyātipi ^b^āsavā^eb^. lokasmimpi hi cirapārivāsikā madirādayo āsavāti vuccanti, yadi ca cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena āsavā, eteyeva bhavitumarahanti. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā nāhosī''tiādi (a0 ni0 10.61). āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi ^b^āsavā^eb^. purimāni cettha nibbacanāni yattha kilesā āsavāti āgacchanti, tattha yujjanti, pacchimaṃ kammepi. na kevalañca kammakilesāyeva āsavā, apica kho nānappakārā upaddavāpi. suttesu hi ``nāhaṃ, cunda, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ ^a^M2.0082^ea^ desemī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.182) ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
[21] ``yena ^a^V2.0084^ea^ devūpapatyassa, gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo.
[21] yakkhattaṃ yena gaccheyyaṃ, manussattañca abbaje.
[22] te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā''ti.. (a0 ni0 4.36) --

[25] ettha tebhūmakaṃ ca kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. ``diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā''ti (pārā0 39; a0 ni0 2.202-230) ettha parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā.

[03] te panete āsavā yattha yathā āgatā, tattha tathā veditabbā. ete hi vinaye tāva ``diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā''ti (pārā0 39; a0 ni0 2.202-230) dvedhā āgatā. saḷāyatane ``tayo me, āvuso, āsavā kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavo''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.321) tidhā āgatā. aññesu ca suttantesu (cūḷani0 jatukaṇṇimāṇavapucchāniddeso 69; paṭi0 ma0 1.107) abhidhamme (dha0 sa0 1102-1106; vibha0 937) ca teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saha catudhā āgatā. nibbedhikapariyāyena ``atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā nirayagāminiyā ^a^P2.0184^ea^, atthi āsavā tiracchānayonigāminiyā, atthi āsavā pettivisayagāminiyā, atthi āsavā manussalokagāminiyā, atthi āsavā devalokagāminiyā''ti (a0 ni0 6.63) pañcadhā āgatā. kammameva cettha āsavāti vuttaṃ. chakkanipāte ``atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā saṃvarāpahātabbā''tiādinā (a0 ni0 6.58) nayena chadhā āgatā. sabbāsavapariyāye (ma0 ni0 1.14 ādayo) teyeva dassanena pahātabbehi saddhiṃ sattadhā āgatā. idha pana abhidhammanayena cattāro āsavā adhippetāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^khayāyā^eb^ti ettha pana āsavānaṃ sarasabhedopi khīṇākāropi maggaphalanibbānānipi ``āsavakkhayo''ti vuccati. ``yo āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhāna''nti ettha hi āsavānaṃ sarasabhedo ``āsavakkhayo''ti vutto. ``jānato ahaṃ, bhikkhave, passato ^a^M2.0083^ea^ āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.15; saṃ0 ni0 2.23; itivu0 102) ettha ^a^V2.0085^ea^ āsavappahānaṃ āsavānaṃ accantakkhayo asamuppādo khīṇākāro natthibhāvo ``āsavakkhayo''ti vutto.
[21] ``sekhassa sikkhamānassa, ujumaggānusārino.
[22] khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā''ti.. (itivu0 62) --
[25] ettha maggo ``āsavakkhayo''ti vutto. ``āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.438) ettha phalaṃ.
[21] ``paravajjānupassissa, niccaṃ ujjhānasaññino.
[22] āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā''ti.. (dha0 pa0 253) --
[25] ettha nibbānaṃ. imasmiṃ pana sutte phalaṃ sandhāya ``āsavānaṃ khayāyā''ti āha, arahattaphalatthāyāti attho.

[03] ^b^indriyesu guttadvāro^eb^ti manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu pihitadvāro. ^b^bhojane mattaññū^eb^ti bhojanasmiṃ pamāṇaññū, paṭiggahaṇaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇamattaṃ jānāti pajānātīti attho. ^b^jāgariyaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0185^ea^ ^b^anuyutto^eb^ti rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu jāgaraṇabhāvaṃ anuyutto, jāgaraṇeyeva yuttappayuttoti attho.

[03] evaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā idāni tameva ṭhapitapaṭipāṭiyā vibhajanto ^b^kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā^eb^tiādīnaṃ attho visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.15) vitthārito, tathā ^b^paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāyā^eb^tiādīnaṃ (visuddhi0 1.18). ^b^āvaraṇīyehi dhammehī^eb^ti pañcahi nīvaraṇehi dhammehi. nīvaraṇāni hi cittaṃ āvaritvā tiṭṭhanti, tasmā āvaraṇīyā dhammāti vuccanti. ^b^sīhaseyyaṃ kappetī^eb^ti sīho viya seyyaṃ kappeti. ^b^pāde pādaṃ accādhāyā^eb^ti vāmapādaṃ dakkhiṇapāde atiādhāya. samaṃ ṭhapite hi pāde jāṇukena jāṇukaṃ gopphakena ca gopphakaṃ ghaṭīyati, tato vedanā uṭṭhahanti. tasmā ^a^V2.0086^ea^ tassa dosassa parivajjanatthaṃ thokaṃ atikkamitvā esa pādaṃ ṭhapeti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``pāde pādaṃ accādhāyā''ti.

[03] ^b^sato^eb^ ^a^M2.0084^ea^ ^b^sampajāno^eb^ti satiyā ceva sampajaññena ca samannāgato. kathaṃ panesa niddāyanto sato sampajāno nāma hotīti? purimappavattivasena. ayaṃ hi caṅkame caṅkamanto niddāya okkamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pavattamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā mañce vā phalake vā nipanno niddaṃ upagantvā puna pabujjhamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne gaṇhantoyeva pabujjhati. tasmā niddāyantopi sato sampajāno nāma hoti. ayaṃ tāva mūlakammaṭṭhāne nayova. pariggahakammaṭṭhānavasenāpi panesa sato sampajāno nāma hoti. kathaṃ? ayaṃ hi caṅkamanto niddāya okkamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pāsāṇaphalake vā mañce vā dakkhiṇena passena nipajjitvā paccavekkhati -- ``acetano kāyo acetane ^a^P2.0186^ea^ mañce patiṭṭhito, acetano mañco acetanāya pathaviyā, acetanā pathavī acetane udake, acetanaṃ udakaṃ acetane vāte, acetano vāto acetane ākāse patiṭṭhito. tattha ākāsampi `ahaṃ vātaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita'nti na jānāti, vātopi `ahaṃ ākāse patiṭṭhito'ti na jānāti. tathā vāto na jānāti. `ahaṃ udakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhito'ti...pe0... mañco na jānāti, `ahaṃ kāyaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhito'ti, kāyo na jānāti `ahaṃ mañce patiṭṭhito'ti. na hi tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ ābhogo vā samannāhāro vā manasikāro vā cetanā vā patthanā vā atthī''ti. tassa evaṃ paccavekkhato taṃ paccavekkhaṇacittaṃ bhavaṅge otarati. evaṃ niddāyantopi sato sampajāno nāma hotīti.

[03] ^b^uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvā^eb^ti ``ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate cande vā tārakāya vā uṭṭhahissāmī''ti uṭṭhānakālaparicchedikaṃ saññaṃ manasikaritvā, citte ṭhapetvāti attho. evaṃ karitvā sayito hi yathāparicchinneyeva kāle uṭṭhahati.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^attabyābādhāyā^eb^ti attadukkhāya. ^b^parabyābādhāyā^eb^ti paradukkhāya. ^b^kāyasucarita^eb^ntiādīni pubbabhāge dasakusalakammapathavasena āgatāni, upari pana yāva arahattā avāritāneva.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0087^ea^ ^a^M2.0085^ea^ ^b^aṭṭīyeyyāthā^eb^ti aṭṭā pīḷitā bhaveyyātha. ^b^harāyeyyāthā^eb^ti lajjeyyātha. ^b^jiguccheyyāthā^eb^ti gūthe viya tasmiṃ vacane sañjātajigucchā bhaveyyātha. ^b^iti kirā^eb^ti ettha ^b^itī^eb^ti padasandhibyañjanasiliṭṭhatā, ^b^kirā^eb^ti anussavatthe nipāto. dibbena kira āyunā aṭṭīyathāti evamassa sambandho veditabbo. ^b^pageva kho panā^eb^ti paṭhamataraṃyeva.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^pāpaṇiko^eb^ti āpaṇiko, āpaṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā bhaṇḍavikkāyakassa vāṇijassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^abhabbo^eb^ti abhājanabhūto. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P2.0187^ea^ ^b^sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhātī^eb^ti yathā adhiṭṭhitaṃ suadhiṭṭhitaṃ hoti, evaṃ sayaṃ attapaccakkhaṃ karonto nādhiṭṭhāti. tattha paccūsakāle padasaddena uṭṭhāya dīpaṃ jāletvā bhaṇḍaṃ pasāretvā anisīdanto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma. ayaṃ hi yaṃ corā rattiṃ bhaṇḍaṃ haritvā ``idaṃ amhākaṃ hatthato vissajjessāmā''ti āpaṇaṃ gantvā appena agghena denti, yampi bahuverino manussā rattiṃ nagare vasitvā pātova āpaṇaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanti, yaṃ vā pana janapadaṃ gantukāmā manussā pātova āpaṇaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ kiṇanti, tappaccayassa lābhassa assāmiko hoti.

[03] aññesaṃ bhojanavelāya pana bhuñjituṃ āgantvā pātova bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā gharaṃ gantvā bhuñjitvā niddāyitvā sāyaṃ puna āpaṇaṃ āgacchanto ^b^majjhanhikasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma. so hi yaṃ corā pātova vissajjetuṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu, divākāle pana paresaṃ asañcārakkhaṇe āpaṇaṃ gantvā appagghena denti, yañca bhojanavelāya puññavanto issarā ``āpaṇato idañcidañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti pahiṇitvā āharāpenti, tappaccayassa lābhassa assāmiko hoti.

[03] yāva yāmabherinikkhamanā pana antoāpaṇe dīpaṃ jālāpetvā anisīdanto ^b^sāyanhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma. so hi yaṃ ^a^M2.0086^ea^ corā pātopi divāpi vissajjetuṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu ^a^V2.0088^ea^, sāyaṃ pana āpaṇaṃ gantvā appagghena denti, tappaccayassa lābhassa assāmiko hoti.

[03] ^b^na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhātī^eb^ti sakkaccakiriyāya samādhiṃ na samāpajjati. ettha ca pātova cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu vattaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā, tāva samāpattiṃ appetvā anisīdanto ^b^pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma. pacchābhattaṃ pana piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ ^a^P2.0188^ea^ pavisitvā yāva sāyanhasamayā samāpattiṃ appetvā anisīdanto ^b^majjhanhikasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma. sāyaṃ pana cetiyaṃ vanditvā therūpaṭṭhānaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā paṭhamayāmaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā anisīdanto ^b^sāyanhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma. sukkapakkho vuttapaṭipakkhanayeneva veditabbo. apicettha ``samāpattiṃ appetvā''ti vuttaṭṭhāne samāpattiyā asati vipassanāpi vaṭṭati, samādhinimittanti ca samādhiārammaṇampi vaṭṭatiyeva. vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``samādhipi samādhinimittaṃ, samādhārammaṇampi samādhinimitta''nti.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^cakkhumā^eb^ti paññācakkhunā cakkhumā hoti. ^b^vidhuro^eb^ti visiṭṭhadhuro uttamadhuro ñāṇasampayuttena vīriyena samannāgato. ^b^nissayasampanno^eb^ti avassayasampanno patiṭṭhānasampanno. ^b^paṇiya^eb^nti vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^ettakaṃ mūlaṃ bhavissati ettako udayo^eb^ti tasmiṃ ``evaṃ kītaṃ evaṃ vikkāyamāna''nti vuttapaṇiye yena kayena taṃ kītaṃ, taṃ kayasaṅkhātaṃ mūlaṃ ettakaṃ bhavissati. yo ca tasmiṃ vikkayamāne vikkayo, tasmiṃ vikkaye ettako udayo bhavissati, ettikā vaḍḍhīti attho.
[03] ^b^kusalo hoti paṇiyaṃ ketuñca vikketuñcā^eb^ti sulabhaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kiṇanto dullabhaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vikkiṇanto ca ettha kusalo nāma hoti, dasaguṇampi vīsatiguṇampi lābhaṃ labhati.

[03] ^b^aḍḍhā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0087^ea^ issarā bahunā nikkhittadhanena samannāgatā. ^b^mahaddhanā^eb^ti vaḷañjanakavasena mahaddhanā ^a^V2.0089^ea^. ^b^mahābhogā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0189^ea^ upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍena mahābhogā. ^b^paṭibalo^eb^ti kāyabalena ceva ñāṇabalena ca samannāgatattā samattho. ^b^amhākañca kālena kālaṃ anuppadātu^eb^nti amhākañca gahitadhanamūlikaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ kālena kālaṃ anuppadātuṃ. ^b^nipatantī^eb^ti nimantenti. nipātentītipi pāṭho, ayameva attho.

[03] ^b^kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāyā^eb^ti kusaladhammānaṃ sampādanatthāya paṭilābhatthāya. ^b^thāmavā^eb^ti ñāṇathāmena samannāgato. ^b^daḷhaparakkamo^eb^ti thirena ñāṇaparakkamena samannāgato. ^b^anikkhittadhuro^eb^ti ``aggamaggaṃ apāpuṇitvā imaṃ vīriyadhuraṃ na ṭhapessāmī''ti evaṃ aṭṭhapitadhuro.

[03] ^b^bahussutā^eb^ti ekanikāyādivasena bahu buddhavacanaṃ sutaṃ etesanti bahussutā. ^b^āgatāgamā^eb^ti eko nikāyo eko āgamo nāma, dve nikāyā dve āgamā nāma, pañca nikāyā pañca āgamā nāma, etesu āgamesu yesaṃ ekopi āgamo āgato paguṇo pavattito, te āgatāgamā nāma. ^b^dhammadharā^eb^ti suttantapiṭakadharā. ^b^vinayadharā^eb^ti vinayapiṭakadharā. ^b^mātikādharā^eb^ti dvemātikādharā. ^b^paripucchatī^eb^ti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ pucchati. ^b^paripañhatī^eb^ti ``imaṃ nāma pucchissāmī''ti aññāti tuleti pariggaṇhāti. sesamettha uttānatthameva.

[03] imasmiṃ ^a^P2.0190^ea^ pana sutte paṭhamaṃ paññā āgatā, pacchā vīriyañca kalyāṇamittasevanā ca. tattha paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ patvā pacchā vīriyaṃ katvā kalyāṇamittā sevitabbāti na evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo, desanāya nāma heṭṭhimena vā paricchedo hoti uparimena vā dvīhipi vā koṭīhi. idha pana uparimena paricchedo veditabbo. tasmā kathentena paṭhamaṃ kalyāṇamittaupanissayaṃ dassetvā majjhe vīriyaṃ dassetvā pacchā arahattaṃ kathetabbanti.
[06] rathakāravaggo dutiyo.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0090^ea^ ^a^M2.0088^ea^ paṭhame jhānaphassaṃ paṭhamaṃ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti ^b^kāyasakkhi^eb^. diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti ^b^diṭṭhippatto^eb^. saddahanto vimuttoti ^b^saddhāvimutto. khamatī^eb^ti ruccati. ^b^abhikkantataro^eb^ti atisundarataro. ^b^paṇītataro^eb^ti atipaṇītataro. ^b^saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī^eb^ti samiddhattherassa kira arahattamaggakkhaṇe saddhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi, sesāni cattāri sahajātindriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ. iti thero attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ kathento evamāha. mahākoṭṭhikattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe samādhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi, sesāni cattāri indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ. tasmā sopi samādhindriyaṃ adhimattanti kathento attanā paṭividdhamaggameva kathesi. sāriputtattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe paññindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi. sesāni cattāri indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ. tasmā sopi paññindriyaṃ adhimattanti kathento attanā paṭividdhamaggameva kathesi.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P2.0191^ea^ ^b^khvetthā^eb^ti na kho ettha. ^b^ekaṃsena byākātu^eb^nti ekantena byākarituṃ. ^b^arahattāya paṭipanno^eb^ti arahattamaggasamaṅgiṃ dasseti. evametasmiṃ sutte tīhipi therehi attanā paṭividdhamaggova kathito, sammāsambuddho pana bhummantareneva kathesi.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^sappāyānī^eb^ti hitāni vuddhikarāni. ^b^patirūpa^eb^nti anucchavikaṃ. ^b^neva vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhā^eb^ti iminā atekicchena vātāpamārādinā rogena samannāgato niṭṭhāpattagilāno kathito. ^b^vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhā^eb^ti iminā khipitakakacchutiṇapupphakajarādibhedo appamattāabādho kathito. ^b^labhanto sappāyāni bhojanāni no alabhanto^eb^ti iminā pana yesaṃ paṭijagganena phāsukaṃ hoti, sabbepi te ābādhā kathitā. ettha ca ^b^patirūpo upaṭṭhāko^eb^ nāma ^a^V2.0091^ea^ gilānupaṭṭhākāṅgehi samannāgato paṇḍito dakkho analaso veditabbo. ^b^gilānupaṭṭhāko anuññāto^eb^ti bhikkhusaṅghena dātabboti anuññāto. tasmiñhi gilāne attano dhammatāya yāpetuṃ asakkonte bhikkhusaṅghena ^a^M2.0089^ea^ tassa bhikkhuno eko bhikkhu ca sāmaṇero ca ``imaṃ paṭijaggathā''ti apaloketvā dātabbā. yāva pana te taṃ paṭijagganti, tāva gilānassa ca tesañca dvinnaṃ yenattho, sabbaṃ bhikkhusaṅghasseva bhāro.

[03] ^b^aññepi gilānā upaṭṭhātabbā^eb^ti itarepi dve gilānā upaṭṭhāpetabbā. kiṃ kāraṇā? yopi hi niṭṭhapattagilāno, so anupaṭṭhiyamāno ``sace maṃ paṭijaggeyyuṃ, phāsukaṃ me bhaveyya. na kho pana maṃ paṭijaggantī''ti manopadosaṃ katvā apāye nibbatteyya. paṭijaggiyamānassa panassa evaṃ hoti ``bhikkhusaṅghena yaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ kataṃ. mayhaṃ pana kammavipāko īdiso''ti. so bhikkhusaṅghe mettaṃ ^a^P2.0192^ea^ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā sagge nibbattissati. yo pana appamattakena byādhinā samannāgato labhantopi alabhantopi vuṭṭhātiyeva, tassa vināpi bhesajjena vūpasamanabyādhi bhesajje kate khippataraṃ vūpasammati. so tato buddhavacanaṃ vā uggaṇhituṃ sakkhissati, samaṇadhammaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkhissati. iminā kāraṇena ``aññepi gilānā upaṭṭhātabbā''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^neva okkamatī^eb^ti neva pavisati. ^b^niyāmaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta^eb^nti kusalesu dhammesu magganiyāmasaṅkhātaṃ sammattaṃ. iminā padaparamo puggalo kathito. dutiyavārena ugghaṭitaññū gahito sāsane nālakattherasadiso buddhantare ekavāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ santike ovādaṃ labhitvā paṭividdhapaccekabodhiñāṇo ca. tatiyavārena vipañcitaññū puggalo kathito, neyyo pana tannissitova hoti.

[03] ^b^dhammadesanā anuññātā^eb^ti māsassa aṭṭha vāre dhammakathā anuññātā. ^b^aññesampi dhammo desetabbo^eb^ti itaresampi dhammo kathetabbo. kiṃ kāraṇā? padaparamassa hi imasmiṃ attabhāve dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asakkontassāpi anāgate paccayo bhavissati. yo pana tathāgatassa rūpadassanaṃ labhantopi alabhantopi dhammavinayañca savanāya labhantopi alabhantopi dhammaṃ abhisameti, so alabhanto tāva abhisameti. labhanto pana khippameva abhisamessatīti iminā kāraṇena ^a^M2.0090^ea^ tesaṃ dhammo desetabbo. tatiyassa pana punappunaṃ desetabbova.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V2.0092^ea^ ^b^sabyābajjha^eb^nti sadukkhaṃ. ^b^kāyasaṅkhāra^eb^nti kāyadvāre cetanārāsiṃ. ^b^abhisaṅkharotī^eb^ti āyūhati rāsiṃ karoti piṇḍaṃ karoti. ^b^vacīmanodvāresu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^sabyābajjhaṃ loka^eb^nti sadukkhaṃ lokaṃ. ^b^sabyābajjhā phassā phusantī^eb^ti sadukkhā vipākaphassā phusanti. ^b^sabyābajjhaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0193^ea^ ^b^vedanaṃ vediyatī^eb^ti sadukkhaṃ vipākavedanaṃ vediyati, sābādhaṃ nirassādanti attho. ^b^seyyathāpi sattā nerayikā^eb^ti yathā niraye nibbattasattā ekantadukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyanti, evaṃ vediyatīti attho. kiṃ pana tattha upekkhāvedanā natthīti? atthi, dukkhavedanāya pana balavabhāvena sā abbohārikaṭṭhāne ṭhitā. iti nirayova nirayassa upamaṃ katvā āhaṭo. tatra paṭibhāgaupamā nāma kira esā.

[03] ^b^seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhā^eb^ti idhāpi devalokova devalokassa upamaṃ katvā āhaṭo. yasmā pana heṭṭhimesu brahmalokesu sappītikajjhānavipāko vattati, subhakiṇhesu nippītiko ekantasukhova, tasmā te aggahetvā subhakiṇhāva kathitā. iti ayampi tatra paṭibhāgaupamā nāmāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^vokiṇṇasukhadukkha^eb^nti vomissakasukhadukkhaṃ. ^b^seyyathāpi manussā^eb^ti manussānaṃ hi kālena sukhaṃ hoti, kālena dukkhaṃ. ^b^ekacce ca devā^eb^ti kāmāvacaradevā. tesampi kālena sukhaṃ hoti, kālena dukkhaṃ. tesaṃ hi hīnatarānaṃ mahesakkhatarā devatā disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṃ hoti, maggā ukkamitabbaṃ, pārutavatthaṃ apanetabbaṃ, añjalikammaṃ kātabbanti taṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ nāma hoti. ^b^ekacce ca vinipātikā^eb^ti vemānikapetā. te hi kālena sampattiṃ anubhavanti kālena kammanti vokiṇṇasukhadukkhāva honti. iti imasmiṃ sutte tīṇi sucaritāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M2.0091^ea^ ^b^tayome, bhikkhave, puggalā^eb^ti tayo ācariyapuggalā. ^b^puggalassa^eb^ ^a^P2.0194^ea^ ^b^bahukārā^eb^ti antevāsikapuggalassa bahūpakārā. ^b^buddha^eb^nti sabbaññubuddhaṃ. ^b^saraṇaṃ gato hotī^eb^ti avassayaṃ ^a^V2.0093^ea^ gato hoti. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti satantikaṃ navalokuttaradhammaṃ. ^b^saṅgha^eb^nti aṭṭhāriyapuggalasamūhaṃ. idañca pana saraṇagamanaṃ aggahitasaraṇapubbassa akatābhinivesassa vasena vuttaṃ. iti imasmiṃ sutte saraṇadāyako sotāpattimaggasampāpako arahattamaggasampāpakoti tayo ācariyā bahukārāti āgatā, pabbajjādāyako buddhavacanadāyako kammavācācariyo sakadāgāmimaggasampāpako anāgāmimaggasampāpakoti ime ācariyā na āgatā, kiṃ ete na bahukārāti? no, na bahukārā. ayaṃ pana desanā duvidhena paricchinnā. tasmā sabbepete bahukārā. tesu saraṇagamanasmiṃyeva akatābhiniveso vaṭṭati, catupārisuddhisīlakasiṇaparikammavipassanāñāṇāni pana paṭhamamaggasannissitāni honti, upari dve maggā ca phalāni ca arahattamaggasannissitānīti veditabbāni.

[03] ^b^iminā puggalenā^eb^ti iminā antevāsikapuggalena. ^b^na suppatikāraṃ vadāmī^eb^ti patikāraṃ kātuṃ na sukaranti vadāmi. abhivādanādīsu anekasatavāraṃ anekasahassavārampi hi pañcapatiṭṭhitena nipatitvā vandanto āsanā vuṭṭhāya paccuggacchanto diṭṭhadiṭṭhakkhaṇe añjaliṃ paggaṇhanto anucchavikaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ karonto divase divase cīvarasataṃ cīvarasahassaṃ piṇḍapātasataṃ piṇḍapātasahassaṃ dadamāno cakkavāḷapariyantena sabbaratanamayaṃ āvāsaṃ karonto sappinavanītādinānappakāraṃ bhesajjaṃ anuppadajjamāno neva sakkoti ācariyena katassa patikāraṃ nāma kātunti evamattho veditabbo.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^arukūpamacitto^eb^ti purāṇavaṇasadisacitto. ^b^vijjūpamacitto^eb^ti ittarakālobhāsanena vijjusadisacitto. ^b^vajirūpamacitto^eb^ti ^a^P2.0195^ea^ kilesānaṃ ^a^M2.0092^ea^ mūlaghātakaraṇasamatthatāya vajirena sadisacitto. ^b^abhisajjatī^eb^ti laggati. ^b^kuppatī^eb^ti kopavasena kuppati. ^b^byāpajjatī^eb^ti pakatibhāvaṃ pajahati, pūtiko hoti. ^b^patitthīyatī^eb^ti thinabhāvaṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ āpajjati. ^b^kopa^eb^nti dubbalakodhaṃ. ^b^dosa^eb^nti dussanavasena tato balavataraṃ. ^b^appaccaya^eb^nti atuṭṭhākāraṃ domanassaṃ. ^b^duṭṭhāruko^eb^ti purāṇavaṇo. ^b^kaṭṭhenā^eb^ti daṇḍakakoṭiyā. ^b^kaṭhalenā^eb^ti kapālena. ^b^āsavaṃ detī^eb^ti aparāparaṃ savati. purāṇavaṇo hi attano dhammatāyeva pubbaṃ lohitaṃ yūsanti imāni tīṇi savati, ghaṭṭito pana tāni adhikataraṃ savati.

[03] ^b^evameva^eb^ ^a^V2.0094^ea^ ^b^kho^eb^ti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- duṭṭhāruko viya hi kodhanapuggalo, tassa attano dhammatāya savanaṃ viya kodhanassapi attano dhammatāya uddhumātassa viya caṇḍikatassa caraṇaṃ, kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭanaṃ viya appamattaṃ vacanaṃ, bhiyyosomattāya savanaṃ viya ``mādisaṃ nāma esa evaṃ vadatī''ti bhiyyosomattāya uddhumāyanabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^rattandhakāratimisāya^eb^nti rattiṃ cakkhuviññāṇuppattinivāraṇena andhabhāvakaraṇe bahalatame. ^b^vijjantarikāyā^eb^ti vijjuppattikkhaṇe. idhāpi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- cakkhumā puriso viya hi yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo, andhakāraṃ viya sotāpattimaggavajjhā kilesā, vijjusañcaraṇaṃ viya sotāpattimaggañāṇassa uppattikālo, vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya ^a^P2.0196^ea^ sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ, puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggavajjhā kilesā, puna vijjusañcaraṇaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggañāṇassa uppādo, vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ, puna andhakārāvattharaṇaṃ viya anāgāmimaggavajjhā kilesā, puna vijjusañcaraṇaṃ viya anāgāmimaggañāṇassa uppādo, vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya anāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^vajirūpamacittatāyapi^eb^ ^a^M2.0093^ea^ idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- vajiraṃ viya hi arahattamaggañāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, maṇigaṇṭhipāsāṇagaṇṭhi viya arahattamaggavajjhā kilesā, vajirassa maṇigaṇṭhimpi vā pāsāṇagaṇṭhimpi vā vinivijjhitvā agamanabhāvassa natthitā viya arahattamaggañāṇena acchejjānaṃ kilesānaṃ natthibhāvo, vajirena nibbiddhavedhassa puna apatipūraṇaṃ viya arahattamaggena chinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anuppādo daṭṭhabboti.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^sevitabbo^eb^ti upasaṅkamitabbo. ^b^bhajitabbo^eb^ti allīyitabbo. ^b^payirupāsitabbo^eb^ti santike nisīdanavasena punappunaṃ upāsitabbo. ^b^sakkatvā garuṃ katvā^eb^ti sakkārañceva garukārañca katvā. ^b^hīno hoti sīlenā^eb^tiādīsu upādāyupādāya hīnatā veditabbā. tattha yo hi pañca sīlāni rakkhati, so dasa sīlāni rakkhantena na sevitabbo ^a^V2.0095^ea^. yo dasa sīlāni rakkhati, so catupārisuddhisīlaṃ rakkhantena na sevitabbo. ^b^aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca. attano atthāyeva hi evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo, anuddayānukampāvasena pana taṃ upasaṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati.

[03] ^b^sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ sata^eb^nti sīlena samānabhāvaṃ gatānaṃ santānaṃ. ^b^sīlakathā^eb^ ^a^P2.0197^ea^ ^b^ca no bhavissatī^eb^ti evaṃ samānasīlānaṃ amhākaṃ sīlameva ārabbha kathā bhavissati. ^b^sā ca no pavattinī bhavissatī^eb^ti sā ca amhākaṃ kathā divasampi kathentānaṃ pavattissati na paṭihaññissati. ^b^sā ca no phāsu bhavissatī^eb^ti sā ca divasampi pavattamānā sīlakathā amhākaṃ phāsuvihāro sukhavihāro bhavissati. ^b^samādhipaññākathāsu^eb^pi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^sīlakkhandha^eb^nti sīlarāsiṃ. ^b^tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmī^eb^ti ettha sīlassa asappāye anupakāradhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāradhamme sevanto tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlakkhandhaṃ paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma. ^b^samādhipaññākkhandhesu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^nihīyatī^eb^ti attano hīnataraṃ puggalaṃ sevanto khāraparissāvane āsittaudakaṃ viya satataṃ samitaṃ hāyati parihāyati. ^b^tulyasevī^eb^ti attanā samānasevī. ^b^seṭṭhamupanama^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ ^a^M2.0094^ea^ puggalaṃ oṇamanto. ^b^udeti khippa^eb^nti khippameva vaḍḍhati. ^b^tasmā attano uttariṃ bhajethā^eb^ti yasmā seṭṭhaṃ puggalaṃ upanamanto udeti khippaṃ, tasmā attano uttaritaraṃ visiṭṭhataraṃ bhajetha.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^jigucchitabbo^eb^ti gūthaṃ viya jigucchitabbo. ^b^atha kho na^eb^nti atha kho assa. ^b^kittisaddo^eb^ti kathāsaddo. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha gūthakūpo viya dussīlyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. gūthakūpe patitvā ṭhito dhammaniahi viya dussīlapuggalo. gūthakūpato uddhariyamānena tena ahinā purisassa sarīraṃ āruḷhenāpi adaṭṭhabhāvo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassāpi tassa kiriyāya akaraṇabhāvo. sarīraṃ gūthena makkhetvā ^a^P2.0198^ea^ ahinā gatakālo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassa pāpakittisaddābbhuggamanakālo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^tindukālāta^eb^nti tindukarukkhālātaṃ. ^b^bhiyyosomattāya cicciṭāyatī^eb^ti taṃ hi jhāyamānaṃ pakatiyāpi ^a^V2.0096^ea^ papaṭikāyo muñcantaṃ cicciṭāti ``ciṭiciṭā''ti saddaṃ karoti, ghaṭṭitaṃ pana adhimattaṃ karotīti attho. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti evamevaṃ kodhano attano dhammatāyapi uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati, appamattakaṃ pana vacanaṃ sutakāle ``mādisaṃ nāma evaṃ vadati evaṃ vadatī''ti atirekataraṃ uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati. ^b^gūthakūpo^eb^ti gūthapuṇṇakūpo, gūtharāsiyeva vā. opammasaṃsandanaṃ panettha purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^tasmā evarūpo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo^eb^ti yasmā kodhano atiseviyamāno atiupasaṅkamiyamānopi kujjhatiyeva, ``kiṃ iminā''ti paṭikkamantepi kujjhatiyeva. tasmā palālaggi viya ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? yo hi palālaggiṃ atiupasaṅkamitvā tappati, tassa sarīraṃ jhāyati. yo atipaṭikkamitvā tappati, tassa sītaṃ na vūpasammati. anupasaṅkamitvā apaṭikkamitvā pana majjhattabhāvena tappantassa sītaṃ vūpasammati, tasmā palālaggi viya kodhano puggalo majjhattabhāvena ^a^M2.0095^ea^ ajjhupekkhitabbo, na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.

[03] ^b^kalyāṇamitto^eb^ti sucimitto. ^b^kalyāṇasahāyo^eb^ti sucisahāyo. sahāyā nāma sahagāmino saddhiṃcarā. ^b^kalyāṇasampavaṅko^eb^ti kalyāṇesu sucipuggalesu sampavaṅko, tanninnatappoṇatappabbhāramānasoti attho.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^gūthabhāṇī^eb^ti yo gūthaṃ viya duggandhakathaṃ katheti. ^b^pupphabhāṇī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0199^ea^ yo pupphāni viya sugandhakathaṃ katheti. ^b^madhubhāṇī^eb^ti yo madhu viya madhurakathaṃ katheti. ^b^sabhaggato^eb^ti sabhāya ṭhito. ^b^parisaggato^eb^ti gāmaparisāya ṭhito. ^b^ñātimajjhagato^eb^ti ñātīnaṃ majjhe ṭhito. ^b^pūgamajjhagato^eb^ti seṇīnaṃ majjhe ṭhito. ^b^rājakulamajjhagato^eb^ti rājakulassa majjhe mahāvinicchaye ṭhito. ^b^abhinīto^eb^ti pucchanatthāyānīto. ^b^sakkhipuṭṭho^eb^ti sakkhiṃ katvā pucchito. ^b^ehambho purisā^eb^ti ālapanametaṃ. ^b^attahetu vā parahetu vā^eb^ti attano vā parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā. ^b^āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā^eb^ti ettha ^b^āmisa^eb^nti lañjo adhippeto. ^b^kiñcikkha^eb^nti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ antamaso tittiriyavaṭṭakasappipiṇḍanavanītapiṇḍādimattakassa lañjassa hetūti attho. ^b^sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotī^eb^ti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ kattā hoti.

[03] ^b^nelā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0097^ea^ elaṃ vuccati doso, nāssa elanti nelā, niddosāti attho. ``nelaṅgo setapacchādo''ti (udā0 65) ettha vuttasīlaṃ viya. ^b^kaṇṇasukhā^eb^ti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti ^b^pemanīyā^eb^. hadayaṃ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti ^b^hadayaṅgamā^eb^. guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti ^b^porī^eb^. pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī. purassa esātipi porī. purassa esāti nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. nagaravāsino ^a^P2.0200^ea^ hi yuttakathā honti ^a^M2.0096^ea^, pitimattaṃ pitāti, mātimattaṃ mātāti, bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti ^b^bahujanakantā^eb^. kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti ^b^bahujanamanāpā^eb^.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^cakkhu na hotī^eb^ti paññācakkhu na hoti. ^b^phātiṃ kareyyā^eb^ti phītaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ kareyya. ^b^sāvajjānavajje^eb^ti sadosaniddose. ^b^hīnappaṇīte^eb^ti adhamuttame. ^b^kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge^eb^ti kaṇhasukkāyeva aññamaññaṃ paṭibāhanato paṭipakkhavasena sappaṭibhāgāti vuccanti. ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo -- kusale dhamme ``kusalā dhammā''ti jāneyya, akusale dhamme ``akusalā dhammā''ti jāneyya. sāvajjādīsupi eseva nayo. kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgesu pana kaṇhadhamme ``sukkasappaṭibhāgā''ti jāneyya, sukkadhamme ``kaṇhasappaṭibhāgā''ti yena paññācakkhunā jāneyya, tathārūpampissa cakkhu na hotīti. iminā nayena sesavāresupi attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^na ceva bhogā tathārūpā^eb^ti tathājātikā bhogāpissa na honti. ^b^na ca puññāni kubbatī^eb^ti puññāni ca na karoti. ettāvatā bhoguppādanacakkhuno ca puññakaraṇacakkhuno ca abhāvo vutto. ^b^ubhayattha kaliggāho^eb^ti idhaloke ca paraloke cāti ubhayasmimpi aparaddhaggāho, parājayaggāho hotīti attho. atha vā ^b^ubhayattha kaliggāho^eb^ti ubhayesampi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ atthānaṃ kaliggāho, parājayaggāhoti attho. ^b^dhammādhammenā^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhammenapi dasākusalakammapathādhammenapi. ^b^saṭho^eb^ti kerāṭiko. ^b^bhogāni pariyesatī^eb^ti bhoge gavesati. ^b^theyyena^eb^ ^a^P2.0201^ea^ ^b^kūṭakammena, musāvādena cūbhaya^eb^nti theyyādīsu ubhayena pariyesatīti attho. kathaṃ? theyyena kūṭakammena ca pariyesati, theyyena musāvādena ca pariyesati ^a^V2.0098^ea^, kūṭakammena musāvādena ca pariyesati. ^b^saṅghātu^eb^nti saṅgharituṃ. ^b^dhammaladdhehī^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ akopetvā laddhehi. ^b^uṭṭhānādhigata^eb^nti vīriyena ^a^M2.0097^ea^ adhigataṃ. ^b^abyagghamānaso^eb^ti nibbicikicchacitto. ^b^bhaddakaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^na socatī^eb^ti yasmiṃ ṭhāne antosokena na socati.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^avakujjapañño^eb^ti adhomukhapañño. ^b^ucchaṅgapañño^eb^ti ucchaṅgasadisapañño. ^b^puthupañño^eb^ti vitthārikapañño. ^b^ādikalyāṇa^eb^ntiādīsu ^b^ādī^eb^ti pubbapaṭṭhapanā. ^b^majjha^eb^nti kathāvemajjhaṃ. ^b^pariyosāna^eb^nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ. itissa te dhammaṃ kathentā pubbapaṭṭhapanepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā kathenti, vemajjhepi pariyosānepi. ettha ca atthi desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānāni, atthi sāsanassa. tattha desanāya tāva catuppadikagāthāya paṭhamapadaṃ ādi, dve padāni majjhaṃ, avasānapadaṃ pariyosānaṃ. ekānusandhikassa suttassa nidānaṃ ādi, anusandhi majjhaṃ, idamavocāti appanā pariyosānaṃ. anekānusandhikassa paṭhamo anusandhi ādi, tato paraṃ eko vā aneke vā majjhaṃ, pacchimo pariyosānaṃ. ayaṃ tāva desanāya nayo. sāsanassa pana sīlaṃ ādi, samādhi majjhaṃ, vipassanā pariyosānaṃ. samādhi vā ādi, vipassanā majjhaṃ, maggo pariyosānaṃ. vipassanā vā ādi, maggo majjhaṃ, phalaṃ pariyosānaṃ. maggo vā ādi, phalaṃ majjhaṃ, nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṃ. dve dve vā kayiramāne sīlasamādhayo ādi, vipassanāmaggā majjhaṃ, phalanibbānāni pariyosānaṃ.

[03] ^b^sāttha^eb^nti ^a^P2.0202^ea^ sātthakaṃ katvā desenti. ^b^sabyañjana^eb^nti akkharapāripūriṃ katvā desenti. ^b^kevalaparipuṇṇa^eb^nti sakalaparipuṇṇaṃ anūnaṃ katvā desenti. ^b^parisuddha^eb^nti parisuddhaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā desenti. ^b^brahmacariyaṃ pakāsentī^eb^ti evaṃ desentā ca seṭṭhacariyabhūtaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pakāsenti. ^b^neva ādiṃ manasi karotī^eb^ti neva pubbapaṭṭhapanaṃ manasi karoti.

[03] ^b^kumbho^eb^ti ghaṭo. ^b^nikujjo^eb^ti adhomukho ṭhapito. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha kumbho nikujjo viya avakujjapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo, udakāsiñcanakālo ^a^M2.0098^ea^ viya dhammadesanāya laddhakālo, udakassa ^a^V2.0099^ea^ vivaṭṭanakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggahetuṃ asamatthakālo, udakassa asaṇṭhānakālo viya vuṭṭhahitvā asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^ākiṇṇānī^eb^ti pakkhittāni. ^b^satisammosāya pakireyyā^eb^ti muṭṭhassatitāya vikireyya. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo, nānākhajjakāni viya nānappakāraṃ buddhavacanaṃ, ucchaṅge nānākhajjakāni khādantassa nisinnakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo, vuṭṭhahantassa satisammosā pakiraṇakālo viya tasmā āsanā vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^ukkujjo^eb^ti uparimukho ṭhapito. ^b^saṇṭhātī^eb^ti patiṭṭhahati. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha uparimukho ṭhapito kumbho viya puthupañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo, udakassa āsittakālo viya desanāya ^a^P2.0203^ea^ laddhakālo, udakassa saṇṭhānakālo viya tattha nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo, no vivaṭṭanakālo viya vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa sallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^dummedho^eb^ti nippañño. ^b^avicakkhaṇo^eb^ti saṃvidahanapaññāya rahito. ^b^gantā^eb^ti gamanasīlo. ^b^seyyo etena vuccatī^eb^ti etasmā puggalā uttaritaroti vuccati. ^b^dhammānudhammappaṭipanno^eb^ti navalokuttaradhammassa anudhammaṃ saha sīlena pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno. ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa. ^b^antakaro siyā^eb^ti koṭikaro paricchedakaro parivaṭumakaro bhaveyyāti.
[06] puggalavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0100^ea^ paṭhame ^b^ajjhāgāre^eb^ti sake ghare. ^b^pūjitā hontī^eb^ti yaṃ ghare atthi, tena paṭijaggitā gopitā honti. iti mātāpitupūjakāni kulāni mātāpitūhi sabrahmakānīti pakāsetvā idāni nesaṃ ^a^M2.0099^ea^ sapubbācariyakādibhāvaṃ pakāsento ^b^sapubbācariyakānī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^brahmā^eb^tiādīni tesaṃ brahmādibhāvasādhanatthaṃ vuttāni. ^b^bahukārā^eb^ti puttānaṃ bahūpakārā. ^b^āpādakā^eb^ti jīvitassa āpādakā. puttakānaṃ hi mātāpitūhi jīvitaṃ āpāditaṃ pālitaṃ ghaṭitaṃ anuppabandhena pavattitaṃ. ^b^posakā^eb^ti hatthapāde vaḍḍhetvā hadayalohitaṃ pāyetvā posetāro. ^b^imassa lokassa dassetāro^eb^ti puttānaṃ hi imasmiṃ loke iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇassa ^a^P2.0204^ea^ dassanaṃ nāma mātāpitaro nissāya jātanti imassa lokassa dassetāro nāma.

[03] ^b^brahmāti mātāpitaro^eb^ti seṭṭhādhivacanaṃ. yathā brahmuno catasso bhāvanā avijahitā honti mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti, evameva mātāpitūnaṃ puttakesu catasso bhāvanā avijahitā honti. tā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle veditabbā -- kucchigatasmiṃ hi dārake ``kadā nu kho puttakaṃ arogaṃ paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ passissāmā''ti mātāpitūnaṃ mettacittaṃ uppajjati. yadā panesa mando uttānaseyyako ūkāhi vā maṅkulādīhi pāṇakehi daṭṭho dukkhaseyyāya vā pana pīḷito parodati viravati, tadāssa saddaṃ sutvā mātāpitūnaṃ kāruññaṃ uppajjati, ādhāvitvā vidhāvitvā kīḷanakāle pana lobhanīyavayasmiṃ vā ṭhitakāle dārakaṃ oloketvā mātāpitūnaṃ cittaṃ sappimaṇḍe pakkhittasatavihatakappāsapicupaṭalaṃ viya mudukaṃ hoti āmoditaṃ pamoditaṃ, tadā tesaṃ muditā labbhati. yadā panesa putto dārābharaṇaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā pāṭiyekkaṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasati, tadā mātāpitūnaṃ ``sakkoti dāni no puttako attano dhammatāya yāpetu''nti majjhattabhāvo uppajjati, tasmiṃ kāle upekkhā labbhatīti iminā kāraṇena ``brahmāti mātāpitaro''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^pubbācariyāti^eb^ ^a^V2.0101^ea^ ^b^vuccare^eb^ti mātāpitaro hi jātakālato paṭṭhāya ``evaṃ nisīda, evaṃ tiṭṭha, evaṃ gaccha, evaṃ saya, evaṃ khāda, evaṃ bhuñja, ayaṃ te, tātāti vattabbo, ayaṃ bhātikāti, ayaṃ bhaginīti, idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ na vaṭṭati, asukaṃ nāma upasaṅkamituṃ vaṭṭati, asukaṃ na vaṭṭatī''ti gāhāpenti sikkhāpenti. athāparabhāge ^a^P2.0205^ea^ aññe ācariyā hatthisippāssasipparathasippadhanusippatharusippamuddāgaṇanādīni sikkhāpenti. añño ^a^M2.0100^ea^ saraṇāni deti, añño sīlesu patiṭṭhāpeti, añño pabbājeti, añño buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhāpeti, añño upasampādeti, añño sotāpattimaggādīni pāpeti. iti sabbepi te pacchācariyā nāma honti, mātāpitaro pana sabbapaṭhamā, tenāha -- ``pubbācariyāti vuccare''ti. tattha ^b^vuccare^eb^ti vuccanti kathiyanti. ^b^āhuneyyā ca puttāna^eb^nti puttānaṃ āhutaṃ pāhutaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ annapānādiṃ arahanti, anucchavikā taṃ paṭiggahetuṃ. tasmā ``āhuneyyā ca puttāna''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^pajāya anukampakā^eb^ti paresaṃ pāṇe acchinditvāpi attano pajaṃ paṭijagganti gopāyanti. tasmā ``pajāya anukampakā''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^namasseyyā^eb^ti namo kareyya. ^b^sakkareyyā^eb^ti sakkārena paṭimāneyya. idāni taṃ sakkāraṃ dassento ``annenā''tiādimāha. tattha ^b^annenā^eb^ti yāgubhattakhādanīyena. ^b^pānenā^eb^ti aṭṭhavidhapānena. ^b^vatthenā^eb^ti nivāsanapārupanakena vatthena. ^b^sayanenā^eb^ti mañcapīṭhānuppadānena. ^b^ucchādanenā^eb^ti duggandhaṃ paṭivinodetvā sugandhakaraṇucchādanena. ^b^nhāpanenā^eb^ti sīte uṇhodakena, uṇhe sītodakena gattāni parisiñcitvā nhāpanena. ^b^pādānaṃ dhovanenā^eb^ti uṇhodakasītodakehi pādadhovanena ceva telamakkhanena ca. ^b^peccā^eb^ti paralokaṃ gantvā. ^b^sagge pamodatī^eb^ti idha tāva mātāpitūsu pāricariyaṃ disvā pāricariyakāraṇā taṃ paṇḍitamanussā idheva pasaṃsanti ^a^P2.0206^ea^, paralokaṃ pana gantvā sagge ṭhito so mātāpitūpaṭṭhāko dibbasampattīhi āmodati pamodatīti.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^tathārūpo^eb^ti tathājātiko. ^b^samādhipaṭilābho^eb^ti cittekaggatālābho. ^b^imasmiṃ ca saviññāṇake^eb^ti ettha attano ca parassa cāti ubhayesampi kāyo saviññāṇakaṭṭhena ekato katvā imasminti vutto. ^b^ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā^eb^ti ahaṅkāradiṭṭhi ca mamaṅkārataṇhā ca mānānusayo ^a^V2.0102^ea^ cāti attano ca parassa ^a^M2.0101^ea^ ca kilesā. ^b^nāssū^eb^ti na bhaveyyuṃ. ^b^bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesū^eb^ti rūpanimittaṃ, saddanimittaṃ, gandhanimittaṃ, rasanimittaṃ, phoṭṭhabbanimittaṃ, sassatādinimittaṃ, puggalanimittaṃ dhammanimittanti evarūpesu ca bahiddhā sabbanimittesu. ^b^cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimutti^eb^nti phalasamādhiñceva phalañāṇañca. ^b^siyā^eb^ti bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^idhānanda, bhikkhuno^eb^ti, ānanda, imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhuno. ^b^etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇīta^eb^nti nibbānaṃ dassento āha. nibbānaṃ hi kilesānaṃ santatāya santaṃ nāma, nibbānaṃ santanti samāpattiṃ appetvāva divasampi nisinnassa cittuppādo santanteva pavattatītipi santaṃ. ^b^paṇīta^eb^nti samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassāpi cittuppādo paṇītanteva pavattatīti nibbānaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma. ^b^sabbasaṅkhārasamatho^eb^tiādīnipi tasseva vevacanāni. ``sabbasaṅkhārasamatho''ti samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassa hi divasabhāgampi cittuppādo sabbasaṅkhārasamathoteva pavattati...pe0... tathā tīsu bhavesu vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya abhāvena nibbānanti laddhanāme tasmiṃ samāpattiṃ ^a^P2.0207^ea^ appetvā nisinnassa cittuppādo nibbānaṃ nibbānanteva pavattatīti sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādīni nāmāni labhati. imasmiṃ pana aṭṭhavidhe ābhogasamannāhāre imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekopi labbhati, dvepi sabbepi labbhanteva.

[03] ^b^saṅkhāyā^eb^ti ñāṇena jānitvā. ^b^paroparānī^eb^ti parāni ca oparāni ca. parāttabhāvasakāttabhāvāni hi parāni ca oparāni cāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yassā^eb^ti yassa arahato. ^b^iñjita^eb^nti rāgiñjitaṃ dosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritiñjitanti imāni satta iñjitāni calitāni phanditāni. ^b^natthi kuhiñcī^eb^ti katthaci ekārammaṇepi natthi. ^b^santo^eb^ti paccanīkakilesānaṃ santatāya santo. ^b^vidhūmo^eb^ti kāyaduccaritādidhūmavirahito. ^b^anīgho^eb^ti rāgādīighavirahito. ^b^nirāso^eb^ti nittaṇho. ^b^atārī^eb^ti tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo samatikkanto. ^b^so^eb^ti so arahaṃ khīṇāsavo. ^b^jātijara^eb^nti ettha jātijarāgahaṇeneva byādhimaraṇampi gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ. iti suttantepi gāthāyapi arahattaphalasamāpattiyeva kathitāti.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M2.0102^ea^ ^b^saṃkhittenā^eb^ti mātikāṭhapanena. ^b^vitthārenā^eb^ti ṭhapitamātikāvibhajanena. ^b^saṃkhittavitthārenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0103^ea^ kāle saṃkhittena kāle vitthārena. ^b^aññātāro ca dullabhā^eb^ti paṭivijjhanakapuggalā pana dullabhā. idaṃ bhagavā ``sāriputtattherassa ñāṇaṃ ghaṭṭemī''ti adhippāyena kathesi. taṃ sutvā thero kiñcāpi ``ahaṃ, bhante, ājānissāmī''ti na vadati, adhippāyena pana ``vissatthā tumhe, bhante, desetha, ahaṃ tumhehi desitaṃ dhammaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena paṭivijjhissāmi, mamesa bhāro hotū''ti satthāraṃ desanāya ussāhento ^b^etassa bhagavā kālo^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] athassa satthā ^b^tasmātihā^eb^ti desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^imasmiñca saviññāṇake^eb^tiādi vuttanayameva. ^b^acchecchi^eb^ ^a^P2.0208^ea^ ^b^taṇha^eb^nti maggañāṇasatthena taṇhaṃ chindi. ^b^vivattayi saṃyojana^eb^nti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ samūlakaṃ ubbattetvā chaḍḍesi. ^b^sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā^eb^ti sammā upāyena sammā paṭipattiyā navavidhassa mānassa pahānābhisamayena vaṭṭadukkhassa antamakāsi. ^b^idañca pana metaṃ, sāriputta, sandhāya bhāsita^eb^nti, sāriputta, mayā pārāyane udayapañhe idaṃ phalasamāpattimeva sandhāya etaṃ bhāsitaṃ.

[03] idāni yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ dassento ^b^pahānaṃ kāmasaññāna^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. udayapañhe ca etaṃ padaṃ ``pahānaṃ kāmacchandāna''nti (su0 ni0 1112; cūḷani0 udayamāṇavapucchāniddeso 75) āgataṃ, idha pana aṅguttarabhāṇakehi ``kāmasaññāna''nti āropitaṃ. tattha byañjanameva nānaṃ, attho pana ekoyeva. ^b^kāmasaññāna^eb^nti kāme ārabbha uppannasaññānaṃ, aṭṭhahi vā lobhasahagatacittehi sahajātasaññānaṃ. ^b^domanassāna cūbhaya^eb^nti etāsañca kāmasaññānaṃ cetasikadomanassānañcāti ubhinnampi pahānaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaphalaṃ aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūmīti attho. niddese pana ``kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbāna''nti (cūḷani0 udayamāṇavapucchāniddeso 75) vuttaṃ, taṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ. pahānanti hi khīṇākārasaṅkhāto vūpasamopi vuccati, kilese paṭinissajjanto maggopi, kilesapaṭippassaddhisaṅkhātaṃ phalampi ^a^M2.0103^ea^, yaṃ āgamma kilesā pahīyanti, taṃ amataṃ nibbānampi. tasmā tattha tāni padāni āgatāni. ``aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūmī''ti vacanato pana arahattaphalameva adhippetaṃ. ^b^thinassa^eb^ ^a^P2.0209^ea^ ^b^ca panūdana^eb^ntipi thinassa ca panūdanante uppannattā arahattaphalameva adhippetaṃ ^a^V2.0104^ea^. ^b^kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇa^eb^nti kukkuccanivāraṇassa maggassa anantaraṃ uppannattā phalameva adhippetaṃ.

[03] ^b^upekkhāsatisaṃsuddha^eb^nti catutthajjhānike phale uppannāya upekkhāya ca satiyā ca saṃsuddhaṃ. ^b^dhammatakkapurejava^eb^nti dhammatakko vuccati sammāsaṅkappo, so ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti dhammatakkapurejavo. taṃ dhammatakkapurejavaṃ. ^b^aññāvimokkha^eb^nti aññindriyapariyosāne uppannaṃ vimokkhaṃ, aññāya vā vimokkhaṃ aññāvimokkhaṃ, paññāvimuttanti attho. ^b^avijjāya pabhedana^eb^nti avijjāya pabhedanante uppannattā, avijjāya pabhedanasaṅkhātaṃ vā nibbānaṃ ārabbha uppannattā evaṃladdhanāmaṃ arahattaphalameva. iti sabbehipi imehi pahānantiādīhi padehi arahattaphalameva pakāsitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^nidānānī^eb^ti kāraṇāni. ^b^kammāna^eb^nti vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ. ^b^lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā^eb^ti lubbhanapalubbhanasabhāvo lobho vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ paccayoti attho. ^b^doso^eb^ti dussanapadussanasabhāvo doso. ^b^moho^eb^ti muyhanapamuyhanasabhāvo moho.

[03] ^b^lobhapakata^eb^nti lobhena pakataṃ, lobhābhibhūtena luddhena hutvā katakammanti attho. lobhato jātanti ^b^lobhajaṃ^eb^. lobho nidānamassāti ^b^lobhanidānaṃ^eb^. lobho samudayo assāti ^b^lobhasamudayaṃ^eb^. samudayoti paccayo, lobhapaccayanti attho. ^b^yatthassa attabhāvo nibbattatī^eb^ti yasmiṃ ṭhāne assa lobhajakammavato ^a^P2.0210^ea^ puggalassa attabhāvo nibbattati, khandhā pātubhavanti. ^b^tattha taṃ kammaṃ vipaccatī^eb^ti tesu khandhesu taṃ kammaṃ vipaccati. ^b^diṭṭhe vā dhamme^eb^tiādi yasmā taṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā hoti upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā, tasmā taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. sesadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^akhaṇḍānī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0104^ea^ abhinnāni. ^b^apūtīnī^eb^ti pūtibhāvena abījattaṃ appattāni. ^b^avātātapahatānī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0105^ea^ na vātena na ca ātapena hatāni. ^b^sārādānī^eb^ti gahitasārāni sāravantāni na nissārāni. ^b^sukhasayitānī^eb^ti sannicayabhāvena sukhaṃ sayitāni. ^b^sukhette^eb^ti maṇḍakhette. ^b^suparikammakatāya bhūmiyā^eb^ti naṅgalakasanena ceva aṭṭhadantakena ca suṭṭhu parikammakatāya khettabhūmiyā. ^b^nikkhittānī^eb^ti ṭhapitāni ropitāni. ^b^anuppaveccheyyā^eb^ti anuppaveseyya. ^b^vuddhi^eb^ntiādīsu uddhaggamanena ^b^vuddhiṃ,^eb^ heṭṭhā mūlappatiṭṭhānena ^b^virūḷhiṃ,^eb^ samantā vitthārikabhāvena ^b^vepullaṃ^eb^.

[03] yaṃ panettha ^b^diṭṭhe vā dhamme^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, tattha asammohatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kammavibhatti nāma kathetabbā. suttantikapariyāyena hi ekādasa kammāni vibhattāni. seyyathidaṃ -- diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ, yaggarukaṃ yabbahulaṃ yadāsannaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ, janakaṃ upatthambhakaṃ upapīḷakaṃ upaghātakanti. tattha ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā ^b^diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ^eb^ nāma. taṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti ^a^P2.0211^ea^ kākavaḷiyapuṇṇaseṭṭhīnaṃ viya kusalaṃ, nandayakkhanandamāṇavakanandagoghātakakokāliyasuppabuddhadevadattaciñcamāṇavikānaṃ viya ca akusalaṃ. tathā asakkontaṃ pana ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti, avipākaṃ sampajjati. taṃ migaluddakopamāya sādhetabbaṃ. yathā hi migaluddakena migaṃ disvā dhanuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā khitto saro sace na virajjhati, taṃ migaṃ tattheva pāteti, atha naṃ migaluddako niccammaṃ katvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chetvā maṃsaṃ ādāya puttadāraṃ tosento gacchati. sace pana virajjhati, migo palāyitvā puna taṃ disaṃ na oloketi. evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. sarassa avirajjhitvā migavijjhanaṃ viya hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa kammassa vipākavārapaṭilābho, avijjhanaṃ viya avipākabhāvāya sampajjananti.

[03] atthasādhikā pana sattamajavanacetanā ^b^upapajjavedanīyakammaṃ^eb^ nāma. taṃ anantare attabhāve vipākaṃ deti. taṃ panetaṃ kusalapakkhe aṭṭhasamāpattivasena, akusalapakkhe pañcānantariyakammavasena veditabbaṃ. tattha aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ekāya samāpattiyā brahmaloke nibbattati. pañcannampi ānantariyānaṃ kattā ekena kammena niraye nibbattati, sesasamāpattiyo ^a^M2.0105^ea^ ca kammāni ca ahosikammabhāvaṃyeva āpajjanti, avipākāni honti. ayampi attho purimaupamāyayeva dīpetabbo.

[03] ubhinnaṃ ^a^V2.0106^ea^ antare pana pañcajavanacetanā ^b^aparapariyāyavedanīyakammaṃ^eb^ nāma. taṃ anāgate yadā okāsaṃ labhati, tadā vipākaṃ deti. sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti. taṃ sabbaṃ sunakhaluddakena dīpetabbaṃ. yathā hi sunakhaluddakena migaṃ disvā sunakho vissajjito migaṃ anubandhitvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne pāpuṇāti, tasmiṃ yeva ḍaṃsati; evamevaṃ ^a^P2.0212^ea^ idaṃ kammaṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhati, tasmiṃyeva vipākaṃ deti, tena mutto satto nāma natthi.

[03] kusalākusalesu pana garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ hoti, taṃ ^b^yaggarukaṃ^eb^ nāma. tadetaṃ kusalapakkhe mahaggatakammaṃ, akusalapakkhe pañcānantariyakammaṃ veditabbaṃ. tasmiṃ sati sesāni kusalāni vā akusalāni vā vipaccituṃ na sakkonti, tadeva duvidhampi paṭisandhiṃ deti. yathā hi sāsapappamāṇāpi sakkharā vā ayaguḷikā vā udakarahade pakkhittā udakapiṭṭhe uplavituṃ na sakkoti, heṭṭhāva pavisati; evameva kusalepi akusalepi yaṃ garukaṃ, tadeva gaṇhitvā gacchati.

[03] kusalākusalesu pana yaṃ bahulaṃ hoti, taṃ ^b^yabbahulaṃ^eb^ nāma. taṃ dīgharattaṃ laddhāsevanavasena veditabbaṃ. yaṃ vā balavakusalakammesu somanassakaraṃ, akusalakammesu santāpakaraṃ, etaṃ yabbahulaṃ nāma. tadetaṃ yathā nāma dvīsu mallesu yuddhabhūmiṃ otiṇṇesu yo balavā, so itaraṃ pātetvā gacchati; evameva itaraṃ dubbalakammaṃ avattharitvā yaṃ āsevanavasena vā bahulaṃ, āsannavasena vā balavaṃ, taṃ vipākaṃ deti, ^b^duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayarañño^eb^ kammaṃ viya.

[03] so kira cūḷaṅgaṇiyayuddhe parājito vaḷavaṃ āruyha palāyi. tassa cūḷupaṭṭhāko tissāmacco nāma ekakova pacchato ahosi. so ekaṃ aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinno jighacchāya bādhayamānāya -- ``bhātika tissa, ativiya no jighacchā bādhati, kiṃ karissāmā''ti āha ^a^M2.0106^ea^. atthi, deva, mayā sāṭakantare ṭhapetvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇasarakabhattaṃ ābhatanti. tena hi āharāti. so nīharitvā rañño purato ṭhapesi. rājā disvā, ``tāta, cattāro koṭṭhāse karohī''ti āha. mayaṃ tayo janā, kasmā devo cattāro koṭṭhāse kārayatīti? bhātika ^a^P2.0213^ea^ tissa, yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ attānaṃ sarāmi, na me ayyānaṃ adatvā āhāro paribhuttapubbo atthi, svāhaṃ ajjapi adatvā na paribhuñjissāmīti. so cattāro koṭṭhāse akāsi. rājā ``kālaṃ ghosehī''ti āha. chaḍḍitāraññe kuto, ayye, labhissāma devāti ^a^V2.0107^ea^. ``nāyaṃ tava bhāro. sace mama saddhā atthi, ayye, labhissāma, vissattho kālaṃ ghosehī''ti āha. so ``kālo, bhante, kālo, bhante''ti tikkhattuṃ ghosesi.

[03] athassa bodhimātumahātissatthero taṃ saddaṃ dibbāya sotadhātuyā sutvā `katthāyaṃ saddo'ti taṃ āvajjento ``ajja duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayamahārājā yuddhaparājito aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinno ekaṃ sarakabhattaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse kāretvā `ekakova na paribhuñjissāmī'ti kālaṃ ghosāpesī''ti ñatvā ``ajja mayā rañño saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti manogatiyā āgantvā rañño purato aṭṭhāsi. rājā disvā pasannacitto ``passa, bhātika, tissā''ti vatvā theraṃ vanditvā ``pattaṃ, bhante, dethā''ti āha. thero pattaṃ nīhari. rājā attano koṭṭhāsena saddhiṃ therassa koṭṭhāsaṃ patte pakkhipitvā, ``bhante, āhāraparissayo nāma mā kadāci hotū''ti vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. tissāmaccopi ``mama ayyaputte passante bhuñjituṃ na sakkhissāmī''ti attano koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva patte ākiri. vaḷavāpi cintesi -- ``mayhampi koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva dātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. rājā vaḷavaṃ oloketvā ``ayampi attano koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva patte pakkhipanaṃ paccāsīsatī''ti ñatvā tampi tattheva pakkhipitvā theraṃ vanditvā uyyojesi. thero taṃ bhattaṃ ādāya gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa ālopasaṅkhepena adāsi.

[03] rājāpi cintesi -- ``ativiyamhā jighacchitā, sādhu vatassa sace atirekabhattasitthāni ^a^P2.0214^ea^ pahiṇeyyā''ti. thero rañño cittaṃ ñatvā atirekabhattaṃ ^a^M2.0107^ea^ etesaṃ yāpanamattaṃ katvā pattaṃ ākāse khipi, patto āgantvā rañño hatthe patiṭṭhāsi. bhattaṃ tiṇṇampi janānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ ahosi. atha rājā pattaṃ dhovitvā ``tucchapattaṃ na pesissāmī''ti uttarisāṭakaṃ mocetvā udakaṃ puñchitvā sāṭakaṃ patte ṭhapetvā ``patto gantvā mama ayyassa hatthe patiṭṭhātū''ti ākāse khipi. patto gantvā therassa hatthe patiṭṭhāsi.

[03] aparabhāge rañño tathāgatassa sarīradhātūnaṃ aṭṭhamabhāgaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vīsaratanasatikaṃ mahācetiyaṃ kārentassa apariniṭṭhiteyeva cetiye kālakiriyāsamayo anuppatto. athassa mahācetiyassa dakkhiṇapasse nipannassa pañcanikāyavasena bhikkhusaṅghe sajjhāyaṃ karonte chahi devalokehi cha rathā āgantvā purato ākāse aṭṭhaṃsu. rājā ``puññapotthakaṃ āharathā''ti ādito paṭṭhāya puññapotthakaṃ vācāpesi. atha naṃ kiñci kammaṃ na paritosesi. so ``parato ^a^V2.0108^ea^ vācethā''ti āha. potthakavācako ``cūḷaṅgaṇiyayuddhe parājitena te deva aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinnena ekaṃ sarakabhattaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse kāretvā bodhimātumahātissattherassa bhikkhā dinnā''ti āha. rājā ``ṭhapehī''ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchi, ``bhante, kataro devaloko ramaṇīyo''ti? sabbabodhisattānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ tusitabhavanaṃ mahārājāti. rājā kālaṃ katvā tusitabhavanato āgataratheva patiṭṭhāya tusitabhavanaṃ agamāsi. idaṃ balavakammassa vipākadāne vatthu.

[03] yaṃ pana kusalākusalesu āsannamaraṇe anussarituṃ sakkoti, taṃ ^b^yadāsannaṃ^eb^ nāma. tadetaṃ yathā nāma gogaṇaparipuṇṇassa vajassa dvāre vivaṭe parabhāge dammagavabalavagavesu ^a^P2.0215^ea^ santesupi yo vajadvārassa āsanno hoti antamaso dubbalajaraggavopi, so eva paṭhamataraṃ nikkhamati, evameva aññesu kusalākusalesu santesupi maraṇakālassa āsannattā vipākaṃ deti.

[03] tatrimāni vatthūni -- madhuaṅgaṇagāme kira eko damiḷadovāriko pātova baḷisaṃ ādāya gantvā macche vadhitvā tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ^a^M2.0108^ea^ ekena taṇḍulaṃ gaṇhāti, ekena dadhiṃ, ekaṃ pacati. iminā nīhārena paññāsa vassāni pāṇātipātakammaṃ katvā aparabhāge mahallako anuṭṭhānaseyyaṃ upagacchati. tasmiṃ khaṇe girivihāravāsī cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissatthero ``mā ayaṃ satto mayi passante nassatū''ti gantvā tassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. athassa bhariyā, ``sāmi, thero āgato''ti ārocesi. ahaṃ paññāsa vassāni therassa santikaṃ na gatapubbo, katarena me guṇena thero āgamissati, gacchāti naṃ vadathāti. sā ``aticchatha, bhante''ti āha. thero ``upāsakassa kā sarīrappavattī''ti pucchi. dubbalo, bhanteti. thero gharaṃ pavisitvā satiṃ uppādetvā ``sīlaṃ gaṇhissasī''ti āha. āma, bhante, dethāti. thero tīṇi saraṇāni datvā pañca sīlāni dātuṃ ārabhi. tassa pañca sīlānīti vacanakāleyeva jivhā papati. thero ``vaṭṭissati ettaka''nti nikkhamitvā gato. sopi kālaṃ katvā cātumahārājikabhavane nibbatti. nibbattakkhaṇeyeva ca ``kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā mayā idaṃ laddha''nti āvajjento theraṃ nissāya laddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā devalokato āgantvā theraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. ``ko eso''ti ca vutte ``ahaṃ, bhante, damiḷadovāriko''ti āha. kuhiṃ nibbattosīti? cātumahārājikesu, bhante, sace me ayyo pañca sīlāni adassa, upari ^a^V2.0109^ea^ devaloke nibbatto assaṃ. ahaṃ kiṃ karissāmi, tvaṃ gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi, puttakāti. so theraṃ vanditvā devalokameva gato. idaṃ tāva kusalakamme vatthu.

[03] antaragaṅgāya ^a^P2.0216^ea^ pana mahāvācakālaupāsako nāma ahosi. so tiṃsa vassāni sotāpattimaggatthāya dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyitvā ``ahaṃ evaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyanto obhāsamattampi nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, buddhasāsanaṃ aniyyānikaṃ bhavissatī''ti diṭṭhivipallāsaṃ patvā kālakiriyaṃ katvā mahāgaṅgāya navausabhiko susumārapeto hutvā nibbatti. ekaṃ samayaṃ kacchakatitthena saṭṭhi pāsāṇatthambhasakaṭāni agamaṃsu. so sabbepi te goṇe ca pāsāṇe ca khādi. idaṃ akusalakamme vatthu.

[03] etehi ^a^M2.0109^ea^ pana tīhi muttaṃ aññāṇavasena kataṃ ^b^kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ^eb^ nāma. taṃ yathā nāma ummattakena khittadaṇḍaṃ yattha vā tattha vā gacchati, evameva tesaṃ abhāve yattha katthaci vipākaṃ deti.

[03] ^b^janakaṃ^eb^ nāma ekaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetvā pavattiṃ na janeti, pavatte aññaṃ kammaṃ vipākaṃ nibbatteti. yathā hi mātā janetiyeva, dhātiyeva pana jaggati; evamevaṃ mātā viya paṭisandhinibbattakaṃ janakakammaṃ, dhāti viya pavatte sampattakammaṃ. ^b^upatthambhakaṃ^eb^ nāma kusalepi labbhati akusalepi. ekacco hi kusalaṃ katvā sugatibhave nibbattati. so tattha ṭhito punappunaṃ kusalaṃ katvā taṃ kammaṃ upatthambhetvā anekāni vassasatasahassāni sugatibhavasmiṃyeva vicarati. ekacco akusalaṃ katvā duggatibhave nibbattati. so tattha ṭhito punappunaṃ akusalaṃ katvā taṃ kammaṃ upatthambhetvā bahūni vassasatasahassāni duggatibhavasmiṃyeva vicarati.

[03] aparo nayo -- ^b^janakaṃ^eb^ nāma kusalampi hoti akusalampi. taṃ paṭisandhiyampi pavattepi rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe janeti. ^b^upatthambhakaṃ^eb^ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti, aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti, addhānaṃ pavatteti. ^b^upapīḷakaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0217^ea^ nāma aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādheti, addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na deti. tatrāyaṃ nayo -- kusalakamme vipaccamāne akusalakammaṃ ^a^V2.0110^ea^ upapīḷakaṃ hutvā tassa vipaccituṃ na deti. akusalakamme vipaccamāne kusalakammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ hutvā tassa vipaccituṃ na deti. yathā vaḍḍhamānakaṃ rukkhaṃ vā gacchaṃ vā lataṃ vā kocideva daṇḍena vā satthena vā bhindeyya vā chindeyya vā, atha so rukkho vā gaccho vā latā vā vaḍḍhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya; evamevaṃ kusalaṃ vipaccamānaṃ akusalena upapīḷitaṃ, akusalaṃ vā pana vipaccamānaṃ kusalena upapīḷitaṃ vipaccituṃ na sakkoti. tattha sunakkhattassa akusalakammaṃ kusalaṃ upapīḷesi, coraghātakassa kusalakammaṃ akusalaṃ upapīḷesi.

[03] rājagahe kira vātakāḷako paññāsa vassāni coraghātakammaṃ akāsi. atha naṃ rañño ārocesuṃ -- ``deva, vātakāḷako mahallako core ghātetuṃ na sakkotī''ti. ``apanetha naṃ tasmā ^a^M2.0110^ea^ ṭhānantarāti. amaccā naṃ apanetvā aññaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapayiṃsu. vātakāḷakopi yāva taṃ kammaṃ akāsi, tāva ahatavatthāni vā acchādituṃ surabhipupphāni vā piḷandhituṃ pāyāsaṃ vā bhuñjituṃ ucchādananhāpanaṃ vā paccanubhotuṃ nālattha. so ``dīgharattaṃ me kiliṭṭhavesena carita''nti ``pāyāsaṃ me pacāhī''ti bhariyaṃ āṇāpetvā nhānīyasambhārāni gāhāpetvā nhānatitthaṃ gantvā sīsaṃ nhatvā ahatavatthāni acchādetvā gandhe vilimpitvā pupphāni piḷandhitvā gharaṃ āgacchanto sāriputtattheraṃ disvā ``saṃkiliṭṭhakammato camhi apagato, ayyo ca me diṭṭho''ti tuṭṭhamānaso theraṃ gharaṃ netvā navasappisakkaracuṇṇābhisaṅkhatena pāyāsena parivisi. thero tassa anumodanamakāsi. so anumodanaṃ sutvā anulomikakhantiṃ paṭilabhitvā ^a^P2.0218^ea^ theraṃ anugantvā nivattamāno antarāmagge taruṇavacchāya gāviyā madditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpito gantvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti. bhikkhū tathāgataṃ pucchiṃsu -- ``bhante, coraghātako ajjeva kiliṭṭhakammato apanīto, ajjeva kālaṅkato, kahaṃ nu kho nibbatto''ti? tāvatiṃsabhavane, bhikkhaveti. bhante, coraghātako dīgharattaṃ purise ghātesi, tumhe ca evaṃ vadetha, natthi nu kho pāpakammassa phalanti. mā, bhikkhave, evaṃ avacuttha, balavakalyāṇamittūpanissayaṃ labhitvā dhammasenāpatissa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā anumodanaṃ sutvā anulomikakhantiṃ paṭilabhitvā so tattha nibbattoti.
[21] ``subhāsitaṃ suṇitvāna, nāgariyo coraghātako.
[22] anulomakhantiṃ laddhāna, modatī tidivaṃ gato''ti..

[03] ^b^upaghātakaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0111^ea^ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti. evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccati. upacchedakantipi etasseva nāmaṃ. tatrāyaṃ nayo -- kusalakammassa vipaccanakāle ekaṃ akusalakammaṃ uṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ chinditvā pāteti. akusalakammassapi vipaccanakāle ekaṃ kusalakammaṃ uṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ chinditvā pāteti. idaṃ upacchedakaṃ nāma. tattha ajātasattuno kammaṃ kusalacchedakaṃ ^a^M2.0111^ea^ ahosi, aṅgulimālattherassa akusalacchedakanti. evaṃ suttantikapariyāyena ekādasa kammāni vibhattāni.

[03] abhidhammapariyāyena pana soḷasa kammāni vibhattāni, seyyathidaṃ -- ``atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti, atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni upadhisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti, atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni kālasampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti, atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni payogasampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti ^a^P2.0219^ea^. atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni gativipattiṃ āgamma vipaccanti, upadhivipattiṃ, kālavipattiṃ, payogavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccanti. atthekaccāni kalyāṇāni kammasamādānāni gativipattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti, upadhivipatti, kālavipatti, payogavipattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti. atthekaccāni kalyāṇāni kammasamādānāni gatisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccanti, upadhisampattiṃ, kālasampattiṃ, payogasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccantī''ti (vibha0 810).
