[03] tattha ^b^pāpakānī^eb^ti lāmakāni. ^b^kammasamādānānī^eb^ti kammaggahaṇāni. gahitasamādinnānaṃ kammānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantī^eb^tiādīsu aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanārahe kamme vijjamāneyeva sugatibhave nibbattassa taṃ kammaṃ ^b^gatisampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati^eb^ nāma. gatisampattiyā patibāhitaṃ hutvā na vipaccatīti attho. yo pana pāpakammena dāsiyā vā kammakāriyā vā kucchiyaṃ nibbattitvā upadhisampanno hoti, attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ tiṭṭhati. athassa sāmikā tassa rūpasampattiṃ disvā ``nāyaṃ kiliṭṭhakammassānucchaviko''ti cittaṃ uppādetvā attano jātaputtaṃ viya bhaṇḍāgārikādiṭṭhānesu ṭhapetvā sampattiṃ yojetvā pariharanti. evarūpassa kammaṃ ^b^upadhisampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo pana paṭhamakappikakālasadise sulabhasampannarasabhojane subhikkhakāle ^a^V2.0112^ea^ nibbattati, tassa vijjamānampi pāpakammaṃ ^b^kālasampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo pana sammāpayogaṃ nissāya jīvati, upasaṅkamitabbayuttakāle upasaṅkamati, paṭikkamitabbayuttakāle paṭikkamati, palāyitabbayuttakāle palāyati. lañjadānayuttakāle lañjaṃ deti, corikayuttakāle corikaṃ ^a^M2.0112^ea^ karoti, evarūpassa pāpakammaṃ ^b^payogasampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati^eb^ nāma.

[03] duggatibhave ^a^P2.0220^ea^ nibbattassa pana pāpakammaṃ ^b^gativipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo pana dāsiyā vā kammakāriyā vā kucchismiṃ nibbatto dubbaṇṇo hoti dussaṇṭhāno, ``yakkho nu kho manusso nu kho''ti vimatiṃ uppādeti. so sace puriso hoti, atha naṃ ``nāyaṃ aññassa kammassa anucchaviko''ti hatthiṃ vā rakkhāpenti assaṃ vā goṇe vā, tiṇakaṭṭhādīni vā āharāpenti, kheḷasarakaṃ vā gaṇhāpenti. sace itthī hoti, atha naṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ bhattamāsādīni vā pacāpenti, kacavaraṃ vā chaḍḍāpenti, aññaṃ vā pana jigucchanīyakammaṃ kārenti. evarūpassa pāpakammaṃ ^b^upadhivipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo pana dubbhikkhakāle vā parihīnasampattikāle vā antarakappe vā nibbattati, tassa pāpakammaṃ ^b^kālavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo pana payogaṃ sampādetuṃ na jānāti, upasaṅkamitabbayuttakāle upasaṅkamituṃ na jānāti...pe0... corikayuttakāle corikaṃ kātuṃ na jānāti, tassa pāpakammaṃ ^b^payogavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati^eb^ nāma.

[03] yo pana iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanārahe kamme vijjamāneyeva gantvā duggatibhave nibbattati, tassa taṃ kammaṃ ^b^gativipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo pana puññānubhāvena rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ gehe nibbattitvā kāṇo vā hoti kuṇī vā khañjo vā pakkhahato vā, tassa oparajjasenāpatibhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānādīni na anucchavikānīti na denti. iccassa taṃ puññaṃ ^b^upadhivipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo pana dubbhikkhakāle vā parihīnasampattikāle vā antarakappe vā manussesu nibbattati, tassa taṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ ^b^kālavipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva payogaṃ sampādetuṃ na jānāti, tassa kalyāṇakammaṃ ^b^payogavipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati^eb^ nāma.

[03] kalyāṇakammena pana sugatibhave nibbattassa taṃ kammaṃ ^b^gatisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati^eb^ nāma ^a^V2.0113^ea^. rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ ^a^P2.0221^ea^ kule nibbattitvā upadhisampattiṃ pattassa ^a^M2.0113^ea^ attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ ṭhitassa devanagare samussitaratanatoraṇasadisaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā ``imassa oparajjasenāpatibhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānādīni anucchavikānī''ti daharasseva sato tāni ṭhānantarāni denti, evarūpassa kalyāṇakammaṃ ^b^upadhisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo paṭhamakappikesu vā sulabhannapānakāle vā nibbattati, tassa kalyāṇakammaṃ ^b^kālasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati^eb^ nāma. yo vuttanayeneva payogaṃ sampādetuṃ jānāti, tassa kammaṃ ^b^payogasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati^eb^ nāma. evaṃ abhidhammapariyāyena soḷasa kammāni vibhattāni.

[03] aparānipi paṭisambhidāmaggapariyāyena dvādasa kammāni vibhattāni. seyyathidaṃ -- ``ahosi kammaṃ ahosi kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko, ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko, atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko, atthi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko, atthi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko, atthi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko, bhavissati kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko, bhavissati kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.234).

[03] tattha yaṃ kammaṃ atīte āyūhitaṃ atīteyeva vipākavāraṃ labhi, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janesi, rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ ^b^ahosi kammaṃ ahosi kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana vipākavāraṃ na labhi, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ nāsakkhi, taṃ ^b^ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana atīte āyūhitaṃ etarahi laddhavipākavāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetvā rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetvā ṭhitaṃ, taṃ ^b^ahosi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ aladdhavipākavāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ ^a^P2.0222^ea^ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ nāsakkhi, taṃ ^b^ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana atīte āyūhitaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati, taṃ ^b^ahosi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ na labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkhissati, taṃ ^b^ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] yaṃ ^a^V2.0114^ea^ ^a^M2.0114^ea^ pana etarahi āyūhitaṃ etarahiyeva vipākavāraṃ labhati, taṃ ^b^atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana etarahi vipākavāraṃ na labhati, taṃ ^b^atthi kammaṃ natthi kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana etarahi āyūhitaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati, taṃ ^b^atthi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana vipākavāraṃ na labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati, taṃ ^b^atthi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] yaṃ panānāgate āyūhissati, anāgateyeva vipākavāraṃ labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janessati, taṃ ^b^bhavissati kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana vipākavāraṃ na labhissati, paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkhissati, taṃ ^b^bhavissati kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipāko^eb^ti vuttaṃ. evaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapariyāyena dvādasa kammāni vibhattāni.

[03] iti imāni ceva dvādasa abhidhammapariyāyena vibhattāni ca soḷasa kammāni attano ṭhānā osakkitvā suttantikapariyāyena vuttāni ekādasa kammāniyeva bhavanti. tānipi tato osakkitvā tīṇiyeva kammāni honti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ, upapajjavedanīyaṃ ^a^P2.0223^ea^, aparapariyāyavedanīyanti. tesaṃ saṅkamanaṃ natthi, yathāṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhanti. yadi hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya, ``diṭṭhe vā dhamme''ti satthā na vadeyya. sacepi upapajjavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya, ``upapajja vā''ti satthā na vadeyya. athāpi aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya, ``apare vā pariyāye''ti satthā na vadeyya.

[03] sukkapakkhepi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. ettha pana ^b^lobhe vigate^eb^ti lobhe apagate niruddhe. ^b^tālavatthukata^eb^nti tālavatthu viya kataṃ, matthakacchinnatālo viya puna aviruḷhisabhāvaṃ katanti attho. ^b^anabhāvaṃ kata^eb^nti anuabhāvaṃ kataṃ, yathā puna nuppajjati, evaṃ katanti attho. ^b^evassū^eb^ti evaṃ bhaveyyuṃ. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha bījāni viya kusalākusalaṃ ^a^M2.0115^ea^ kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tāni agginā ḍahanapuriso viya yogāvacaro, aggi viya maggañāṇaṃ ^a^V2.0115^ea^, aggiṃ datvā bījānaṃ ḍahanakālo viya maggañāṇena kilesānaṃ daḍḍhakālo, masikatakālo viya pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ chinnamūlake katvā ṭhapitakālo, mahāvāte opunitvā nadiyā vā pavāhetvā appavattikatakālo viya upādinnakasantānassa nirodhena chinnamūlakānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvena nirujjhitvā puna bhavasmiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahitakālo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^mohajañcāpaviddasū^eb^ti mohajañcāpi aviddasu. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yaṃ so avidū andhabālo lobhajañca dosajañca mohajañcāti kammaṃ karoti, evaṃ karontena yaṃ tena pakataṃ kammaṃ appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ. ^b^idheva taṃ vedaniya^eb^nti ^a^P2.0224^ea^ taṃ kammaṃ tena bālena idha sake attabhāveyeva vedanīyaṃ, tasseva taṃ attabhāve vipaccatīti attho. ^b^vatthuṃ aññaṃ na vijjatī^eb^ti tassa kammassa vipaccanatthāya aññaṃ vatthu natthi. na hi aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññassa attabhāve vipaccati. ^b^tasmā lobhañca dosañca, mohajañcāpi viddasū^eb^ti tasmā yo vidū medhāvī paṇḍito taṃ lobhajādibhedaṃ kammaṃ na karoti, so ^b^vijjaṃ uppādayaṃ bhikkhu, sabbā duggatiyo jahe,^eb^ arahattamaggavijjaṃ uppādetvā taṃ vā pana vijjaṃ uppādento sabbā duggatiyo jahati. desanāsīsamevetaṃ, sugatiyopi pana so khīṇāsavo jahatiyeva. yampi cetaṃ ``tasmā lobhañca dosañcā''ti vuttaṃ, etthāpi lobhadosasīsena lobhajañca dosajañca kammameva niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ. evaṃ suttantesupi gāthāyapi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^āḷaviya^eb^nti āḷaviraṭṭhe. ^b^gomagge^eb^ti gunnaṃ gamanamagge. ^b^paṇṇasanthare^eb^ti sayaṃ patitapaṇṇasanthare. ^b^athā^eb^ti evaṃ gunnaṃ gamanamaggaṃ ujuṃ mahāpathaṃ nissāya siṃsapāvane sayaṃ patitapaṇṇāni saṅkaḍḍhitvā katasanthare sugatamahācīvaraṃ pattharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinne tathāgate. ^b^hatthako āḷavako^eb^ti hatthato hatthaṃ gatattā evaṃladdhanāmo āḷavako rājaputto. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti etaṃ ``kacci, bhante ^a^M2.0116^ea^, bhagavā''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. kasmā pana sammāsambuddho taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā nisinno, kasmā rājakumāro tattha gatoti? sammāsambuddho tāva aṭṭhuppattikāya dhammadesanāya samuṭṭhānaṃ disvā tattha nisinno, rājakumāropi pātova uṭṭhāya pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto ^a^P2.0225^ea^ mahāmaggā okkamma gopathaṃ gahetvā ``buddhānaṃ ^a^V2.0116^ea^ pūjanatthāya missakamālaṃ ocinissāmī''ti gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, evaṃ so tattha gatoti. ^b^sukhamasayitthā^eb^ti sukhaṃ sayittha.

[03] ^b^antaraṭṭhako^eb^ti māghaphagguṇānaṃ antare aṭṭhadivasaparimāṇo kālo. māghassa hi avasāne cattāro divasā, phagguṇassa ādimhi cattāroti ayaṃ ``antaraṭṭhako''ti vuccati. ^b^himapātasamayo^eb^ti himassa patanasamayo. ^b^kharā^eb^ti pharusā kakkhaḷā vā. ^b^gokaṇṭakahatā^eb^ti navavuṭṭhe deve gāvīnaṃ akkantakkantaṭṭhāne khurantarehi kaddamo uggantvā tiṭṭhati, so vātātapena sukkho kakacadantasadiso hoti dukkhasamphasso. taṃ sandhāyāha -- ``gokaṇṭakahatā bhūmī''ti. gunnaṃ khurantarehi chinnātipi attho. ^b^verambho vāto vāyatī^eb^ti catūhi disāhi vāyanto vāto vāyati. ekāya disāya vā dvīhi vā disāhi tīhi vā disāhi vāyanto vāto verambhoti na vuccati.

[03] ^b^tena hi rājakumārā^eb^ti idaṃ satthā ``ayaṃ rājakumāro lokasmiṃ neva sukhavāsino, na dukkhavāsino jānāti, jānāpessāmi na''nti upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento āha. tattha ^b^yathā te khameyyā^eb^ti yathā tuyhaṃ rucceyya. ^b^idhassā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke assa. ^b^gonakatthato^eb^ti caturaṅgulādhikalomena kāḷakojavena atthato. ^b^paṭikatthato^eb^ti uṇṇāmayena setattharaṇena atthato. ^b^paṭalikatthato^eb^ti ghanapupphena uṇṇāmayāttharaṇena atthato. ^b^kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0226^ea^ kadalimigacammamayena uttamapaccattharaṇena atthato. taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ attharitvā sibbitvā karonti. ^b^sauttaracchado^eb^ti saha uttaracchadena, upari baddhena rattavitānena saddhinti attho. ^b^ubhatolohitakūpadhāno^eb^ti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti pallaṅkassa ubhato ṭhapitalohitakūpadhāno. ^b^pajāpatiyo^eb^ti bhariyāyo. ^b^manāpena^eb^ ^a^M2.0117^ea^ ^b^paccupaṭṭhitā assū^eb^ti manāpena upaṭṭhānavidhānena paccupaṭṭhitā bhaveyyuṃ.

[03] ^b^kāyikā^eb^ti pañcadvārakāyaṃ khobhayamānā. ^b^cetasikā^eb^ti manodvāraṃ khobhayamānā. ^b^so rāgo tathāgatassa pahīno^eb^ti tathārūpo rāgo tathāgatassa pahīnoti attho. yo pana tassa rāgo, na so tathāgatassa pahīno nāma. ^b^dosamohesu^eb^pi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ti bāhitapāpo khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo. ^b^parinibbuto^eb^ti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto ^a^V2.0117^ea^. ^b^na limpati kāmesū^eb^ti vatthukāmesu ca kilesakāmesu ca taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi na limpati. ^b^sītibhūto^eb^ti abbhantare tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvena sītibhūto. ^b^nirūpadhī^eb^ti kilesūpadhīnaṃ abhāvena nirūpadhi. ^b^sabbā āsattiyo chetvā^eb^ti āsattiyo vuccanti taṇhāyo, tā sabbāpi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu āsattavisattā āsattiyo chinditvā. ^b^vineyya hadaye dara^eb^nti hadayanissitaṃ darathaṃ vinayitvā vūpasametvā. ^b^santiṃ pappuyya cetaso^eb^ti cittassa kilesanibbānaṃ pāpuṇitvā. karaṇavacanaṃ vā etaṃ ``sabbacetaso samannāharitvā''tiādīsu viya, cetasā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇitvāti attho.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^P2.0227^ea^ ^b^devadūtānī^eb^ti devadūtā. ayaṃ panettha vacanattho -- devoti maccu, tassa dūtāti ^b^devadūtā^eb^. jiṇṇabyādhimatā hi saṃvegajananaṭṭhena ``idāni te maccusamīpaṃ gantabba''nti codenti viya, tasmā devadūtāti vuccanti. devā viya dūtātipi ^b^devadūtā^eb^. yathā hi alaṅkatapaṭiyattāya devatāya ākāse ṭhatvā ``tvaṃ asukadivase marissasī''ti vutte tassā vacanaṃ saddhātabbaṃ hoti; evamevaṃ jiṇṇabyādhimatāpi dissamānā ``tvampi evaṃdhammo''ti codenti viya, tesañca taṃ vacanaṃ anaññathābhāvitāya devatāya byākaraṇasadisameva hotīti devā viya dūtāti devadūtā. visuddhidevānaṃ dūtātipi ^b^devadūtā^eb^. sabbabodhisattā hi jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite disvāva saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā nikkhamma pabbajiṃsu. evaṃ visuddhidevānaṃ dūtātipi devadūtā. idha pana liṅgavipallāsena ``devadūtānī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^kāyena^eb^ ^a^M2.0118^ea^ ^b^duccarita^eb^ntiādi kasmā āraddhaṃ? devadūtānuyuñjanaṭṭhānupakkamakammadassanatthaṃ. iminā hi kammena ayaṃ satto niraye nibbattati, atha naṃ tattha yamo rājā devadūte samanuyuñjati. tattha ^b^kāyena duccaritaṃ caratī^eb^ti kāyadvārena tividhaṃ duccaritaṃ carati. ^b^vācāyā^eb^ti vacīdvārena catubbidhaṃ duccaritaṃ carati. ^b^manasā^eb^ti manodvārena tividhaṃ duccaritaṃ carati.

[03] ^b^tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā^eb^ti ettha ekacce therā ``nirayapālā nāma natthi, yantarūpaṃ viya kammameva kāraṇaṃ kāretī''ti vadanti. taṃ ``atthi niraye nirayapālāti, āmantā. atthi ^a^V2.0118^ea^ ca kāraṇikā''tiādinā nayena abhidhamme (kathā0 866) paṭisedhitameva. yathā hi manussaloke kammakāraṇakārakā atthi, evameva niraye nirayapālā atthīti. ^b^yamassa^eb^ ^a^P2.0228^ea^ ^b^rañño^eb^ti yamarājā nāma vemānikapetarājā. ekasmiṃ kāle dibbavimāne dibbakapparukkhadibbauyyānadibbanāṭakādisabbasampattiṃ anubhavati, ekasmiṃ kāle kammavipākaṃ, dhammiko rājā, na cesa ekova hoti, catūsu pana dvāresu cattāro janā honti. ^b^amatteyyo^eb^ti mātu hito matteyyo, mātari sammā paṭipannoti attho. na matteyyoti amatteyyo, mātari micchā paṭipannoti attho. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^abrahmañño^eb^ti ettha ca khīṇāsavā brāhmaṇā nāma, tesu micchā paṭipanno abrahmañño nāma.

[03] ^b^samanuyuñjatī^eb^ti anuyogavattaṃ āropento pucchati, laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpento pana ^b^samanuggāhati^eb^ nāma, kāraṇaṃ pucchanto ^b^samanubhāsati^eb^ nāma. ^b^nāddasa^eb^nti attano santike pahitassa kassaci devadūtassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vadati.

[03] atha naṃ yamo ``nāyaṃ bhāsitassa atthaṃ sallakkhetī''ti ñatvā atthaṃ sallakkhāpetukāmo ^b^ambho^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^jiṇṇa^eb^nti jarājiṇṇaṃ. ^b^gopānasivaṅka^eb^nti gopānasī viya vaṅkaṃ. ^b^bhogga^eb^nti bhaggaṃ. imināpissa vaṅkabhāvameva dīpeti. ^b^daṇḍaparāyaṇa^eb^nti daṇḍapaṭisaraṇaṃ daṇḍadutiyaṃ. ^b^pavedhamāna^eb^nti kampamānaṃ. ^b^ātura^eb^nti jarāturaṃ. ^b^khaṇḍadanta^eb^nti jarānubhāvena khaṇḍitadantaṃ. ^b^palitakesa^eb^nti paṇḍarakesaṃ. ^b^vilūna^eb^nti luñcitvā gahitakesaṃ viya ^a^M2.0119^ea^ khallāṭaṃ. ^b^khalitasira^eb^nti mahākhallāṭasīsaṃ. ^b^valita^eb^nti sañjātavaliṃ. ^b^tilakāhatagatta^eb^nti ^a^P2.0229^ea^ setatilakakāḷatilakehi vikiṇṇasarīraṃ. ^b^jarādhammo^eb^ti jarāsabhāvo, aparimutto jarāya, jarā nāma mayhaṃ abbhantareyeva pavattatīti. parato ^b^byādhidhammo maraṇadhammo^eb^ti padadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvā^eb^ti ettha jarājiṇṇasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma -- ``passatha, bho, ahampi tumhe viya taruṇo ahosiṃ ūrubalī bāhubalī javasampanno, tassa me tā balajavasampattiyo antarahitā, vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti, jarāyamhi aparimuttatāya ediso jāto. na kho panāhameva, tumhepi jarāya aparimuttāva. yatheva hi mayhaṃ, evaṃ tumhākampi jarā āgamissati. iti tassā pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā''ti ^a^V2.0119^ea^. tenevesa devadūto nāma jāto. ^b^ābādhika^eb^nti bādhikaṃ. ^b^dukkhita^eb^nti dukkhappattaṃ. ^b^bāḷhagilāna^eb^nti adhimattagilānaṃ.

[03] ^b^dutiyaṃ devadūta^eb^nti etthapi gilānasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma -- ``passatha, bho, ahampi tumhe viya nirogo ahosiṃ, somhi etarahi byādhinā abhihato, sake muttakarīse palipanno, uṭṭhātumpi na sakkomi. vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti, byādhitomhi aparimuttatāya ediso jāto. na kho panāhameva, tumhepi byādhito aparimuttāva. yatheva hi mayhaṃ, evaṃ tumhākampi byādhi āgamissati. iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā''ti. tenevesa devadūto nāma jāto.

[03] ^b^ekāhamata^eb^ntiādīsu ekāhaṃ matassa assāti ekāhamato, taṃ ekāhamataṃ. parato ^a^P2.0230^ea^ padadvayepi eseva nayo. bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathākkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā ^b^uddhumātakaṃ^eb^. vinīlo vuccati viparibhinnavaṇṇo, vinīlova vinīlako, taṃ ^b^vinīlakaṃ^eb^. paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vinīlanti vinīlakaṃ. ^b^vipubbaka^eb^nti vissandamānapubbakaṃ, paribhinnaṭṭhāne hi paggharitena pubbena palimakkhitanti attho.

[03] ^b^tatiyaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0120^ea^ ^b^devadūta^eb^nti ettha matakasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma -- ``passatha, bho, maṃ āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ uddhumātakādibhāvappattaṃ, maraṇatomhi aparimuttatāya ediso jāto. na kho panāhameva, tumhepi maraṇato aparimuttā. yatheva hi mayhaṃ, evaṃ tumhākampi maraṇaṃ āgamissati. iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā''ti. tenevassa devadūto nāma jāto.

[03] imaṃ pana devadūtānuyogaṃ ko labhati, ko na labhati? yena tāva bahuṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ, so gantvā niraye nibbattatiyeva. yena pana parittaṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ, so labhati. yathā hi sabhaṇḍaṃ coraṃ gahetvā kattabbameva karonti na vinicchinanti. anuvijjitvā gahitaṃ pana vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ nayanti, so vinicchayaṃ labhati. evaṃsampadametaṃ. parittapāpakammā hi attano dhammatāyapi saranti, sārīyamānāpi saranti.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0120^ea^ ^b^dīghajayantadamiḷo^eb^ nāma attano dhammatāya sari. so kira damiḷo sumanagirimahāvihāre ākāsacetiyaṃ rattapaṭena pūjesi, atha niraye ussadasāmante nibbatto aggijālasaddaṃ sutvāva attanā pūjitapaṭaṃ anussari, so gantvā sagge nibbatto. aparopi puttassa daharabhikkhuno khalisāṭakaṃ dento pādamūle ṭhapesi, maraṇakālamhi paṭapaṭāti sadde nimittaṃ gaṇhi ^a^P2.0231^ea^, sopi ussadasāmante nibbatto jālasaddena taṃ sāṭakaṃ anussaritvā sagge nibbatto. evaṃ tāva attano dhammatāya kusalaṃ kammaṃ saritvā sagge nibbattatīti.

[03] attano dhammatāya asarante pana tayo devadūte pucchati. tattha koci paṭhamena devadūtena sarati, koci dutiyatatiyehi, koci tīhipi nassarati. taṃ yamo rājā disvā sayaṃ sāreti. eko kira amacco sumanapupphakumbhena mahācetiyaṃ pūjetvā yamassa pattiṃ adāsi, taṃ akusalakammena niraye nibbattaṃ yamassa santikaṃ nayiṃsu. tasmiṃ tīhipi devadūtehi kusalaṃ asarante yamo sayaṃ olokento disvā -- ``nanu tvaṃ mahācetiyaṃ sumanapupphakumbhena pūjetvā mayhaṃ pattiṃ adāsī''ti sāresi, so tasmiṃ kāle saritvā devalokaṃ gato ^a^M2.0121^ea^. yamo pana sayaṃ oloketvāpi apassanto -- ``mahādukkhaṃ nāma anubhavissati ayaṃ satto''ti tuṇhī ahosi.

[03] ^b^tattaṃ ayokhila^eb^nti tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ sampajjalitāya lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā dakkhiṇahatthe tālappamāṇaṃ ayasūlaṃ pavesenti, tathā vāmahatthādīsu. yathā ca taṃ uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā, evaṃ urenapi vāmapassenapi dakkhiṇapassenapi nipajjāpetvā te taṃ kammakāraṇaṃ karontiyeva. ^b^saṃvesetvā^eb^ti jalitāya lohapathaviyā tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ nipajjāpetvā. ^b^kuṭhārīhī^eb^ti mahatīhi gehassa ekapakkhacchadanamattāhi kuṭhārīhi tacchanti, lohitaṃ nadī hutvā sandati, lohapathavito jālā uṭṭhahitvā tacchitaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti, mahādukkhaṃ uppajjati. tacchantā pana suttāhataṃ karitvā dāruṃ viya aṭṭhaṃsampi chaḷaṃsampi karonti. ^b^vāsīhī^eb^ti mahāsuppappamāṇāhi vāsīhi. ^b^rathe yojetvā^eb^ti saddhiṃ yugayottapakkharathacakkakubbarapājanehi sabbato pajjalite rathe yojetvā. ^b^mahanta^eb^nti ^a^P2.0232^ea^ mahākūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ. ^b^āropentī^eb^ti sampajjalitehi ayamuggarehi pothentā āropenti. ^b^sakimpi uddha^eb^nti supakkuthitāya ukkhaliyā pakkhittataṇḍulā viya uddhamadhotiriyañca gacchati. ^b^mahāniraye^eb^ti avīcimahānirayamhi.

[03] ^b^bhāgaso^eb^ ^a^V2.0121^ea^ ^b^mito^eb^ti bhāge ṭhapetvā vibhatto. ^b^pariyanto^eb^ti parikkhitto. ^b^ayasā^eb^ti upari ayapaṭṭena chādito. ^b^samantā yojanasataṃ, pharitvā tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti evaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati, yathā taṃ samantā yojanasate ṭhatvā olokentassa akkhīni yamakagoḷakā viya nikkhamanti.

[03] ^b^hīnakāyūpagā^eb^ti hīnaṃ kāyaṃ upagatā hutvā. ^b^upādāne^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhiggahaṇe. ^b^jātimaraṇasambhave^eb^ti jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca kāraṇabhūte. ^b^anupādā^eb^ti catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā. ^b^jātimaraṇasaṅkhaye^eb^ti jātimaraṇasaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne vimuccanti. ^b^diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sabbakilesanibbānena nibbutā. ^b^sabbadukkhaṃ upaccagu^eb^nti sakalavaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkantā.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M2.0122^ea^ ^b^amaccā pārisajjā^eb^ti paricārikadevatā. ^b^imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicarantī^eb^ti aṭṭhamīdivase kira sakko devarājā cattāro mahārājāno āṇāpeti -- ``tātā, ajja aṭṭhamīdivase manussalokaṃ anuvicaritvā puññāni karontānaṃ nāmagottaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgacchathā''ti. te gantvā attano paricārake pesenti -- ``gacchatha, tātā, manussalokaṃ vicaritvā puññakārakānaṃ nāmagottāni suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhitvā ānethā''ti. te tathā karonti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicarantī''ti. ^b^kacci^eb^ ^a^P2.0233^ea^ ^b^bahū^eb^tiādi tesaṃ upaparikkhākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. evaṃ upaparikkhantā hi te anuvicaranti. tattha ^b^uposathaṃ upavasantī^eb^ti māsassa aṭṭhavāre uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhahanti. ^b^paṭijāgarontī^eb^ti paṭijāgarauposathakammaṃ nāma karonti. taṃ karontā ekasmiṃ addhamāse catunnaṃ uposathadivasānaṃ paccuggamanānuggamanavasena karonti. pañcamīuposathaṃ paccuggacchantā catutthiyaṃ uposathikā honti, anugacchantā chaṭṭhiyaṃ. aṭṭhamīuposathaṃ paccuggacchantā sattamiyaṃ, anugacchantā navamiyaṃ. cātuddasiṃ paccuggacchantā terasiyaṃ, pannarasīuposathaṃ anugacchantā pāṭipade uposathikā honti. ^b^puññāni karontī^eb^ti saraṇagamananiccasīlapupphapūjādhammassavanapadīpasahassāaropanavihārakaraṇādīni nānappakārāni puññāni karonti. te evaṃ anuvicaritvā puññakammakārakānaṃ nāmagottāni sovaṇṇamaye paṭṭe likhitvā āharitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ denti. ^b^puttā imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicarantī^eb^ti catūhi mahārājehi ^a^V2.0122^ea^ purimanayeneva pahitattā anuvicaranti. ^b^tadahū^eb^ti taṃdivasaṃ. ^b^uposathe^eb^ti uposathadivase.

[03] ^b^sace, bhikkhave, appakā hontī^eb^ti catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ amaccā pārisajjā tā tā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo upasaṅkamanti, tato taṃ upanissāya adhivatthā devatā ``mahārājānaṃ amaccā āgatā''ti paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gacchanti. te paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā ``kacci nu kho mārisā bahū manussā matteyyā''ti vuttanayena manussānaṃ puññapaṭipattiṃ pucchitvā ``āma, mārisa, imasmiṃ gāme asuko ca asuko ca puññāni karontī''ti vutte tesaṃ nāmagottaṃ likhitvā aññattha ^a^M2.0123^ea^ gacchanti. atha cātuddasiyaṃ catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ puttāpi tameva suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ gahetvā teneva nayena anuvicarantā nāmagottāni likhanti. tadahuposathe ^a^P2.0234^ea^ pannarase cattāropi mahārājāno teneva nayena tasmiṃyeva suvaṇṇapaṭṭe nāmagottāni likhanti. te suvaṇṇapaṭṭaparimāṇeneva -- ``imasmiṃ kāle manussā appakā, imasmiṃ kāle bahukā''ti jānanti. taṃ sandhāya ``sace, bhikkhave, appakā honti manussā''tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^devānaṃ tāvatiṃsāna^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ abhinibbatte tettiṃsa devaputte upādāya evaṃladdhanāmānaṃ. tesaṃ pana uppattikathā dīghanikāye sakkapañhasuttavaṇṇanāya vitthāritā. ^b^tenā^eb^ti tena ārocanena, tena vā puññakārakānaṃ appakabhāvena. ^b^dibbā vata, bho, kāyā parihāyissantī^eb^ti navanavānaṃ devaputtānaṃ apātubhāvena devakāyā parihāyissanti, ramaṇīyaṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ devanagaraṃ suññaṃ bhavissati. ^b^paripūrissanti asurakāyā^eb^ti cattāro apāyā paripūrissanti. iminā ``mayaṃ paripuṇṇe devanagare devasaṅghamajjhe nakkhattaṃ kīḷituṃ na labhissāmā''ti anattamanā honti. sukkapakkhepi imināva upāyena attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo^eb^ti attano sakkadevarājakālaṃ sandhāya katheti. ekassa vā sakkassa ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathetīti vuttaṃ. ^b^anunayamāno^eb^ti anubodhayamāno. ^b^tāyaṃ velāya^eb^nti tasmiṃ kāle.

[03] ^b^pāṭihāriyapakkhañcā^eb^ti ettha pāṭihāriyapakkho nāma antovasse temāsaṃ nibaddhuposatho, taṃ asakkontassa dvinnaṃ pavāraṇānaṃ antare ekamāsaṃ nibaddhuposatho, tampi asakkontassa paṭhamapavāraṇato paṭṭhāya eko addhamāso pāṭihāriyapakkhoyeva nāma. ^b^aṭṭhaṅgasusamāgata^eb^nti aṭṭhahi ^a^V2.0123^ea^ guṇaṅgehi samannāgataṃ. ^b^yopissa^eb^ ^a^P2.0235^ea^ ^b^mādiso naro^eb^ti yopi satto mādiso bhaveyya. sakkopi kira vuttappakārassa uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānitvā dve devalokasampattiyo pahāya māsassa aṭṭha vāre uposathaṃ upavasati. tasmā evamāha. aparo nayo -- ^b^yopissa mādiso naro^eb^ti yopi satto mādiso assa, mayā pattaṃ ^a^M2.0124^ea^ sampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyyāti attho. sakkā hi evarūpena uposathakammena sakkasampattiṃ pāpuṇitunti ayamettha adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^vusitavā^eb^ti vutthavāso. ^b^katakaraṇīyo^eb^ti catūhi maggehi kattabbakiccaṃ katvā ṭhito. ^b^ohitabhāro^eb^ti khandhabhārakilesabhārābhisaṅkhārabhāre otāretvā ṭhito. ^b^anuppattasadattho^eb^ti sadattho vuccati arahattaṃ, taṃ anuppatto. ^b^parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano^eb^ti yena saṃyojanena baddho bhavesu ākaḍḍhīyati, tassa khīṇattā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano. ^b^sammadaññā vimutto^eb^ti hetunā nayena kāraṇena jānitvā vimutto. ^b^kallaṃ vacanāyā^eb^ti yuttaṃ vattuṃ.

[03] ^b^yopissa mādiso naro^eb^ti yopi mādiso khīṇāsavo assa, sopi evarūpaṃ uposathaṃ upavaseyyāti uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānanto evaṃ vadeyya. aparo nayo ^b^yopissa mādiso naro^eb^ti yopi satto mādiso assa, mayā pattaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyyāti attho. sakkā hi evarūpena uposathakammena khīṇāsavasampattiṃ pāpuṇitunti ayamettha adhippāyo. aṭṭhamaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^sukhumālo^eb^ti niddukkho. ^b^paramasukhumālo^eb^ti paramaniddukkho. ^b^accantasukhumālo^eb^ti satataniddukkho. imaṃ ^a^P2.0236^ea^ bhagavā kapilapure nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya niddukkhabhāvaṃ gahetvā āha, cariyakāle pana tena anubhūtadukkhassa anto natthīti. ^b^ekatthā^eb^ti ekissā pokkharaṇiyā. ^b^uppalaṃ vappatī^eb^ti uppalaṃ ropeti. sā nīluppalavanasañchannā hoti. ^b^paduma^eb^nti paṇḍarapadumaṃ. ^b^puṇḍarīka^eb^nti rattapadumaṃ. evaṃ itarāpi dve padumapuṇḍarīkavanehi sañchannā honti. bodhisattassa kira sattaṭṭhavassikakāle rājā amacce pucchi -- ``taruṇadārakā katarakīḷikaṃ piyāyantī''ti? udakakīḷikaṃ devāti. tato rājā kuddālakammakārake sannipātetvā pokkharaṇiṭṭhānāni gaṇhāpesi. atha sakko devarājā āvajjento taṃ pavattiṃ ^a^V2.0124^ea^ ñatvā -- ``na yutto mahāsattassa mānusakaparibhogo, dibbaparibhogo yutto''ti vissakammaṃ āmantetvā -- ``gaccha, tāta, mahāsattassa kīḷābhūmiyaṃ pokkharaṇiyo māpehī''ti āha. kīdisā hontu ^a^M2.0125^ea^, devāti? apagatakalalakaddamā hontu vippakiṇṇamaṇimuttapavāḷikā sattaratanamayapākāraparikkhittā pavāḷamayauṇhīsehi maṇimayasopānabāhukehi suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayaphalakehi sopānehi samannāgatā. suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamayā cettha nāvā hontu, suvaṇṇanāvāya rajatapallaṅko hotu, rajatanāvāya suvaṇṇapallaṅko, maṇināvāya pavāḷapallaṅko, pavāḷanāvāya maṇipallaṅko, suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamayāva udakasecananāḷikā hontu, pañcavaṇṇehi ca padumehi sañchannā hontūti. ``sādhu, devā''ti vissakammadevaputto sakkassa paṭissutvā rattibhāge otaritvā rañño gāhāpitapokkharaṇiṭṭhānesuyeva teneva niyāmena pokkharaṇiyo māpesi.

[03] nanu cetā ^a^P2.0237^ea^ apagatakalalakaddamā, kathamettha padumāni pupphiṃsūti? so kira tāsu pokkharaṇīsu tattha tattha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamayā khuddakanāvāyo māpetvā ``etā kalalakaddamapūritā ca hontu, pañcavaṇṇāni cettha padumāni pupphantū''ti adhiṭṭhāsi. evaṃ pañcavaṇṇāni padumāni pupphiṃsu, reṇuvaṭṭiyo uggantvā udakapiṭṭhaṃ ajjhottharitvā vicaranti. pañcavidhā bhamaragaṇā upakūjantā vicaranti. evaṃ tā māpetvā vissakammo devapurameva gato. tato vibhātāya rattiyā mahājano disvā ``mahāpurissassa māpitā bhavissantī''ti gantvā rañño ārocesi. rājā mahājanaparivāro gantvā pokkharaṇiyo disvā ``mama puttassa puññiddhiyā devatāhi māpitā bhavissantī''ti attamano ahosi. tato paṭṭhāya mahāpuriso udakakīḷikaṃ agamāsi.

[03] ^b^yāvadeva mamatthāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^yāvadevā^eb^ti payojanāvadhiniyāmavacanaṃ, yāva mameva atthāya, natthettha aññaṃ kāraṇanti attho. ^b^na kho panassāha^eb^nti na kho panassa ahaṃ. ^b^akāsikaṃ candana^eb^nti asaṇhaṃ candanaṃ. ^b^kāsikaṃ, bhikkhave, su me taṃ veṭhana^eb^nti, bhikkhave, veṭhanampi me kāsikaṃ hoti. ettha hi ^b^su^eb^iti ca ^b^ta^eb^nti ca nipātamattaṃ, ^b^me^eb^ti sāmivacanaṃ. veṭhanampi me saṇhameva hotīti dasseti. ^b^kāsikā kañcukā^eb^ti pārupanakañcukopi saṇhakañcukova. ^b^setacchattaṃ dhārīyatī^eb^ti mānusakasetacchattampi dibbasetacchattampi uparidhāritameva hoti. ^b^mā naṃ phusi sītaṃ vā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0126^ea^ mā etaṃ bodhisattaṃ sītaṃ vā uṇhādīsu vā aññataraṃ phusatūti attho.

[03] ^b^tayo^eb^ ^a^V2.0125^ea^ ^b^pāsādā ahesu^eb^nti bodhisatte kira soḷasavassuddesike jāte ^a^P2.0238^ea^ suddhodanamahārājā ``puttassa vasanakapāsāde kāressāmī''ti vaḍḍhakino sannipātāpetvā bhaddakena nakkhattamuhuttena navabhūmikataparikammaṃ kāretvā tayo pāsāde kārāpesi. te sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^hemantiko^eb^tiādīsu yattha sukhaṃ hemante vasituṃ, ayaṃ hemantiko. itaresupi eseva nayo. ayaṃ panettha vacanattho -- hemante vāso hemantaṃ, hemantaṃ arahatīti hemantiko. itaresupi eseva nayo.

[03] tattha ^b^hemantiko^eb^ pāsādo navabhūmako ahosi, bhūmiyo panassa uṇhautuggāhāpanatthāya nīcā ahesuṃ. tattha dvāravātapānāni suphusitakavāṭāni ahesuṃ nibbivarāni. cittakammampi karontā tattha tattha pajjalite aggikkhandheyeva akaṃsu. bhūmattharaṇaṃ panettha kambalamayaṃ, tathā sāṇivitānanivāsanapārupanaveṭhanāni. vātapānāni uṇhaggāhāpanatthaṃ divā vivaṭāni rattiṃ pihitāni honti.

[03] ^b^gimhiko^eb^ pana pañcabhūmako ahosi. sītautuggāhāpanatthaṃ panettha bhūmiyo uccā asambādhā ahesuṃ. dvāravātapānāni nātiphusitāni savivarāni sajālāni ahesuṃ. cittakamme uppalāni padumāni puṇḍarīkāniyeva akaṃsu. bhūmattharaṇaṃ panettha dukūlamayaṃ, tathā sāṇivitānanivāsanapārupanaveṭhanāni. vātapānasamīpesu cettha nava cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti. tesu tesu padesesu udakayantāni karonti, yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti. antopāsāde tattha tattha kalalapūrā doṇiyo ṭhapetvā pañcavaṇṇāni padumāni ropayiṃsu. pāsādamatthake sukkhamahiṃsacammaṃ bandhitvā yantaṃ parivattetvā yāva chadanapiṭṭhiyā pāsāṇe āropetvā tasmiṃ vissajjenti. tesaṃ camme pavaṭṭantānaṃ saddo meghagajjitaṃ viya hoti. dvāravātapānāni ^a^P2.0239^ea^ panettha divā pihitāni honti rattiṃ vivaṭāni.

[03] ^b^vassiko^eb^ ^a^M2.0127^ea^ sattabhūmako ahosi. bhūmiyo panettha dvinnampi utūnaṃ gāhāpanatthāya nātiuccā nātinīcā akaṃsu. ekaccāni dvāravātapānāni suphusitāni, ekaccāni savivarāni. tattha cittakammampi kesuci ṭhānesu pajjalitāggikkhandhavasena, kesuci jātassaravasena kataṃ. bhūmattharaṇādīni panettha kambaladukūlavasena ubhayamissakāni. ekacce dvāravātapānā ^a^V2.0126^ea^ rattiṃ vivaṭā divā pihitā, ekacce divā vivaṭā rattiṃ pihitā. tayopi pāsādā ubbedhena samappamāṇā. bhūmikāsu pana nānattaṃ ahosi.

[03] evaṃ niṭṭhitesu pāsādesu rājā cintesi -- ``putto me vayappatto, chattamassa ussāpetvā rajjasiriṃ passissāmī''ti. so sākiyānaṃ paṇṇāni pahiṇi -- ``putto me vayappatto, rajje naṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmi, sabbe attano attano gehesu vayappattā, dārikā imaṃ gehaṃ pesentū''ti. te sāsanaṃ sutvā -- ``kumāro kevalaṃ dassanakkhamo rūpasampanno, na kiñci sippaṃ jānāti, dārabharaṇaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissati, na mayaṃ dhītaro dassāmā''ti āhaṃsu. rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā puttassa santikaṃ gantvā ārocesi. bodhisatto ``kiṃ sippaṃ dassetuṃ vaṭṭati, tātā''ti āha. sahassathāmadhanuṃ āropetuṃ vaṭṭati, tātāti. tena hi āharāpethāti. rājā āharāpetvā adāsi. dhanuṃ purisasahassaṃ āropeti, purisasahassaṃ oropeti. mahāpuriso dhanuṃ āharāpetvā pallaṅke nisinnova jiyaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhake veṭhetvā kaḍḍhanto pādaṅguṭṭhakeneva dhanuṃ āropetvā vāmena hatthena daṇḍe gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kaḍḍhitvā jiyaṃ pothesi. sakalanagaraṃ uppatanākārappattaṃ ahosi. ``kiṃ saddo eso''ti ca vutte ``devo gajjatī''ti āhaṃsu. athaññe ``tumhe na jānātha, na devo gajjati, aṅgīrasassa kumārassa sahassathāmadhanuṃ āropetvā jiyaṃ pothentassa jiyappahārasaddo eso''ti ^a^P2.0240^ea^ āhaṃsu. sākiyā tāvatakeneva āraddhacittā ahesuṃ.

[03] mahāpuriso ``aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti āha. aṭṭhaṅgulamattabahalaṃ ayopaṭṭaṃ kaṇḍena vinivijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. taṃ vinivijjhitvā ``aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti āha. caturaṅgulabahalaṃ asanaphalakaṃ vinivijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. taṃ vinivijjhitvā ``aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti āha. vidatthibahalaṃ udumbaraphalakaṃ vinivijjhituṃ ^a^M2.0128^ea^ vaṭṭatīti. taṃ vinivijjhitvā ``aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. yante baddhaṃ phalakasataṃ vinivijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. taṃ vinivijjhitvā ``aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti āha. saṭṭhipaṭalaṃ sukkhamahiṃsacammaṃ vinivijjhituṃ vaṭṭatīti. tampi vinivijjhitvā ``aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti āha. tato vālikasakaṭādīni ācikkhiṃsu. mahāsatto vālikasakaṭampi palālasakaṭampi vinivijjhitvā udake ekusabhappamāṇaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pesesi, thale aṭṭhausabhappamāṇaṃ. atha naṃ ``idāni vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ vijjhituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti āhaṃsu. tena hi bandhāpethāti. saddantare bajjhatu, tātāti. purato gacchantu, gāvutantare bandhantūti. purato gacchantu, addhayojane bandhantūti ^a^V2.0127^ea^. purato gacchantu yojane bandhantūti. bandhāpetha, tātāti yojanamatthake vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ bandhāpetvā rattandhakāre meghapaṭalacchannāsu disāsu kaṇḍaṃ khipi, taṃ gantvā yojanamatthake vālaṃ phāletvā pathaviṃ pāvisi. na kevalañca ettakameva, taṃ divasaṃ pana mahāsatto loke vattamānasippaṃ sabbameva sandassesi. sakyarājāno attano attano dhītaro alaṅkaritvā pesayiṃsu, cattālīsasahassanāṭakitthiyo ahesuṃ. mahāpuriso tīsu pāsādesu devo maññe paricārento mahāsampattiṃ anubhavati.

[03] ^b^nippurisehī^eb^ti purisavirahitehi. na kevalaṃ cettha tūriyāneva nippurisāni, sabbaṭṭhānānipi nippurisāneva. dovārikāpi itthiyova, nhāpanādiparikammakarāpi itthiyova ^a^P2.0241^ea^. rājā kira ``tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā parisaṅkā uppajjati, sā me puttassa mā ahosī''ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapesi. ^b^paricārayamāno^eb^ti modamāno. ^b^na heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ orohāmī^eb^ti pāsādato heṭṭhā na otarāmi. iti maṃ cattāro māse añño sikhābaddho puriso nāma passituṃ nālattha. ^b^yathā^eb^ti yena niyāmena. ^b^dāsakammakaraporisassā^eb^ti dāsānañceva devasikabhattavetanābhatānaṃ kammakarānañca nissāya jīvamānapurisānañca. ^b^kaṇājaka^eb^nti sakuṇḍakabhattaṃ. ^b^bilaṅgadutiya^eb^nti kañjikadutiyaṃ.

[03] ^b^evarūpāya iddhiyā^eb^ti evaṃjātikāya puññiddhiyā samannāgatassa. ^b^evarūpena ca sukhumālenā^eb^ti evaṃjātikena ca niddukkhabhāvena. sokhumālenātipi ^a^M2.0129^ea^ pāṭho. evaṃ tathāgato ettakena ṭhānena attano sirisampattiṃ kathesi. kathento ca na uppilāvitabhāvatthaṃ kathesi, ``evarūpāyapi pana sampattiyā ṭhito pamādaṃ akatvā appamattova ahosi''nti appamādalakkhaṇasseva dīpanatthaṃ kathesi. teneva ^b^assutavā kho puthujjano^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^para^eb^nti parapuggalaṃ. ^b^jiṇṇa^eb^nti jarājiṇṇaṃ. ^b^aṭṭīyatī^eb^ti aṭṭo pīḷito hoti. ^b^harāyatī^eb^ti hiriṃ karoti lajjati. ^b^jigucchatī^eb^ti asuciṃ viya disvā jigucchaṃ uppādeti. ^b^attānaṃyeva atisitvā^eb^ti jarādhammampi samānaṃ attānaṃ atikkamitvā aṭṭīyati harāyatīti attho. ^b^jarādhammo^eb^ti jarāsabhāvo. ^b^jaraṃ anatīto^eb^ti jaraṃ anatikkanto, anto jarāya vattāmi. ^b^iti paṭisañcikkhato^eb^ti evaṃ paccavekkhantassa. ^b^yobbanamado^eb^ti yobbanaṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado. ^b^sabbaso^eb^ ^a^P2.0242^ea^ ^b^pahīyī^eb^ti sabbākārena pahīno. maggena pahīnasadiso katvā dassito. na panesa maggena pahīno, paṭisaṅkhānena pahīnova kathitoti veditabbo. bodhisattassa hi devatā ^a^V2.0128^ea^ jarāpattaṃ dassesuṃ. tato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattā antarā mahāsattassa yobbanamado nāma na uppajjati. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. ettha pana ^b^ārogyamado^eb^ti ahaṃ nirogoti ārogyaṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado. ^b^jīvitamado^eb^ti ahaṃ ciraṃ jīvīti taṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado. ^b^sikkhaṃ paccakkhāyā^eb^ti sikkhaṃ paṭikkhipitvā. ^b^hīnāyāvattatī^eb^ti hīnāya lāmakāya gihibhāvāya āvattati.

[03] ^b^yathādhammā^eb^ti byādhiādīhi yathāsabhāvā. ^b^tathāsantā^eb^ti yathā santā eva aviparītabyādhiādisabhāvāva hutvāti attho. ^b^jigucchantī^eb^ti parapuggalaṃ jigucchanti. ^b^mama evaṃ vihārino^eb^ti mayhaṃ evaṃ jigucchāvihārena viharantassa evaṃ jigucchanaṃ nappatirūpaṃ bhaveyya nānucchavikaṃ. ^b^sohaṃ evaṃ viharanto^eb^ti so ahaṃ evaṃ paraṃ jigucchamāno viharanto, evaṃ vā iminā paṭisaṅkhānavihārena viharanto. ^b^ñatvā dhammaṃ nirūpadhi^eb^nti sabbūpadhivirahitaṃ nibbānadhammaṃ ñatvā. ^b^sabbe made abhibhosmī^eb^ti sabbe tayopi made abhibhaviṃ samatikkamiṃ. ^b^nekkhamme daṭṭhu khemata^eb^nti nibbāne khemabhāvaṃ disvā. nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khematotipi pāṭho, nibbānaṃ khemato disvāti attho. ^b^tassa^eb^ ^a^M2.0130^ea^ ^b^me ahu ussāho^eb^ti tassa mayhaṃ taṃ nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ abhipassantassa ussāho ahu, vāyāmo ahosīti attho. ^b^nāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0243^ea^ ^b^bhabbo etarahi, kāmāni paṭisevitu^eb^nti ahaṃ dāni duvidhepi kāme paṭisevituṃ abhabbo. ^b^anivatti bhavissāmī^eb^ti pabbajjato ca sabbaññutaññāṇato ca na nivattissāmi, anivattako bhavissāmi. ^b^brahmacariyaparāyaṇo^eb^ti maggabrahmacariyaparāyaṇo jātosmīti attho. iti imāhi gāthāhi mahābodhipallaṅke attano āgamanīyavīriyaṃ kathesi.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^ādhipateyyānī^eb^ti jeṭṭhakakāraṇato nibbattāni. ^b^attādhipateyya^eb^ntiādīsu attānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ guṇajātaṃ ^b^attādhipateyyaṃ^eb^. lokaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ ^b^lokādhipateyyaṃ^eb^. navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ ^b^dhammādhipateyyaṃ. na iti bhavābhavahetū^eb^ti iti bhavo, iti bhavoti evaṃ āyatiṃ, na tassa tassa sampattibhavassa hetu. ^b^otiṇṇo^eb^ti anupaviṭṭho. yassa hi jāti antopaviṭṭhā, so jātiyā otiṇṇo nāma. ^b^jarā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassā^eb^ti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkharāsissa. ^b^antakiriyā^eb^ ^a^V2.0129^ea^ ^b^paññāyethā^eb^ti antakaraṇaṃ paricchedaparivaṭumakaraṇaṃ paññāyeyya. ^b^ohāyā^eb^ti pahāya. ^b^pāpiṭṭhatare^eb^ti lāmakatare. ^b^āraddha^eb^nti paggahitaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ, āraddhattāva ^b^asallīnaṃ. upaṭṭhitā^eb^ti catusatipaṭṭhānavasena upaṭṭhitā. upaṭṭhitattāva ^b^asammuṭṭhā. passaddho kāyo^eb^ti nāmakāyo ca karajakāyo ca passaddho vūpasantadaratho. passaddhattāva ^b^asāraddho. samāhitaṃ citta^eb^nti ārammaṇe cittaṃ sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ. sammā āhitattāva ^b^ekaggaṃ. adhipatiṃ karitvā^eb^ti jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā. ^b^suddhaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0244^ea^ ^b^attānaṃ pariharatī^eb^ti suddhaṃ nimmalaṃ katvā attānaṃ pariharati paṭijaggati, gopāyatīti attho. ayañca yāva arahattamaggā pariyāyena suddhamattānaṃ pariharati nāma, phalappattova pana nippariyāyena suddhamattānaṃ pariharati.

[03] ^b^svākkhāto^eb^tiādīni visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.147) vitthāritāni. ^b^jānaṃ passaṃ viharantī^eb^ti taṃ dhammaṃ jānantā passantā viharanti. ^b^imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi ādhipateyyānī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0131^ea^ ettāvatā tīṇi ādhipateyyāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitāni.

[03] ^b^pakubbato^eb^ti karontassa. ^b^attā te purisa jānāti, saccaṃ vā yadi vā musā^eb^ti yaṃ tvaṃ karosi, taṃ yadi vā yathāsabhāvaṃ yadi vā no yathāsabhāvanti tava attāva jānāti. iminā ca kāraṇena veditabbaṃ ``pāpakammaṃ karontassa loke paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī''ti. ^b^kalyāṇa^eb^nti sundaraṃ. ^b^atimaññasī^eb^ti atikkamitvā maññasi. ^b^attānaṃ parigūhasī^eb^ti yathā me attāpi na jānāti, evaṃ naṃ parigūhāmīti vāyamasi. ^b^attādhipateyyako^eb^ti attajeṭṭhako. ^b^lokādhipo^eb^ti lokajeṭṭhako. ^b^nipako^eb^ti paññavā. ^b^jhāyī^eb^ti jhāyanto. ^b^dhammādhipo^eb^ti dhammajeṭṭhako. ^b^saccaparakkamo^eb^ti thiraparakkamo bhūtaparakkamo. ^b^pasayha māra^eb^nti māraṃ pasahitvā. ^b^abhibhuyya antaka^eb^nti idaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^yo ca phusī jātikkhayaṃ padhānavā^eb^ti yo jhāyī padhānavā māraṃ abhibhavitvā jātikkhayaṃ arahattaṃ phusi. ^b^so^eb^ ^a^P2.0245^ea^ ^b^tādiso^eb^ti so tathāvidho tathāsaṇṭhito. ^b^lokavidū^eb^ti tayo loke vidite pākaṭe katvā ṭhito. ^b^sumedho^eb^ti supañño. ^b^sabbesu dhammesu atammayo munī^eb^ti sabbe tebhūmakadhamme taṇhāsaṅkhātāya tammayatāya abhāvena atammayo khīṇāsavamuni kadāci katthaci na hīyati na parihīyatīti vuttaṃ hotīti.
[06] devadūtavaggo catuttho.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0130^ea^ paṭhame ^b^sammukhībhāvā^eb^ti sammukhībhāvena, vijjamānatāyāti attho. ^b^pasavatī^eb^ti paṭilabhati. ^b^saddhāya sammukhībhāvā^eb^ti yadi hi saddhā na bhaveyya, deyyadhammo na bhaveyya, dakkhiṇeyyasaṅkhātā paṭiggāhakapuggalā na bhaveyyuṃ, kathaṃ puññakammaṃ kareyya. tesaṃ pana sammukhībhāvena sakkā kātunti tasmā ``saddhāya sammukhībhāvā''tiādimāha. ettha ca dve ^a^M2.0132^ea^ dhammā sulabhā deyyadhammā ceva dakkhiṇeyyā ca, saddhā pana dullabhā. puthujjanassa hi saddhā athāvarā padavārena nānā hoti, teneva mahāmoggallānasadisopi aggasāvako pāṭibhogo bhavituṃ asakkonto āha -- ``dvinnaṃ kho te ahaṃ, āvuso, dhammānaṃ pāṭibhogo bhogānañca jīvitassa ca, saddhāya pana tvaṃyeva pāṭibhogo''ti (udā0 18).

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^vigatamalamaccherenā^eb^ti vigatamacchariyamalena. ^b^muttacāgo^eb^ti vissaṭṭhacāgo. ^b^payatapāṇī^eb^ti dhotahattho. assaddho hi satakkhattuṃ hatthe dhovitvāpi malinahatthova hoti, saddho pana dānābhiratattā malinahatthopi dhotahatthova. ^b^vossaggarato^eb^ti ^a^P2.0246^ea^ vossaggasaṅkhāte dāne rato. ^b^yācayogo^eb^ti yācituṃ yutto, yācakehi vā yogo assātipi yācayogo. ^b^dānasaṃvibhāgarato^eb^ti dānaṃ dadanto saṃvibhāgañca karonto dānasaṃvibhāgarato nāma hoti.

[03] ^b^dassanakāmo sīlavata^eb^nti dasapi yojanāni vīsampi tiṃsampi yojanasatampi gantvā sīlasampanne daṭṭhukāmo hoti ^b^pāṭaliputtakabrāhmaṇo^eb^ viya ^b^saddhātissamahārājā^eb^ viya ca. pāṭaliputtassa kira nagaradvāre sālāya nisinnā dve brāhmaṇā kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsimahānāgattherassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā ``amhehi taṃ bhikkhuṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti dvepi janā nikkhamiṃsu. eko antarāmagge kālamakāsi. eko samuddatīraṃ patvā nāvāya mahātitthapaṭṭane oruyha anurādhapuraṃ ^a^V2.0131^ea^ āgantvā ``kāḷavallimaṇḍapo kuhi''nti pucchi. rohaṇajanapadeti. so anupubbena therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā cūḷanagaragāme dhuraghare nivāsaṃ gahetvā therassa āhāraṃ sampādetvā pātova vuṭṭhāya therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā gantvā janapariyante ṭhito theraṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā sakiṃ tattheva ṭhito vanditvā puna upasaṅkamitvā gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā vandanto ``uccā, bhante, tumhe''ti āha. thero ca nātiucco nātirasso pamāṇayuttova, tena naṃ puna āha -- ``nātiuccā tumhe, tumhākaṃ ^a^M2.0133^ea^ pana guṇā mecakavaṇṇassa samuddassa matthakena gantvā sakalajambudīpatalaṃ ajjhottharitvā gatā, ahampi pāṭaliputtanagaradvāre nisinno tumhākaṃ guṇakathaṃ assosi''nti. so therassa bhikkhāhāraṃ datvā attano ticīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā therassa santike pabbajitvā tassovāde patiṭṭhāya katipāheneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.

[03] ^b^saddhātissamahārājā^eb^pi, ``bhante, mayhaṃ vanditabbayuttakaṃ ^a^P2.0247^ea^ ekaṃ ayyaṃ ācikkhathā''ti pucchi. bhikkhū ``maṅgalavāsī kuṭṭatissatthero''ti āhaṃsu. rājā mahāparivārena pañcayojanamaggaṃ agamāsi. thero ``kiṃ saddo eso, āvuso''ti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchi. ``rājā, bhante, tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya āgato''ti. thero cintesi -- ``kiṃ mayhaṃ mahallakakāle rājagehe kamma''nti divāṭṭhāne mañce nipajjitvā bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhanto acchi. rājā ``kahaṃ thero''ti pucchitvā ``divāṭṭhāne''ti sutvā tattha gacchanto theraṃ bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhantaṃ disvā ``khīṇāsavassa nāma hatthakukkuccaṃ natthi, nāyaṃ khīṇāsavo''ti avanditvāva nivatti. bhikkhusaṅgho theraṃ āha -- ``bhante, evaṃvidhassa saddhassa pasannassa rañño kasmā vippaṭisāraṃ karitthā''ti. ``āvuso, rañño pasādarakkhanaṃ na tumhākaṃ bhāro, mahallakattherassa bhāro''ti vatvā aparabhāge anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ āha -- ``mayhaṃ kūṭāgāramhi aññampi pallaṅkaṃ attharathā''ti. tasmiṃ atthate thero -- ``idaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ antare appatiṭṭhahitvā raññā diṭṭhakāleyeva bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhātū''ti adhiṭṭhahitvā parinibbāyi. kūṭāgāraṃ pañcayojanamaggaṃ ākāsena agamāsi. pañcayojanamagge dhajaṃ dhāretuṃ samatthā rukkhā dhajapaggahitāva ahesuṃ. gacchāpi gumbāpi sabbe kūṭāgārābhimukhā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] raññopi paṇṇaṃ pahiṇiṃsu ``thero parinibbuto, kūṭāgāraṃ ākāsena āgacchatī''ti. rājā na saddahi. kūṭāgāraṃ ākāsena gantvā thūpārāmaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā silācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. cetiyaṃ saha vatthunā uppatitvā kūṭāgāramatthake aṭṭhāsi, sādhukārasahassāni pavattiṃsu ^a^V2.0132^ea^. tasmiṃ khaṇe mahābyagghatthero nāma lohapāsāde sattamakūṭāgāre nisinno bhikkhūnaṃ vinayakammaṃ karonto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā ``kiṃ saddo ^a^M2.0134^ea^ eso''ti paṭipucchi. bhante, maṅgalavāsī kuṭṭatissatthero parinibbuto, kūṭāgāraṃ pañcayojanamaggaṃ ākāsena āgataṃ, tattha so sādhukārasaddoti. āvuso, puññavante nissāya ^a^P2.0248^ea^ sakkāraṃ labhissāmāti antevāsike khamāpetvā ākāseneva āgantvā taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā dutiyamañce nisīditvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. rājā gandhapupphacuṇṇāni ādāya gantvā ākāse ṭhitaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ disvā kūṭāgāraṃ pūjesi. tasmiṃ khaṇe kūṭāgāraṃ otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ. rājā mahāsakkārena sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ akāsi. evarūpā sīlavantānaṃ dassanakāmā nāma honti.

[03] ^b^saddhammaṃ sotumicchatī^eb^ti tathāgatappaveditaṃ saddhammaṃ sotukāmo hoti ^b^piṇḍapātikattherādayo^eb^ viya. gaṅgāvanavāliaṅgaṇamhi kira tiṃsa bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā anvaddhamāsaṃ uposathadivase catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmamahāariyavaṃsañca (a0 ni0 4.28) kathenti. eko piṇḍapātikatthero pacchābhāgena āgantvā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīdi. atha naṃ eko gonaso jaṅghapiṇḍimaṃsaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya ḍaṃsi. thero olokento gonasaṃ disvā ``ajja dhammassavanantarāyaṃ na karissāmī''ti gonasaṃ gahetvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā thavikāmukhaṃ bandhitvā avidūre ṭhāne ṭhapetvā dhammaṃ suṇantova nisīdi. aruṇuggamanañca visaṃ vikkhambhetvā therassa tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ pāpuṇanañca visassa daṭṭhaṭṭhāneneva otaritvā pathavipavisanañca dhammakathikattherassa dhammakathāniṭṭhāpanañca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi. tato thero āha -- ``āvuso eko me coro gahito''ti thavikaṃ muñcitvā gonasaṃ vissajjesi. bhikkhū disvā ``kāya velāya daṭṭhattha, bhante''ti pucchiṃsu. hiyyo sāyanhasamaye, āvusoti. kasmā, bhante, evaṃ bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ karitthāti. āvuso, sacāhaṃ dīghajātikena daṭṭhoti vadeyyaṃ, nayimaṃ ettakaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ ^a^P2.0249^ea^ labheyyanti. idaṃ tāva piṇḍapātikattherassa vatthu.

[03] dīghavāpiyampi ``mahājātakabhāṇakatthero gāthāsahassaṃ mahāvessantaraṃ kathessatī''ti tissamahāgāme tissamahāvihāravāsī eko ^a^M2.0135^ea^ daharo sutvā tato nikkhamitvā ekāheneva navayojanamaggaṃ āgato. tasmiṃyeva khaṇe thero dhammakathaṃ ārabhi. daharo dūramaggāgamanena sañjātakāyadarathattā paṭṭhānagāthāya saddhiṃ avasānagāthaṃyeva vavatthapesi. tato therassa ``idamavocā''ti ^a^V2.0133^ea^ vatvā uṭṭhāya gamanakāle ``mayhaṃ āgamanakammaṃ moghaṃ jāta''nti rodamāno aṭṭhāsi. eko manusso taṃ kathaṃ sutvā gantvā therassa ārocesi, ``bhante, `tumhākaṃ dhammakathaṃ sossāmī'ti eko daharabhikkhu tissamahāvihārā āgato, so `kāyadarathabhāvena me āgamanaṃ moghaṃ jāta'nti rodamāno ṭhito''ti. gacchatha saññāpetha naṃ ``puna sve kathessāmā''ti. so punadivase therassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.

[03] aparāpi ^b^ullakolikaṇṇivāsikā^eb^ ekā itthī puttakaṃ pāyamānā ``dīghabhāṇakamahāabhayatthero nāma ariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ kathetī''ti sutvā pañcayojanamaggaṃ gantvā divākathikattherassa nisinnakāleyeva vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhūmiyaṃ puttaṃ nipajjāpetvā divākathikattherassa ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ assosi. sarabhāṇake there uṭṭhite dīghabhāṇakamahāabhayatthero catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmamahāariyavaṃsaṃ ārabhi. sā ṭhitakāva paggaṇhāti. thero tayo eva paccaye kathetvā uṭṭhānākāraṃ akāsi. sā upāsikā āha -- ``ayyo, `ariyavaṃsaṃ kathessāmī'ti siniddhabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā madhurapānakaṃ pivitvā yaṭṭhimadhukatelādīhi bhesajjaṃ katvā kathetuṃ ^a^P2.0250^ea^ yuttaṭṭhāneyeva uṭṭhahatī''ti. thero ``sādhu, bhaginī''ti vatvā upari bhāvanārāmaṃ paṭṭhapesi. aruṇuggamanañca therassa ``idamavocā''ti vacanañca upāsikāya sotāpattiphaluppatti ca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.

[03] aparāpi ^b^kaḷamparavāsikā^eb^ itthī aṅkena puttaṃ ādāya ``dhammaṃ sossāmī''ti cittalapabbataṃ gantvā ekaṃ rukkhaṃ nissāya dārakaṃ nipajjāpetvā sayaṃ ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ suṇāti. rattibhāgasamanantare eko dīghajātiko tassā ^a^M2.0136^ea^ passantiyāyeva samīpe nipannadārakaṃ catūhi dāṭhāhi ḍaṃsitvā agamāsi. sā cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ `putto me sappena daṭṭho'ti vakkhāmi, dhammassa antarāyo bhavissati. anekakkhattuṃ kho pana me ayaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe vaṭṭantiyā putto ahosi, dhammameva carissāmī''ti tiyāmarattiṃ ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ paggaṇhitvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aruṇe uggate saccakiriyāya puttassa visaṃ nimmathetvā puttaṃ gahetvā gatā. evarūpā puggalā dhammaṃ sotukāmā nāma honti.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V2.0134^ea^ ^b^tayo, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamānenā^eb^ti tayo atthe tīṇi kāraṇāni passantena. ^b^alamevā^eb^ti yuttameva. ^b^yo dhammaṃ desetī^eb^ti yo puggalo catusaccadhammaṃ pakāseti. ^b^atthappaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti aṭṭhakathaṃ ñāṇena paṭisaṃvedī. ^b^dhammappaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti pāḷidhammaṃ paṭisaṃvedī.
[03] 44^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^ṭhānehī^eb^ti kāraṇehi. ^b^pavattinī^eb^ti appaṭihatā niyyānikā.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^paṇḍitapaññattānī^eb^ti paṇḍitehi paññattāni kathitāni pasatthāni. ^b^sappurisapaññattānī^eb^ti sappurisehi mahāpurisehi paññattāni kathitāni pasatthāni. ^b^ahiṃsā^eb^ti karuṇā ceva karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca. ^b^saṃyamo^eb^ti sīlasaṃyamo. ^b^damo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0251^ea^ indriyasaṃvaro, uposathavasena vā attadamanaṃ, puṇṇovāde (ma0 ni0 3.395 ādayo; saṃ0 ni0 4.88 ādayo) damoti vuttā khantipi āḷavake (saṃ0 ni0 1.246; su0 ni0 183 ādayo) vuttā paññāpi imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^mātāpitu upaṭṭhāna^eb^nti mātāpitūnaṃ rakkhanaṃ gopanaṃ paṭijagganaṃ. ^b^santāna^eb^nti aññattha buddhapaccekabuddhāriyasāvakā santo nāma, idha pana mātāpitūpaṭṭhākā adhippetā. tasmā uttamaṭṭhena santānaṃ ^a^M2.0137^ea^, seṭṭhacariyaṭṭhena ^b^brahmacārīnaṃ^eb^. idaṃ mātāpitūpaṭṭhānaṃ sabbhi upaññātanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^sataṃ etāni ṭhānānī^eb^ti santānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ etāni ṭhānāni kāraṇāni. ^b^ariyo dassanasampanno^eb^ti idha imesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ kāraṇena ariyo ceva dassanasampanno ca veditabbo, na buddhādayo na sotāpannā. atha vā ^b^sataṃ etāni ṭhānānī^eb^ti mātupaṭṭhānaṃ pitupaṭṭhānanti etāni ṭhānāni santānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ kāraṇānīti evaṃ mātāpitūpaṭṭhākavasena imissā gāthāya attho veditabbo. mātāpitūpaṭṭhākoyeva hi idha ``ariyo dassanasampanno''ti vutto. ^b^sa lokaṃ bhajate siva^eb^nti so khemaṃ devalokaṃ gacchatīti.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V2.0135^ea^ ^b^tīhi ṭhānehī^eb^ti tīhi kāraṇehi. ^b^kāyenā^eb^tiādīsu bhikkhū āgacchante disvā paccuggamanaṃ karontā gacchante anugacchantā āsanasālāya sammajjanaupalepanādīni karontā āsanāni paññāpentā pānīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentā kāyena puññaṃ pasavanti nāma. bhikkhusaṅghaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā ``yāguṃ detha, bhattaṃ detha, sappinavanītādīni detha, gandhapupphādīhi pūjetha, uposathaṃ upavasatha, dhammaṃ suṇātha, cetiyaṃ vandathā''tiādīni vadantā vācāya puññaṃ pasavanti nāma. bhikkhū piṇḍāya carante disvā ``labhantū''ti cintentā manasā puññaṃ pasavanti nāma. ^b^pasavantī^eb^ti paṭilabhanti. puññaṃ ^a^P2.0252^ea^ panettha lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^saṅkhatassā^eb^ti paccayehi samāgantvā katassa. ^b^saṅkhatalakkhaṇānī^eb^ti saṅkhataṃ etanti sañjānanakāraṇāni nimittāni. ^b^uppādo^eb^ti jāti. ^b^vayo^eb^ti bhedo. ^b^ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ^eb^ nāma jarā. tattha ^b^saṅkhata^eb^nti tebhūmakā dhammā. maggaphalāni pana asammasanūpagattā idha na kathīyanti. uppādādayo ^b^saṅkhatalakkhaṇā^eb^ nāma. tesu uppādakkhaṇe uppādo, ṭhānakkhaṇe jarā, bhedakkhaṇe vayo. lakkhaṇaṃ na saṅkhataṃ, saṅkhataṃ na lakkhaṇaṃ ^a^M2.0138^ea^, lakkhaṇena pana saṅkhataṃ paricchinnaṃ. yathā hatthiassagomahiṃsādīnaṃ sattisūlādīni sañjānanalakkhaṇāni na hatthiādayo, napi hatthiādayo lakkhaṇāneva, lakkhaṇehi pana te ``asukassa hatthī, asukassa asso, asukahatthī, asukāsso''ti vā paññāyanti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^asaṅkhatassā^eb^ti paccayehi samāgantvā akatassa. ^b^asaṅkhatalakkhaṇānī^eb^ti asaṅkhataṃ etanti sañjānanakāraṇāni nimittāni. ^b^na uppādo paññāyatī^eb^tiādīhi uppādajarābhaṅgānaṃ abhāvo vutto. uppādādīnañhi abhāvena asaṅkhatanti paññāyati.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V2.0136^ea^ ^b^mahāsālā^eb^ti mahārukkhā. ^b^kulapati^eb^nti kulajeṭṭhakaṃ. ^b^selo^eb^ti silāmayo. ^b^araññasmi^eb^nti agāmakaṭṭhāne. ^b^brahmā^eb^ti mahanto. ^b^vane^eb^ti aṭaviyaṃ. ^b^vanappatī^eb^ti vanajeṭṭhakā. ^b^idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, maggaṃ sugatigāmina^eb^nti sugatigāmikamaggasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ caritvā.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^P2.0253^ea^ ^b^ātappaṃ karaṇīya^eb^nti vīriyaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṃ. ^b^anuppādāyā^eb^ti anuppādatthāya, anuppādaṃ sādhessāmīti iminā kāraṇena kattabbanti attho. paratopi eseva nayo. ^b^sārīrikāna^eb^nti sarīrasambhavānaṃ. ^b^dukkhāna^eb^nti dukkhamānaṃ. ^b^tibbāna^eb^nti bahalānaṃ, tāpanavasena vā tibbānaṃ. ^b^kharāna^eb^nti pharusānaṃ. ^b^kaṭukāna^eb^nti tikhiṇānaṃ. ^b^asātāna^eb^nti amadhurānaṃ. ^b^amanāpāna^eb^nti manaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ asamatthānaṃ. ^b^pāṇaharāna^eb^nti jīvitaharānaṃ. ^b^adhivāsanāyā^eb^ti adhivāsanatthāya sahanatthāya khamanatthāya.

[03] ettake ^a^M2.0139^ea^ ṭhāne satthā āṇāpetvā āṇattiṃ pavattetvā idāni samādapento ^b^yato kho, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yato^eb^ti yadā. ^b^ātāpī^eb^ti vīriyavā. ^b^nipako^eb^ti sappañño. ^b^sato^eb^ti satiyā samannāgato. ^b^dukkhassa antakiriyāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa paricchedaparivaṭumakiriyāya. ime ca pana ātāpādayo tayopi lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^mahācoro^eb^ti mahanto balavacoro. ^b^sandhi^eb^nti gharasandhiṃ. ^b^nillopa^eb^nti mahāvilopaṃ. ^b^ekāgārika^eb^nti ekameva gehaṃ parivāretvā vilumpanaṃ. ^b^paripanthepi tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti panthadūhanakammaṃ karoti. ^b^nadīvidugga^eb^nti nadīnaṃ duggamaṭṭhānaṃ antaradīpakaṃ, yattha sakkā hoti dvīhipi tīhipi jaṅghasahassehi saddhiṃ nilīyituṃ. ^b^pabbatavisama^eb^nti ^a^P2.0254^ea^ pabbatānaṃ visamaṭṭhānaṃ pabbatantaraṃ, yattha sakkā hoti sattahi vā aṭṭhahi vā jaṅghasahassehi saddhiṃ nilīyituṃ. ^b^tiṇagahana^eb^nti tiṇena vaḍḍhitvā sañchannaṃ dvattiyojanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^rodha^eb^nti ghanaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhasākhaṃ ekābaddhaṃ ^a^V2.0137^ea^ mahāvanasaṇḍaṃ. ^b^pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇissantī^eb^ti pariyodahitvā taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā atthaṃ kathayissanti. ^b^tyāssā^eb^ti te assa. ^b^pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇantī^eb^ti kismiñci kiñci vattuṃ āraddheyeva ``mā evaṃ avacuttha, mayaṃ etaṃ kulaparamparāya jānāma, na esa evarūpaṃ karissatī''ti taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā mahantampi dosaṃ harantā atthaṃ bhaṇanti. atha vā ^b^pariyodhāyā^eb^ti paṭicchādetvātipi attho. te hi tassapi dosaṃ paṭicchādetvā atthaṃ bhaṇanti. ^b^khataṃ upahata^eb^nti guṇakhananena khataṃ, guṇupaghātena upahataṃ. ^b^visamena kāyakammenā^eb^ti sampakkhalanaṭṭhena visamena kāyadvārikakammena. vacīmanokammesupi eseva nayo. ^b^antaggāhikāyā^eb^ti dasavatthukāya antaṃ gahetvā ṭhitadiṭṭhiyā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] cūḷavaggo pañcamo.
[06] paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ brāhmaṇavaggassa ^a^V2.0138^ea^ ^a^M2.0140^ea^ ^a^P2.0255^ea^ paṭhame ^b^jiṇṇā^eb^ti jarājiṇṇā. ^b^vuddhā^eb^ti vayovuddhā. ^b^mahallakā^eb^ti jātimahallakā. ^b^addhagatā^eb^ti tayo addhe atikkantā. ^b^vayoanuppattā^eb^ti tatiyaṃ vayaṃ anuppattā. ^b^yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsū^eb^ti puttadāre attano vacanaṃ akaronte disvā ``samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā niyyānikamaggaṃ gavesissāmā''ti cintetvā upasaṅkamiṃsu. ^b^mayamassu, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā^eb^ti; bho gotama, mayaṃ brāhmaṇā na khattiyā nāmaccā na gahapatikāti brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā ^b^jiṇṇā^eb^tiādimāhaṃsu. ^b^akatabhīruttāṇā^eb^ti akatabhayaparittāṇā. avassayabhūtaṃ patiṭṭhākammaṃ amhehi na katanti dassenti. ^b^tagghā^eb^ti ekaṃsatthe nipāto, sampaṭicchanatthe vā. ekantena tumhe evarūpā, ahampi kho etaṃ sampaṭicchāmīti ca dasseti. ^b^upanīyatī^eb^ti upasaṃharīyati. ayaṃ hi jātiyā jaraṃ upanīyati, jarāya byādhiṃ, byādhinā maraṇaṃ, maraṇena puna jātiṃ. tena vuttaṃ -- ``upanīyatī''ti.

[03] idāni yasmā te brāhmaṇā mahallakattā pabbajitvāpi vattaṃ pūretuṃ na sakkhissanti, tasmā ne pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpento bhagavā ^b^yodha kāyena saṃyamo^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kāyena saṃyamo^eb^ti kāyadvārena saṃvaro. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^taṃ tassa petassā^eb^ti taṃ puññaṃ tassa paralokaṃ gatassa tāyanaṭṭhena ^b^tāṇaṃ,^eb^ nilīyanaṭṭhena ^b^leṇaṃ,^eb^ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena ^b^dīpo,^eb^ avassayanaṭṭhena ^b^saraṇaṃ,^eb^ uttamagativasena ^b^parāyaṇañca^eb^ hotīti dasseti. gāthā uttānatthāyeva. evaṃ ^a^P2.0256^ea^ te brāhmaṇā tathāgatena pañcasu sīlesu samādapitā yāvajīvaṃ pañca sīlāni rakkhitvā sagge nibbattiṃsu.
[03] 53^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V2.0139^ea^ ^a^M2.0141^ea^ ^b^bhājana^eb^nti yaṃkiñci bhaṇḍakaṃ. sesaṃ paṭhame vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^sammodanīya^eb^nti sammodajananiṃ. ^b^sāraṇīya^eb^nti saritabbayuttakaṃ. ^b^vītisāretvā^eb^ti pariyosāpetvā. ^b^kittāvatā^eb^ti kittakena. ^b^sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hotī^eb^ti sāmaṃ passitabbo hoti. ^b^akāliko^eb^ti na kālantare phaladāyako. ^b^ehipassiko^eb^ti ``ehi passā''ti evaṃ dassetuṃ sakkāti āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ pucchati. ^b^opaneyyiko^eb^ti attano cittaṃ upanetabbo. ^b^paccattaṃ veditabbo^eb^ti sāmaṃyeva jānitabbo. ^b^viññūhī^eb^ti paṇḍitehi. ^b^pariyādinnacitto^eb^ti ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhacitto hutvā. ^b^cetetī^eb^ti cinteti. sesamettha uttānameva. imasmiṃ pana sutte brāhmaṇena lokuttaramaggo pucchito, satthārāpi soyeva kathito. so hi sāmaṃ passitabbattā sandiṭṭhiko nāmāti.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^brāhmaṇaparibbājako^eb^ti brāhmaṇajātiko paribbājako, na khattiyādijātiko. ^b^attatthampī^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ attano atthaṃ.
[03] 56^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^akālika^eb^nti na kālantare pattabbaṃ. ^b^opaneyyika^eb^nti paṭipattiyā upagantabbaṃ.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^ācariyapācariyāna^eb^nti ācariyānañceva ācariyācariyānañca. ^b^avīci maññe phuṭo ahosī^eb^ti yathā avīci mahānirayo nirantaraphuṭo nerayikasattehi paripuṇṇo, manussehi ^a^V2.0140^ea^ evaṃ paripuṇṇo hoti. ^b^kukkuṭasaṃpātikā^eb^ti ekagāmassa chadanapiṭṭhito uppatitvā itaragāmassa ^a^M2.0142^ea^ ^a^P2.0257^ea^ chadanapiṭṭhe patanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasaṃpāto etāsu atthīti kukkuṭasaṃpātikā. kukkuṭasaṃpādikātipi pāṭho, gāmantarato gāmantaraṃ kukkuṭānaṃ padasā gamanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasaṃpādo etāsu atthīti attho. ubhayampetaṃ ghananivāsataṃyeva dīpeti. ^b^adhammarāgarattā^eb^ti rāgo nāma ekanteneva adhammo, attano parikkhāresu pana uppajjamāno na adhammarāgoti adhippeto, paraparikkhāresu uppajjamānova adhammarāgoti. ^b^visamalobhābhibhūtā^eb^ti lobhassa samakālo nāma natthi, ekantaṃ visamova esa. attanā pariggahitavatthumhi pana uppajjamāno samalobho nāma, parapariggahitavatthumhi uppajjamānova visamoti adhippeto. ^b^micchādhammaparetā^eb^ti avatthupaṭisevanasaṅkhātena micchādhammena samannāgatā. ^b^devo na sammā dhāraṃ anuppavecchatī^eb^ti vassitabbayutte kāle vassaṃ na vassati. ^b^dubbhikkha^eb^nti dullabhabhikkhaṃ. ^b^dussassa^eb^nti vividhasassānaṃ asampajjanena dussassaṃ. ^b^setaṭṭhika^eb^nti sasse sampajjamāne pāṇakā patanti, tehi daṭṭhattā nikkhantanikkhantāni sālisīsāni setavaṇṇāni honti nissārāni. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``setaṭṭhika''nti. ^b^salākāvutta^eb^nti vapitaṃ vapitaṃ sassaṃ salākāmattameva sampajjati, phalaṃ na detīti attho. ^b^yakkhā^eb^ti yakkhādhipatino. ^b^vāḷe amanusse ossajjantī^eb^ti caṇḍayakkhe manussapathe vissajjenti, te laddhokāsā mahājanaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^mahapphala^eb^nti mahāvipākaṃ. ^b^dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontī^eb^ti ettha ^b^dhammo^eb^ nāma kathitakathā, ^b^anudhammo^eb^ nāma kathitassa paṭikathanaṃ. ^b^sahadhammiko^eb^ti sakāraṇo sahetuko. ^b^vādānupāto^eb^ti vādassa anupāto, anupatanaṃ pavattīti attho. ^b^gārayhaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0258^ea^ ^b^ṭhāna^eb^nti garahitabbayuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- bhotā gotamena vuttā sakāraṇā vādappavatti kiñcipi gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchatīti. atha vā tehi parehi vuttā sakāraṇā vādappavatti kiñci gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchatīti pucchati.

[03] ^b^antarāyakaro^eb^ ^a^M2.0143^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti antarāyaṃ vināsaṃ kicchalābhakaṃ vilomakaṃ karoti. ^b^pāripanthiko^eb^ti panthadūhanacoro. ^b^khato ca hotī^eb^ti guṇakhananena khato hoti. ^b^upahato^eb^ti guṇupaghāteneva upahato.

[03] ^b^candanikāyā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0141^ea^ asucikalalakūpe. ^b^oligalle^eb^ti niddhamanakalale. ^b^so cā^eb^ti so sīlavāti vuttakhīṇāsavo. ^b^sīlakkhandhenā^eb^ti sīlarāsinā. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ettha ca vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ vuccati paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ, taṃ asekkhassa pavattattā asekkhanti vuttaṃ. itarāni sikkhāpariyosānappattatāya sayampi asekkhāneva. tāni ca pana lokuttarāni, paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ.

[03] ^b^rohiṇīsū^eb^ti rattavaṇṇāsu. ^b^sarūpāsū^eb^ti attano vacchakehi samānarūpāsu. ^b^pārevatāsū^eb^ti kapotavaṇṇāsu. ^b^danto^eb^ti nibbisevano. ^b^puṅgavo^eb^ti usabho. ^b^dhorayho^eb^ti dhuravāho. ^b^kalyāṇajavanikkamo^eb^ti kalyāṇena ujunā javena gantā. ^b^nāssa vaṇṇaṃ parikkhare^eb^ti assa goṇassa sarīravaṇṇaṃ na upaparikkhanti, dhuravahanakammameva pana upaparikkhanti. ^b^yasmiṃ kasmiñci jātiye^eb^ti yattha katthaci kulajāte. ^b^yāsu kāsuci etāsū^eb^ti etāsu khattiyādippabhedāsu yāsu kāsuci jātīsu.

[03] ^b^brahmacariyassa kevalī^eb^ti brahmacariyassa kevalena samannāgato, paripuṇṇabhāvena yuttoti attho. khīṇāsavo hi sakalabrahmacārī nāma hoti. tenetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^pannabhāro^eb^ti ^a^P2.0259^ea^ oropitabhāro, khandhabhāraṃ kilesabhāraṃ kāmaguṇabhārañca oropetvā ṭhitoti attho. ^b^katakicco^eb^ti catūhi maggehi kiccaṃ katvā ṭhito. ^b^pāragū sabbadhammāna^eb^nti sabbadhammā vuccanti pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, tesaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ abhiññāpāraṃ, pariññāpāraṃ, pahānapāraṃ, bhāvanāpāraṃ, sacchikiriyāpāraṃ, samāpattipārañcāti chabbidhaṃ pāraṃ gatattā pāragū. ^b^anupādāyā^eb^ti aggahetvā. ^b^nibbuto^eb^ti kilesasantāparahito. ^b^viraje^eb^ti rāgadosamoharajarahite.

[03] ^b^avijānantā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0144^ea^ khettaṃ ajānantā. ^b^dummedhā^eb^ti nippaññā. ^b^assutāvino^eb^ti khettavinicchayasavanena rahitā. ^b^bahiddhā^eb^ti imamhā sāsanā bahiddhā. ^b^na hi sante upāsare^eb^ti buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsave uttamapurise na upasaṅkamanti. ^b^dhīrasammate^eb^ti paṇḍitehi sammate sambhāvite. ^b^mūlajātā patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti iminā sotāpannassa saddhaṃ dasseti. ^b^kule vā idha jāyare^eb^ti idha vā manussaloke khattiyabrāhmaṇavessakule jāyanti. ayameva hi tividhā kulasampatti nāma. ^b^anupubbena nibbānaṃ, adhigacchantī^eb^ti sīlasamādhipaññāti ime guṇe pūretvā anukkamena nibbānaṃ adhigacchantīti.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0142^ea^ ^b^tikaṇṇo^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti ``samaṇo kira gotamo paṇḍito, gacchissāmi tassa santika''nti cintetvā bhuttapātarāso mahājanaparivuto upasaṅkami. ^b^bhagavato sammukhā^eb^ti dasabalassa purato nisīditvā. ^b^vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī^eb^ti kasmā bhāsati? so kira ito pubbe tathāgatassa santikaṃ agatapubbo. athassa etadahosi -- ``buddhā nāma durāsadā, mayi paṭhamataraṃ akathente katheyya vā na vā. sace na kathessati, atha maṃ samāgamaṭṭhāne kathentaṃ ^a^P2.0260^ea^ evaṃ vakkhanti `tvaṃ idha kasmā kathesi, yena te samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā vacanamattampi na laddha'nti. tasmā `evaṃ me ayaṃ garahā muccissatī'''ti maññamāno bhāsati. kiñcāpi brāhmaṇānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, tathāgatassa pana ñāṇaṃ ghaṭṭessāmīti adhippāyeneva bhāsati. ^b^evampi tevijjā brāhmaṇā^eb^ti tevijjakabrāhmaṇā evaṃpaṇḍitā evaṃdhīrā evaṃbyattā evaṃbahussutā evaṃvādino, evaṃsammatāti attho. ^b^itipī^eb^ti iminā tesaṃ paṇḍitādiākāraparicchedaṃ dasseti. ettakena kāraṇena paṇḍitā...pe0... ettakena kāraṇena sammatāti ayañhi ettha attho.

[03] ^b^yathā kathaṃ pana brāhmaṇā^eb^ti ettha ^b^yathā^eb^ti kāraṇavacanaṃ, ^b^kathaṃ panā^eb^ti pucchāvacanaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- kathaṃ pana, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇā tevijjaṃ ^a^M2.0145^ea^ paññāpenti. yathā evaṃ sakkā hoti jānituṃ, taṃ kāraṇaṃ vadehīti. taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo ``jānanaṭṭhāneyeva maṃ sammāsambuddho pucchi, no ajānanaṭṭhāne''ti attamano hutvā ^b^idha, bho gotamā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ubhato^eb^ti dvīhipi pakkhehi. ^b^mātito ca pitito cā^eb^ti yassa mātā brāhmaṇī, mātu mātā brāhmaṇī, tassāpi mātā brāhmaṇī. pitā brāhmaṇo, pitu pitā brāhmaṇo, tassāpi pitā brāhmaṇo, so ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca. ^b^saṃsuddhagahaṇiko^eb^ti yassa saṃsuddhā mātu gahaṇī, kucchīti attho. ``samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā''ti pana ettha kammajatejodhātu gahaṇīti vuccati.

[03] ^b^yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā^eb^ti ettha pitu pitā pitāmaho, pitāmahassa yugaṃ pitāmahayugaṃ. ^b^yuga^eb^nti āyuppamāṇaṃ vuccati. abhilāpamattameva cetaṃ, atthato pana pitāmahoyeva pitāmahayugaṃ. tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā. evaṃ yāva sattamo puriso, tāva saṃsuddhagahaṇiko, atha ^a^P2.0261^ea^ vā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādenāti ^a^V2.0143^ea^ dasseti. ^b^akkhitto^eb^ti ``apanetha etaṃ, kiṃ iminā''ti evaṃ akkhitto anavakkhitto. ^b^anupakkuṭṭho^eb^ti na upakkuṭṭho, na akkosaṃ vā nindaṃ vā pattapubbo. kena kāraṇenāti? ^b^jātivādena^eb^. ``itipi hīnajātiko eso''ti evarūpena vacanenāti attho.

[03] ^b^ajjhāyako^eb^ti idaṃ ``na dānime jhāyanti, na dānime jhāyantīti kho, vāseṭṭha, ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakāteva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta''nti (dī0 ni0 3.132) evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ. idāni pana taṃ ajjhāyatīti ajjhāyako, mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharanti. mante dhāretīti ^b^mantadharo^eb^.

[03] ^b^tiṇṇaṃ vedāna^eb^nti irubbedayajubbedasāmabbedānaṃ. oṭṭhapahatakaraṇavasena pāraṃ gatoti ^b^pāragū^eb^. saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena ca ^b^sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ. nighaṇḍū^eb^ti nāmanighaṇḍurukkhādīnaṃ vevacanapakāsakasatthaṃ. ^b^keṭubha^eb^nti kiriyākappavikappo kavīnaṃ upakārāya satthaṃ. saha akkharappabhedena ^a^M2.0146^ea^ ^b^sākkharappabhedānaṃ. akkharappabhedo^eb^ti sikkhā ca nirutti ca. ^b^itihāsapañcamāna^eb^nti āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā itiha āsa, itiha āsāti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto khattavijjāsaṅkhāto vā itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā. tesaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ vedānaṃ.

[03] padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ adhīyati vedeti cāti ^b^padako veyyākaraṇo. lokāyataṃ^eb^ vuccati vitaṇḍavādasatthaṃ. ^b^mahāpurisalakkhaṇa^eb^nti mahāpurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpakaṃ dvādasasahassaganthapamāṇaṃ satthaṃ, yattha soḷasasahassagāthāpadaparimāṇā buddhamantā nāma ahesuṃ, yesaṃ vasena ``iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgatā buddhā nāma honti ^a^P2.0262^ea^, iminā paccekabuddhā, dve aggasāvakā, asīti mahāsāvakā, buddhamātā, buddhapitā, aggupaṭṭhākā, aggupaṭṭhāyikā, rājā cakkavattī''ti ayaṃ viseso ñāyati. ^b^anavayo^eb^ti imesu lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anūno paripūrakārī, avayo na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. avayo nāma yo tāni atthato ca ganthato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti. atha vā ^b^anavayo^eb^ti anu avayo, sandhivasena ukāralopo. anu avayo paripuṇṇasippoti attho.

[03] ^b^tena^eb^ ^a^V2.0144^ea^ ^b^hī^eb^ti idaṃ bhagavā naṃ āyācantaṃ disvā ``idānissa pañhaṃ kathetuṃ kālo''ti ñatvā āha. tassattho -- yasmā maṃ āyācasi, tasmā suṇāhīti. ^b^vivicceva kāmehī^eb^tiādi visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.70) vitthāritameva. idha panetaṃ tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattidassanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. tattha dvinnaṃ vijjānaṃ anupadavaṇṇanā ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 2.402 ādayo) vitthāritova.

[03] ^b^paṭhamā vijjā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ uppannāti paṭhamā, viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā. kiṃ viditaṃ karoti? pubbenivāsaṃ. ^b^avijjā^eb^ti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādako moho vuccati. ^b^tamo^eb^ti sveva moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamoti vuccati. ^b^āloko^eb^ti sāyeva vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena ālokoti vuccati. ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho ^a^M2.0147^ea^. sesaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. yojanā panettha ayamassa vijjā adhigatā, athassa adhigatavijjassa avijjā vihatā vinaṭṭhāti attho. kasmā? yasmā vijjā uppannā. itarasmimpi padadvaye eseva nayo. ^b^yathā ta^eb^nti ettha ^b^yathā^eb^ti opammaṃ, ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. satiyā avippavāsena ^b^appamattassa^eb^. vīriyātāpena ^b^ātāpino^eb^. kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya ^b^pahitattassa^eb^. pesitattassāti attho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya, vijjā uppajjeyya. tamo vihaññeyya, āloko uppajjeyya, evameva tassa avijjā vihatā ^a^P2.0263^ea^, vijjā uppannā. tamo vihato, āloko uppanno. etassa tena padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddhanti.
[03] cutūpapātakathāyaṃ ^b^vijjā^eb^ti dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjā. ^b^avijjā^eb^ti sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhippaṭicchādikā avijjā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] tatiyavijjāya ^b^so evaṃ samāhite citte^eb^ti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā^eb^ti arahattamaggañāṇatthāya. arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati, tatra cetaṃ ñāṇaṃ tattha pariyāpannattāti. ^b^cittaṃ abhininnāmetī^eb^ti vipassanācittaṃ abhinīharati. ^b^so idaṃ dukkha^eb^nti evamādīsu ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyoti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti paṭivijjhati, tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ ``ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo''ti, tadubhayampi yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhati ^a^V2.0145^ea^, taṃ tesaṃ apavattiṃ nibbānaṃ ``ayaṃ dukkhanirodho''ti. tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ``ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā''ti sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti paṭivijjhatīti evamattho veditabbo.

[03] evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ^b^ime āsavā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato^eb^ti tassa bhikkhuno evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa. saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathesi. ^b^kāmāsavā^eb^ti kāmāsavato. ^b^vimuccatī^eb^ti iminā maggakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. maggakkhaṇe hi cittaṃ vimuccati, phalakkhaṇe ^a^M2.0148^ea^ vimuttaṃ hoti. ^b^vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇa^eb^nti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti. ^b^khīṇā jātī^eb^tiādīhi tassa bhūmiṃ. tena hi ñāṇena so paccavekkhanto khīṇā jātītiādīni pajānāti. katamā panassa ^a^P2.0264^ea^ jāti khīṇā, kathañca naṃ pajānātīti? na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā, na anāgatā, anāgate vāyāmābhāvato, na paccuppannā, vijjamānattā. yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti, sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā. taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiappaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto pajānāti.

[03] ^b^vusita^eb^nti vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ, kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti maggabrahmacariyaṃ. puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma, khīṇāsavo vutthavāso. tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto ``vusitaṃ brahmacariya''nti pajānāti. ^b^kataṃ karaṇīya^eb^nti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ karonti, khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo. tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto ``kataṃ karaṇīya''nti pajānāti. ^b^nāparaṃ itthattāyā^eb^ti puna itthabhāvāya, evaṃ soḷasavidhakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti. atha vā ^b^itthattāyā^eb^ti itthabhāvato, imasmā evaṃ pakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi, ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya. te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti pajānāti. idha ^a^V2.0146^ea^ ^b^vijjā^eb^ti arahattamaggañāṇavijjā. ^b^avijjā^eb^ti catusaccappaṭicchādikā avijjā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^anuccāvacasīlassā^eb^ti yassa sīlaṃ kālena hāyati, kālena vaḍḍhati, so uccāvacasīlo nāma hoti. khīṇāsavassa pana sīlaṃ ^a^P2.0265^ea^ ekantavaḍḍhitameva. tasmā so anuccāvacasīlo nāma hoti. ^b^vasībhūta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0149^ea^ vasippattaṃ. ^b^susamāhita^eb^nti suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ, ārammaṇamhi suṭṭhapitaṃ. ^b^dhīra^eb^nti dhitisampannaṃ. ^b^maccuhāyina^eb^nti maccuṃ jahitvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^sabbappahāyina^eb^nti sabbe pāpadhamme pajahitvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^buddha^eb^nti catusaccabuddhaṃ. ^b^antimadehina^eb^nti sabbapacchimasarīradhārinaṃ. ^b^taṃ namassanti gotama^eb^nti taṃ gotamagottaṃ buddhasāvakā namassanti. atha vā gotamabuddhassa sāvakopi gotamo, taṃ gotamaṃ devamanussā namassantīti attho.

[03] ^b^pubbenivāsa^eb^nti pubbenivutthakkhandhaparamparaṃ. ^b^yovetī^eb^ti yo aveti avagacchati. yovedītipi pāṭho. yo avedi, viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ṭhitoti attho. ^b^saggāpāyañca passatī^eb^ti cha kāmāvacare nava brahmaloke cattāro ca apāye passati. ^b^jātikkhayaṃ patto^eb^ti arahattaṃ patto. ^b^abhiññāvosito^eb^ti jānitvā kiccavosānena vosito. ^b^munī^eb^ti moneyyena samannāgato khīṇāsavamuni. ^b^etāhī^eb^ti heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhāhi pubbenivāsañāṇādīhi. ^b^nāññaṃ lapitalāpana^eb^nti yo panañño tevijjoti aññehi lapitavacanamattameva lapati, tamahaṃ tevijjoti na vadāmi, attapaccakkhato ñatvā parassapi tisso vijjā kathentamevāhaṃ tevijjoti vadāmīti attho. ^b^kala^eb^nti koṭṭhāsaṃ. ^b^nāgghatī^eb^ti na pāpuṇāti. idāni brāhmaṇo bhagavato kathāya pasanno pasannākāraṃ karonto ^b^abhikkanta^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^yassassū^eb^ti yassa bhaveyyuṃ. ^b^yañño^eb^tiādīsu yajitabboti yañño, deyyadhammassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^saddha^eb^nti ^a^P2.0266^ea^ matakabhattaṃ. ^b^thālipāko^eb^ti varapurisānaṃ dātabbayuttaṃ bhattaṃ. ^b^deyyadhamma^eb^nti vuttāvasesaṃ yaṃkiñci deyyadhammaṃ nāma. ^b^tevijjesu brāhmaṇesu dānaṃ dadeyyā^eb^ti sabbametaṃ dānaṃ tevijjesu dadeyya, tevijjā brāhmaṇāva paṭiggahetuṃ yuttāti dasseti. sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V2.0147^ea^ ^b^saṅgāravo^eb^ti evaṃnāmako rājagahanagare jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇakārako āyuttakabrāhmaṇo. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti bhuttapātarāso hutvā mahājanaparivuto upasaṅkami. ^b^mayamassū^eb^ti ettha ^b^assū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0150^ea^ nipātamattaṃ, mayaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā nāmāti idameva atthapadaṃ. ^b^yaññaṃ yajāmā^eb^ti bāhirasamaye sabbacatukkena sabbaṭṭhakena sabbasoḷasakena sabbadvattiṃsāya sabbacatusaṭṭhiyā sabbasatena sabbapañcasatenāti ca evaṃ pāṇaghātapaṭisaṃyutto yañño nāma hoti. taṃ sandhāyevamāha. ^b^anekasārīrika^eb^nti anekasarīrasambhavaṃ. ^b^yadida^eb^nti yā esā. ^b^yaññādhikaraṇa^eb^nti yajanakāraṇā ceva yājanakāraṇā cāti attho. ekasmiñhi bahūnaṃ dadantepi dāpentepi bahūsupi bahūnaṃ dentesupi dāpentesupi puññapaṭipadā anekasārīrikā nāma hoti. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. tuyhañca tuyhañca yajāmīti vadantassāpi tvañca tvañca yajāhīti āṇāpentassāpi ca anekasārīrikāva hoti. tampi sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^yassa vā tassa vā^eb^ti yasmā vā tasmā vā. ^b^ekamattānaṃ dametī^eb^ti attano indriyadamanavasena ekaṃ attānameva dameti. ^b^ekamattānaṃ sametī^eb^ti attano rāgādisamanavasena ekaṃ attānameva sameti. ^b^parinibbāpetī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0267^ea^ rāgādiparinibbāneneva parinibbāpeti. ^b^evamassāya^eb^nti evaṃ santepi ayaṃ.

[03] evamidaṃ brāhmaṇassa kathaṃ sutvā satthā cintesi -- ``ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pasughātakasaṃyuttaṃ mahāyaññaṃ anekasārīrikaṃ puññapaṭipadaṃ vadeti, pabbajjāmūlakaṃ pana puññuppattipaṭipadaṃ ekasārīrikanti vadeti. nevāyaṃ ekasārīrikaṃ jānāti, na anekasārīrikaṃ, handassa ekasārīrikañca anekasārīrikañca paṭipadaṃ desessāmī''ti upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento ^b^tena hi brāhmaṇā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yathā te khameyyā^eb^ti yathā tuyhaṃ rucceyya. ^b^idha tathāgato loke uppajjatī^eb^tiādi visuddhimagge vitthāritameva. ^b^ethāyaṃ maggo^eb^ti etha tumhe, ahamanusāsāmi, ayaṃ maggo. ^b^ayaṃ paṭipadā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^yathā paṭipanno^eb^ti yena maggena paṭipanno. ^b^anuttaraṃ brahmacariyogadha^eb^nti arahattamaggasaṅkhātassa brahmacariyassa anuttaraṃ ogadhaṃ uttamapatiṭṭhābhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^iccāya^eb^nti iti ayaṃ.

[03] ^b^appaṭṭhatarā^eb^ti yattha bahūhi veyyāvaccakarehi vā upakaraṇehi vā attho natthi. ^b^appasamārambhatarā^eb^ti yattha bahūnaṃ kammacchedavasena pīḷāsaṅkhāto ^a^M2.0151^ea^ samārambho natthi. ^b^seyyathāpi bhavaṃ gotamo ^a^V2.0148^ea^, bhavaṃ cānando, ete me pujjā^eb^ti yathā bhavaṃ gotamo, bhavañcānando, evarūpā mama pūjitā, tumheyeva dve janā mayhaṃ pujjā ca pāsaṃsā cāti imamatthaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vadati. tassa kira evaṃ ahosi -- ``ānandatthero maṃyeva imaṃ pañhaṃ kathāpetukāmo, attano kho pana vaṇṇe vutte padussanako nāma natthī''ti. tasmā pañhaṃ akathetukāmo vaṇṇabhaṇanena vikkhepaṃ karonto evamāha.
[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P2.0268^ea^ ^b^kho tyāha^eb^nti na kho te ahaṃ. theropi kira cintesi -- ``ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pañhaṃ akathetukāmo parivattati, imaṃ pañhaṃ etaṃyeva kathāpessāmī''ti. tasmā naṃ evamāha.

[03] ^b^sahadhammika^eb^nti sakāraṇaṃ. ^b^saṃsādetī^eb^ti saṃsīdāpeti. ^b^no vissajjetī^eb^ti na katheti. ^b^yaṃnūnāhaṃ parimoceyya^eb^nti yaṃnūnāhaṃ ubhopete vihesato parimoceyyaṃ. brāhmaṇo hi ānandena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ akathento viheseti, ānandopi brāhmaṇaṃ akathentaṃ kathāpento. iti ubhopete vihesato mocessāmīti cintetvā evamāha. ^b^kā nvajjā^eb^ti kā nu ajja. ^b^antarākathā udapādī^eb^ti aññissā kathāya antarantare katarā kathā uppajjīti pucchati. tadā kira rājantepure tīṇi pāṭihāriyāni ārabbha kathā udapādi, taṃ pucchāmīti satthā evamāha. atha brāhmaṇo ``idāni vattuṃ sakkhissāmī''ti rājantepure uppannaṃ kathaṃ ārocento ^b^ayaṃ khvajja, bho gotamā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ayaṃ khvajjā^eb^ti ayaṃ kho ajja. ^b^pubbe suda^eb^nti ettha ^b^suda^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^uttari manussadhammā^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathasaṅkhātā manussadhammā uttariṃ. ^b^iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassesu^eb^nti bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā ākāseneva gamiṃsu ceva āgamiṃsu cāti evaṃ pubbe pavattaṃ ākāsagamanaṃ sandhāyevamāha. ^b^etarahi pana bahutarā ca bhikkhū^eb^ti idaṃ so brāhmaṇo ``pubbe bhikkhū `cattāro paccaye uppādessāmā'ti maññe evamakaṃsu, idāni paccayānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā soppena ceva pamādena ca vītināmentī''ti laddhiyā evamāha.

[03] ^b^pāṭihāriyānī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0152^ea^ paccanīkapaṭiharaṇavasena pāṭihāriyāni. ^b^iddhipāṭihāriya^eb^nti ijjhanavasena iddhi, paṭiharaṇavasena pāṭihāriyaṃ, iddhiyeva pāṭihāriyaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ. itaresupi ^a^P2.0269^ea^ eseva nayo. ^b^anekavihitaṃ iddhividha^eb^ntiādīnaṃ attho ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 2.365) vitthāritova.

[03] ^b^nimittena^eb^ ^a^V2.0149^ea^ ^b^ādisatī^eb^ti āgatanimittena vā gatanimittena vā ṭhitanimittena vā ``idaṃ nāma bhavissatī''ti katheti. tatridaṃ vatthu -- eko kira rājā tisso muttā gahetvā purohitaṃ pucchi ``kiṃ me, ācariya, hatthe''ti. so ito cito ca olokesi, tena ca samayena ekā sarabū ``makkhikaṃ gahessāmī''ti pakkhantā, gahaṇakāle makkhikā palātā. so makkhikāya muttattā ``muttā mahārājā''ti āha. muttā tāva hontu, kati muttāti. so puna nimittaṃ olokesi. athāvidūre kukkuṭo tikkhattuṃ saddaṃ nicchāresi. brāhmaṇo ``tisso mahārājā''ti āha. evaṃ ekacco āgatanimittena katheti. etenupāyena gataṭhitanimittehipi kathanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^evampi te mano^eb^ti evaṃ tava mano somanassito vā domanassito vā kāmavitakkādisaṃyutto vāti. dutiyaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^itipi te citta^eb^nti itipi tava cittaṃ, imañca imañca atthaṃ cintayamānaṃ pavattatīti attho. ^b^bahuṃ cepi ādisatī^eb^ti bahuṃ cepi katheti. ^b^tatheva taṃ hotī^eb^ti yathā kathitaṃ, tatheva hoti.

[03] ^b^amanussāna^eb^nti yakkhapisācādīnaṃ. ^b^devatāna^eb^nti cātumahārājikādīnaṃ. ^b^saddaṃ sutvā^eb^ti aññassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathentānaṃ sutvā. ^b^vitakkavipphārasadda^eb^nti vitakkavipphāravasena uppannaṃ vippalapantānaṃ suttappamattādīnaṃ saddaṃ. ^b^sutvā^eb^ti taṃ sutvā. yaṃ vitakkayato tassa so saddo uppanno, tassa vasena ``evampi te mano''tiādisati.

[03] tatrimāni vatthūni -- eko kira manusso ``aṭṭaṃ karissāmī''ti gāmā nagaraṃ gacchanto ^a^P2.0270^ea^ nikkhantaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya ``vinicchayasabhāyaṃ rañño ca rājamahāmattānañca idaṃ kathessāmi idaṃ kathessāmī''ti vitakkento rājakulaṃ gato viya rañño purato ṭhito viya aṭṭakārakena saddhiṃ ^a^M2.0153^ea^ kathento viya ca ahosi, tassa taṃ vitakkavipphāravasena niccharantaṃ saddaṃ sutvā eko puriso ``kenaṭṭhena gacchasī''ti āha. aṭṭakammenāti. gaccha, jayo te bhavissatīti. so gantvā aṭṭaṃ katvā jayameva pāpuṇi.

[03] aparopi thero moḷiyagāme piṇḍāya cari. atha naṃ nikkhamantaṃ ekā dārikā aññavihitā na addasa. so gāmadvāre ṭhatvā nivattitvā oloketvā taṃ disvā vitakkento agamāsi. gacchantoyeva ca ``kiṃ nu kho kurumānā dārikā na addasā''ti vacībhedaṃ akāsi. passe ṭhito eko puriso sutvā ``tumhe, bhante, moḷiyagāme caritthā''ti āha.
