[03] 71^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^tadahuposathe^eb^ti tasmiṃ ahu uposathe taṃ divasaṃ uposathe, pannarasikauposathadivaseti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya gandhamālādihatthā upasaṅkami. ^b^handā^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipāto. ^b^divā divassā^eb^ti divasassa divā nāma majjhanho, imasmiṃ ṭhite majjhanhike kāleti attho. ^b^kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasī^eb^ti kiṃ karontī vicarasīti pucchati. ^b^gopālakuposatho^eb^ti gopālakehi saddhiṃ upavasanauposatho. ^b^nigaṇṭhuposatho^eb^ti nigaṇṭhānaṃ upavasanauposatho. ^b^ariyuposatho^eb^ti ariyānaṃ upavasanauposatho. ^b^seyyathāpi visākhe^eb^ti yathā nāma, visākhe. ^b^sāyanhasamaye^eb^ ^a^M2.0194^ea^ ^b^sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātetvā^eb^ti gopālakā hi devasikavetanena vā pañcāhadasāhāddhamāsamāsachamāsasaṃvaccharaparicchedena vā gāvo gahetvā rakkhanti. idha pana devasikavetanena rakkhantaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ -- ^b^niyyātetvā^eb^ti paṭicchāpetvā ``etā vo gāvo''ti datvā. ^b^iti^eb^ ^a^P2.0321^ea^ ^b^paṭisañcikkhatī^eb^ti attano gehaṃ gantvā bhuñjitvā mañce nipanno evaṃ paccavekkhati. ^b^abhijjhāsahagatenā^eb^ti taṇhāya sampayuttena. ^b^evaṃ kho, visākhe, gopālakuposatho hotī^eb^ti ariyuposathova ayaṃ, aparisuddhavitakkatāya pana gopālakauposathaṭṭhāne ṭhito. ^b^na mahapphalo^eb^ti vipākaphalena na mahapphalo. ^b^na mahānisaṃso^eb^ti vipākānisaṃsena na mahānisaṃso. ^b^na mahājutiko^eb^ti vipākobhāsena na mahāobhāso. ^b^na mahāvipphāro^eb^ti vipākavipphārassa amahantatāya na mahāvipphāro.

[03] ^b^samaṇajātikā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0188^ea^ samaṇāyeva. ^b^paraṃ yojanasata^eb^nti yojanasataṃ atikkamitvā tato paraṃ. ^b^tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhī^eb^ti tesu yojanasatato parabhāgesu ṭhitesu sattesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipa, nikkhittadaṇḍo hohi. ^b^nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmi^eb^nti ahaṃ katthaci kassaci parassa kiñcanatasmiṃ na homi. kiñcanaṃ vuccati palibodho, palibodho na homīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcanatatthī^eb^ti mamāpi kvacani anto vā bahiddhā vā katthaci ekaparikkhārepi kiñcanatā natthi, palibodho natthi, chinnapalibodhohamasmīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^bhoge^eb^ti mañcapīṭhayāgubhattādayo. ^b^adinnaṃyeva paribhuñjatī^eb^ti punadivase mañce nipajjantopi pīṭhe nisīdantopi yāguṃ pivantopi bhattaṃ bhuñjantopi te bhoge adinneyeva paribhuñjati. ^b^na mahapphalo^eb^ti nipphalo. byañjanameva hi ettha sāvasesaṃ, attho pana niravaseso. evaṃ upavutthassa hi uposathassa appamattakampi vipākaphalaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ nāma natthi. tasmā nipphalotveva veditabbo. sesapadesupi ^a^P2.0322^ea^ eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassā^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā āha? saṃkiliṭṭhena hi cittena upavuttho uposatho na mahapphalo hotīti dassitattā visuddhena cittena upavutthassa mahapphalatā anuññātā hoti. tasmā yena kammaṭṭhānena cittaṃ visujjhati, taṃ cittavisodhanakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ idamāha ^a^M2.0195^ea^. tattha ^b^upakkamenā^eb^ti paccattapurisakārena, upāyena vā. ^b^tathāgataṃ anussaratī^eb^ti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgataguṇe anussarati. ettha hi ^b^itipi so bhagavā^eb^ti so bhagavā itipi sīlena, itipi samādhināti sabbe lokiyalokuttarā buddhaguṇā saṅgahitā. ^b^araha^eb^ntiādīhi pāṭiyekkaguṇāva niddiṭṭhā. ^b^tathāgataṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdatī^eb^ti lokiyalokuttare tathāgataguṇe anussarantassa cittuppādo pasanno hoti.

[03] ^b^cittassa upakkilesā^eb^ti pañca nīvaraṇā. ^b^kakka^eb^nti āmalakakakkaṃ. ^b^tajjaṃ vāyāma^eb^nti tajjātikaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ kakkena makkhanaghaṃsanadhovanavāyāmaṃ. ^b^pariyodapanā hotī^eb^ti suddhabhāvakaraṇaṃ hoti. kiliṭṭhasmiṃ hi sīse pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamāno na sobhati, parisuddhe pana tasmiṃ pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamāno sobhati, evameva kiliṭṭhacittena uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uposatho upavuttho na mahapphalo hoti, parisuddhena pana cittena uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya upavuttho uposatho mahapphalo hotīti adhippāyena evamāha. ^b^brahmuposathaṃ upavasatī^eb^ti brahmā vuccati sammāsambuddho, tassa guṇānussaraṇavasena ayaṃ uposatho brahmuposatho ^a^V2.0189^ea^ nāma, taṃ upavasati. ^b^brahmunā saddhiṃ saṃvasatī^eb^ti sammāsambuddhena saddhiṃ saṃvasati. ^b^brahmañcassa^eb^ ^a^P2.0323^ea^ ^b^ārabbhā^eb^ti sammāsambuddhaṃ ārabbha.

[03] ^b^dhammaṃ anussaratī^eb^ti sahatantikaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ anussarati. ^b^sotti^eb^nti kuruvindakasottiṃ. kuruvindakapāsāṇacuṇṇena hi saddhiṃ lākhaṃ yojetvā maṇike katvā vijjhitvā suttena āvuṇitvā taṃ maṇi kalāpapantiṃ ubhato gahetvā piṭṭhiṃ ghaṃsenti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``sottiñca paṭiccā''ti. ^b^cuṇṇa^eb^nti nhānīyacuṇṇaṃ. ^b^tajjaṃ vāyāma^eb^nti ubbaṭṭanaghaṃsanadhovanādikaṃ tadanurūpavāyāmaṃ. ^b^dhammuposatha^eb^nti sahatantikaṃ navalokuttaradhammaṃ ārabbha upavutthattā ayaṃ uposatho ``dhammuposatho''ti vutto. idhāpi ^b^pariyodapanā^eb^ti pade ṭhatvā purimanayeneva yojanā kātabbā.

[03] ^b^saṅghaṃ anussaratī^eb^ti aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ guṇe anussarati. ^b^usmañca paṭiccā^eb^ti dve tayo vāre gāhāpitaṃ usumaṃ paṭicca. usañcātipi pāṭho, ayamevattho ^a^M2.0196^ea^. ^b^khāra^eb^nti chārikaṃ. ^b^gomaya^eb^nti gomuttaṃ vā ajalaṇḍikā vā. ^b^pariyodapanā^eb^ti idhāpi purimanayeneva yojanā kātabbā. ^b^saṅghuposatha^eb^nti aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ guṇe ārabbha upavutthattā ayaṃ uposatho ``saṅghuposatho''ti vutto.

[03] ^b^sīlānī^eb^ti gahaṭṭho gahaṭṭhasīlāni, pabbajito pabbajitasīlāni. ^b^akhaṇḍānī^eb^tiādīnaṃ attho visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.21) vitthāritova. ^b^vālaṇḍupaka^eb^nti assavālehi vā makacivālādīhi vā kataṃ aṇḍupakaṃ. ^b^tajjaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0324^ea^ ^b^vāyāma^eb^nti telena temetvā malassa tintabhāvaṃ ñatvā chārikaṃ pakkhipitvā vālaṇḍupakena ghaṃsanavāyāmo. idha ^b^pariyodapanā^eb^ti pade ṭhatvā evaṃ yojanā kātabbā kiliṭṭhasmiñhi ādāse maṇḍitapasādhitopi attabhāvo olokiyamāno na sobhati, parisuddhe sobhati. evameva kiliṭṭhena cittena upavuttho uposatho na mahapphalo hoti, parisuddhena pana mahapphalo hotīti. ^b^sīluposatha^eb^nti attano sīlānussaraṇavasena upavuttho uposatho sīluposatho nāma. ^b^sīlena saddhi^eb^nti attano pañcasīladasasīlena saddhiṃ. ^b^sīlañcassa ārabbhā^eb^ti pañcasīlaṃ dasasīlañca ārabbha.

[03] ^b^devatā anussaratī^eb^ti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇe anussarati. ^b^ukka^eb^nti ^a^V2.0190^ea^ uddhanaṃ. ^b^loṇa^eb^nti loṇamattikā. ^b^geruka^eb^nti gerukacuṇṇaṃ. ^b^nāḷikasaṇḍāsa^eb^nti dhamananāḷikañceva parivattanasaṇḍāsañca. ^b^tajjaṃ vāyāma^eb^nti uddhane pakkhipanadhamanaparivattanādikaṃ anurūpaṃ vāyāmaṃ. idha ^b^pariyodapanā^eb^ti pade ṭhatvā evaṃ yojanā veditabbā -- saṃkiliṭṭhasuvaṇṇamayena hi pasādhanabhaṇḍena pasādhitā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamānā na sobhanti, parisuddhasuvaṇṇamayena sobhanti. evameva saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa uposatho na mahapphalo hoti, parisuddhacittassa mahapphalo. ^b^devatuposatha^eb^nti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇe anussarantena upavutthauposatho devatuposatho nāma. sesaṃ imesu buddhānussatiādīsu kammaṭṭhānesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.123 ādayo) vuttameva.

[03] ^b^pāṇātipāta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0197^ea^ pāṇavadhaṃ. ^b^pahāyā^eb^ti taṃ pāṇātipātacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā. ^b^paṭiviratā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0325^ea^ pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato oratā viratāva. ^b^nihitadaṇḍā nihitasatthā^eb^ti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍā ceva nikkhittasatthā cāti attho. ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vihiṃsanabhāvato satthanti veditabbaṃ. yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalakaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti, na taṃ parūpaghātatthāya. tasmā nihitadaṇḍā nihitasatthātveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. ^b^lajjī^eb^ti pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgatā. ^b^dayāpannā^eb^ti dayaṃ mettacittataṃ āpannā. ^b^sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī^eb^ti sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampakā, tāya eva dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakāti attho. ^b^ahampajjā^eb^ti ahampi ajja. ^b^imināpi aṅgenā^eb^ti imināpi guṇaṅgena. ^b^arahataṃ anukaromī^eb^ti yathā purato gacchantaṃ pacchato gacchanto anugacchati nāma, evaṃ ahampi arahantehi paṭhamaṃ kataṃ imaṃ guṇaṃ pacchā karonto tesaṃ arahantānaṃ anukaromi. ^b^uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatī^eb^ti evaṃ karontena mayā arahatañca anukataṃ bhavissati, uposatho ca upavuttho bhavissati.

[03] ^b^adinnādāna^eb^nti adinnassa parapariggahitassa ādānaṃ, theyyaṃ corikanti attho. dinnameva ādiyantīti ^b^dinnādāyī^eb^. cittenapi dinnameva paṭikaṅkhantīti ^b^dinnapāṭikaṅkhī^eb^. thenetīti theno, na thenena ^b^athenena^eb^. athenattāyeva ^b^sucibhūtena. attanā^eb^ti attabhāvena, athenaṃ ^a^P2.0326^ea^ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharantīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^abrahmacariya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0191^ea^ aseṭṭhacariyaṃ. brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ācāraṃ carantīti ^b^brahmacārī^eb^. ^b^ārācārī^eb^ti abrahmacariyato dūrācārī. ^b^methunā^eb^ti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunoti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā. ^b^gāmadhammā^eb^ti gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammā.

[03] ^b^musāvādā^eb^ti alikavacanā tucchavacanā. saccaṃ vadantīti ^b^saccavādī^eb^. saccena saccaṃ saṃdahanti ghaṭṭentīti ^b^saccasandhā,^eb^ na antarantarā musā vadantīti attho ^a^M2.0198^ea^. yo hi puriso kadāci musāvādaṃ vadati, kadāci saccaṃ. tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati. tasmā na so saccasandho. ime pana na tādisā, jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ saṃdahantiyevāti saccasandhā. ^b^thetā^eb^ti thirā, ṭhitakathāti attho. eko puggalo haliddirāgo viya thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇu viya assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na ṭhitakatho hoti. eko pāsāṇalekhā viya indakhīlo viya ca ṭhitakatho hoti, asinā sīsaṃ chindantepi dve kathā na katheti. ayaṃ vuccati theto. ^b^paccayikā^eb^ti pattiyāyitabbakā, saddhāyikāti attho. ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti, ``idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukena nāmā''ti vutte ``mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā''ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. eko paccayiko hoti, ``idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā''ti vutte ``yadi tena vuttaṃ, idameva pamāṇaṃ, idāni paṭikkhipitabbaṃ natthi, evamevaṃ ida''nti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. ayaṃ vuccati paccayiko. ^b^avisaṃvādakā^eb^ ^a^P2.0327^ea^ ^b^lokassā^eb^ti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādentīti attho.

[03] ^b^surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāna^eb^nti surāmerayamajjānaṃ pānacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ pamādakāraṇaṃ. ^b^ekabhattikā^eb^ti pātarāsabhattaṃ sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni. tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ antomajjhanhikena paricchinnaṃ, itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ antoaruṇena. tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānāpi ekabhattikāva honti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``ekabhattikā''ti. rattibhojanaṃ ratti, tato uparatāti ^b^rattūparatā^eb^. atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma, tato viratattā ^b^viratā vikālabhojanā^eb^.

[03] sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇibhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ, attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccañca gītañca vāditañca, antamaso mayūranaccanādivasenāpi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtaṃ dassanañcāti ^b^naccagītavāditavisūkadassanaṃ^eb^. naccādīni hi attanā ^a^V2.0192^ea^ payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ, na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti.

[03] ^b^mālā^eb^dīsu ^a^M2.0199^ea^ ^b^mālā^eb^ti yaṃkiñci pupphaṃ. ^b^gandha^eb^nti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ. ^b^vilepana^eb^nti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. tattha piḷandhanto ^b^dhāreti^eb^ nāma, ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrento ^b^maṇḍeti^eb^ nāma, gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto ^b^vibhūseti^eb^ nāma. ^b^ṭhānaṃ^eb^ vuccati kāraṇaṃ, tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratāti attho. ^b^uccāsayanaṃ^eb^ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ, ^b^mahāsayanaṃ^eb^ akappiyattharaṇaṃ, tato paṭiviratāti attho.

[03] ^b^kīvamahapphalo^eb^ti kittakaṃ mahapphalo. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^pahūtarattaratanāna^eb^nti pahūtena rattasaṅkhātena ratanena samannāgatānaṃ, sakalajambudīpatalaṃ bheritalasadisaṃ ^a^P2.0328^ea^ katvā kaṭippamāṇehi sattahi ratanehi pūritānanti attho. ^b^issariyādhipacca^eb^nti issarabhāvena vā issariyameva vā ādhipaccaṃ, na ettha sāhasikakammantipi issariyādhipaccaṃ. ^b^rajjaṃ kāreyyā^eb^ti evarūpaṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ kāreyya. ^b^aṅgāna^eb^ntiādīni tesaṃ janapadānaṃ nāmāni. ^b^kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasi^eb^nti ekaṃ ahorattaṃ upavutthauposathe puññaṃ soḷasabhāge katvā tato ekaṃ bhāgañca na agghati. ekarattuposathassa soḷasiyā kalāya yaṃ vipākaphalaṃ, taṃyeva tato bahutaraṃ hotīti attho. ^b^kapaṇa^eb^nti parittakaṃ.

[03] ^b^abrahmacariyā^eb^ti aseṭṭhacariyato. ^b^rattiṃ na bhuñjeyya vikālabhojana^eb^nti uposathaṃ upavasanto rattibhojanañca divāvikālabhojanañca na bhuñjeyya. ^b^mañce chamāyaṃva sayetha santhate^eb^ti muṭṭhihatthapādake kappiyamañce vā sudhādiparikammakatāya bhūmiyaṃ vā tiṇapaṇṇapalālādīni santharitvā kate santhate vā sayethāti attho. ^b^etaṃ hi aṭṭhaṅgikamāhuposatha^eb^nti evaṃ pāṇātipātādīni asamācarantena upavutthaṃ uposathaṃ aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatattā aṭṭhaṅgikanti vadanti. taṃ pana upavasantena ``sve uposathiko bhavissāmī''ti ajjeva ``idañca idañca kareyyāthā''ti āhārādividhānaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. uposathadivase pātova bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā dasasīlalakkhaṇaññuno upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā santike vācaṃ bhinditvā ^a^M2.0200^ea^ uposathaṅgāni samādātabbāni. pāḷiṃ ajānantena pana ``buddhapaññattaṃ uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī''ti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. aññaṃ alabhantena attanāpi adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ, vacībhedo pana kātabboyeva ^a^V2.0193^ea^. uposathaṃ upavasantena parūparodhapaṭisaṃyuttā kammantā na vicāretabbā, āyavayagaṇanaṃ ^a^P2.0329^ea^ karontena na vītināmetabbaṃ, gehe pana āhāraṃ labhitvā niccabhattikabhikkhunā viya paribhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammo vā sotabbo, aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu aññataraṃ vā manasikātabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^sudassanā^eb^ti sundaradassanā. ^b^obhāsaya^eb^nti obhāsayamānā. ^b^anupariyantī^eb^ti vicaranti. ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ. ^b^antalikkhagā^eb^ti ākāsaṅgamā. ^b^pabhāsantī^eb^ti jotanti pabhā muñcanti. ^b^disāvirocanā^eb^ti sabbadisāsu virocamānā. atha vā ^b^pabhāsantī^eb^ti disāhi disā obhāsanti. ^b^virocanā^eb^ti virocamānā. ^b^veḷuriya^eb^nti maṇīti vatvāpi iminā jātimaṇibhāvaṃ dasseti. ekavassikaveḷuvaṇṇañhi veḷuriyaṃ jātimaṇi nāma. taṃ sandhāyevamāha. ^b^bhaddaka^eb^nti laddhakaṃ. ^b^siṅgīsuvaṇṇa^eb^nti gosiṅgasadisaṃ hutvā uppannattā evaṃ nāmakaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ. ^b^kañcana^eb^nti pabbateyyaṃ pabbate jātasuvaṇṇaṃ. ^b^jātarūpa^eb^nti satthuvaṇṇasuvaṇṇaṃ. ^b^haṭaka^eb^nti kipillikāhi nīhaṭasuvaṇṇaṃ. ^b^nānubhavantī^eb^ti na pāpuṇanti. ^b^candappabhā^eb^ti sāmiatthe paccattaṃ, candappabhāyāti attho. ^b^upavassuposatha^eb^nti upavasitvā uposathaṃ. ^b^sukhudrayānī^eb^ti sukhaphalāni sukhavedanīyāni. ^b^saggamupenti ṭhāna^eb^nti saggasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchanti, kenaci aninditā hutvā devaloke uppajjantīti attho. sesamettha yaṃ antarantarā na vuttaṃ, taṃ vuttānusāreneva veditabbanti.
[06] mahāvaggo dutiyo.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0194^ea^ ^a^P2.0330^ea^ paṭhame ^b^channo^eb^ti evaṃnāmako channaparibbājako. ^b^tumhepi^eb^, ^b^āvuso^eb^ti, āvuso, yathā mayaṃ rāgādīnaṃ pahānaṃ paññāpema, kiṃ evaṃ tumhepi paññāpethāti pucchati. tato thero ``ayaṃ paribbājako amhe rāgādīnaṃ pahānaṃ paññāpemāti vadati, natthi panetaṃ ^a^M2.0201^ea^ bāhirasamaye''ti taṃ paṭikkhipanto ^b^mayaṃ kho, āvuso^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kho^eb^ti avadhāraṇatthe nipāto, mayameva paññāpemāti attho. tato paribbājako cintesi ``ayaṃ thero bāhirasamayaṃ luñcitvā haranto `mayamevā'ti āha. kiṃ nu kho ādīnavaṃ disvā ete etesaṃ pahānaṃ paññāpentī''ti. atha theraṃ pucchanto ^b^kiṃ pana tumhe^eb^tiādimāha. thero tassa byākaronto ^b^ratto kho^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^attattha^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ attano atthaṃ. paratthaubhayatthesupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^andhakaraṇo^eb^tiādīsu yassa rāgo uppajjati, taṃ yathābhūtadassananivāraṇena andhaṃ karotīti andhakaraṇo. paññācakkhuṃ na karotīti ^b^acakkhukaraṇo^eb^. ñāṇaṃ na karotīti ^b^aññāṇakaraṇo^eb^. kammassakatapaññā jhānapaññā vipassanāpaññāti imā tisso paññā appavattikaraṇena nirodhetīti ^b^paññānirodhiko^eb^. aniṭṭhaphaladāyakattā dukkhasaṅkhātassa vighātasseva pakkhe vattatīti ^b^vighātapakkhiko^eb^. kilesanibbānaṃ na saṃvattetīti ^b^anibbānasaṃvattaniko. alañca panāvuso ānanda, appamādāyā^eb^ti, āvuso ānanda, sace evarūpā paṭipadā atthi, alaṃ tumhākaṃ appamādāya yuttaṃ anucchavikaṃ, appamādaṃ karotha, āvusoti therassa vacanaṃ anumoditvā pakkāmi. imasmiṃ sutte ariyamaggo lokuttaramissako kathito. sesamettha ^a^P2.0331^ea^ uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V2.0195^ea^ ^b^tena hi gahapatī^eb^ti thero kira cintesi -- ``ayaṃ idha āgacchanto na aññātukāmo hutvā āgami, pariggaṇhanatthaṃ pana āgato. iminā pucchitapañhaṃ imināva kathāpessāmī''ti. iti taṃyeva kathaṃ kathāpetukāmo ^b^tena hī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^tena hī^eb^ti kāraṇāpadeso. yasmā tvaṃ evaṃ pucchasi, tasmā taññevettha paṭipucchāmīti. ^b^kesaṃ no^eb^ti katamesaṃ nu. ^b^sadhammukkaṃsanā^eb^ti attano laddhiyā ukkhipitvā ṭhapanā. ^b^paradhammāpasādanā^eb^ti paresaṃ laddhiyā ghaṭṭanā vambhanā avakkhipanā. ^b^āyataneva dhammadesanā^eb^ti kāraṇasmiṃyeva dhammadesanā. ^b^attho ca vutto^eb^ti mayā pucchitapañhāya attho ca pakāsito ^a^M2.0202^ea^. ^b^attā ca anupanīto^eb^ti amhe evarūpāti evaṃ attā ca na upanīto. nupanītotipi pāṭho.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^gilānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti gilāno hutvā vuṭṭhito. ^b^gelaññā^eb^ti gilānabhāvato. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti bhuttapātarāso mālāgandhādīni ādāya mahāparivāraparivuto upasaṅkami. ^b^bāhāyaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti na bāhāyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhi, nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhāya tassa santikaṃ gantvā dakkhiṇabāhāyaṃ aṅguṭṭhakena saññaṃ datvā ekamantaṃ apanesīti veditabbo. athassa ``sekhampi kho, mahānāma, sīla''ntiādinā nayena sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ sīlañca samādhiñca paññañca kathetvā upari arahattaphalavasena asekhā sīlasamādhipaññāyo kathento -- ``sekhasamādhito sekhaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ asekhañca phalañāṇaṃ pacchā, sekhavipassanāñāṇato ca asekhaphalasamādhi pacchā uppajjatī''ti dīpesi. yāni pana sampayuttāni samādhiñāṇāni, tesaṃ apacchā apure uppatti veditabbāti.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^P2.0332^ea^ ^b^kūṭāgārasālāya^eb^nti dve kaṇṇikā gahetvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katāya gandhakuṭiyā. ^b^aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānātī^eb^ti appamattakampi asesetvā sabbaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti. ^b^satataṃ samita^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ nirantaraṃ. ^b^ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhita^eb^nti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ^a^V2.0196^ea^ mayhaṃ upaṭṭhitamevāti dasseti. ^b^purāṇānaṃ kammāna^eb^nti āyūhitakammānaṃ. ^b^tapasā byantībhāva^eb^nti dukkaratapena vigatantakaraṇaṃ. ^b^navānaṃ kammāna^eb^nti idāni āyūhitabbakammānaṃ. ^b^akaraṇā^eb^ti anāyūhanena. ^b^setughāta^eb^nti padaghātaṃ paccayaghātaṃ katheti. ^b^kammakkhayā dukkhakkhayo^eb^ti kammavaṭṭakkhayena dukkhakkhayo. ^b^dukkhakkhayā vedanākkhayo^eb^ti dukkhavaṭṭakkhayena vedanākkhayo. dukkhavaṭṭasmiñhi khīṇe vedanāvaṭṭampi khīṇameva hoti. ^b^vedanākkhayā sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ bhavissatī^eb^ti vedanākkhayena pana sakalavaṭṭadukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇameva bhavissati. ^b^sandiṭṭhikāyā^eb^ti sāmaṃ passitabbāya paccakkhāya. ^b^nijjarāya visuddhiyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0203^ea^ kilesajīraṇakapaṭipadāya kilese vā nijjīraṇato nijjarāya sattānaṃ visuddhiyā. ^b^samatikkamo hotī^eb^ti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa atikkamo hoti. ^b^idha, bhante, bhagavā kimāhā^eb^ti, bhante, bhagavā imāya paṭipattiyā kimāha, kiṃ etaṃyeva kilesanijjīraṇakapaṭipadaṃ paññapeti, udāhu aññanti pucchati.

[03] ^b^jānatā^eb^ti anāvaraṇañāṇena jānantena. ^b^passatā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0333^ea^ samantacakkhunā passantena. ^b^visuddhiyā^eb^ti visuddhisampāpanatthāya. ^b^samatikkamāyā^eb^ti samatikkamanatthāya. ^b^atthaṅgamāyā^eb^ti atthaṃ gamanatthāya. ^b^ñāyassa adhigamāyā^eb^ti saha vipassanāya maggassa adhigamanatthāya. ^b^nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā^eb^ti apaccayanibbānassa sacchikaraṇatthāya. ^b^navañca kammaṃ na karotī^eb^ti navaṃ kammaṃ nāyūhati. ^b^purāṇañca kamma^eb^nti pubbe āyūhitakammaṃ. ^b^phussa phussa byantī karotī^eb^ti phusitvā phusitvā vigatantaṃ karoti, vipākaphassaṃ phusitvā phusitvā taṃ kammaṃ khepetīti attho. ^b^sandiṭṭhikā^eb^ti sāmaṃ passitabbā. ^b^akālikā^eb^ti na kālantare kiccakārikā. ^b^ehipassikā^eb^ti ``ehi passā''ti evaṃ dassetuṃ yuttā. ^b^opaneyyikā^eb^ti upanaye yuttā allīyitabbayuttā. ^b^paccattaṃ veditabbā viññūhī^eb^ti paṇḍitehi attano attano santāneyeva jānitabbā, bālehi pana dujjānā. iti sīlavasena dve maggā, dve ca phalāni kathitāni. sotāpannasakadāgāmino hi sīlesu paripūrakārinoti. ^b^vivicceva kāmehī^eb^tiādikāya pana samādhisampadāya tayo maggā, tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni. anāgāmī ariyasāvako hi samādhimhi paripūrakārīti vutto. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayā^eb^tiādīhi arahattaphalaṃ kathitaṃ. keci pana sīlasamādhayopi arahattaphalasampayuttāva idha adhippetā. ekekassa pana vasena paṭipattidassanatthaṃ visuṃ visuṃ tanti āropitāti.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V2.0197^ea^ ^b^amaccā^eb^ti suhajjā. ^b^ñātī^eb^ti sassusasurapakkhikā. ^b^sālohitā^eb^ti samānalohitā bhātibhaginiādayo. ^b^aveccappasāde^eb^ti guṇe avecca jānitvā uppanne acalappasāde. ^b^aññathatta^eb^nti bhāvaññathattaṃ ^a^M2.0204^ea^. ^b^pathavīdhātuyā^eb^tiādīsu vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhākārabhūtāya ^a^P2.0334^ea^ pathavīdhātuyā, dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesu yūsagatāya ābandhanabhūtāya āpodhātuyā, catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paripācanabhūtāya tejodhātuyā, chasu koṭṭhāsesu vitthambhanabhūtāya vāyodhātuyā siyā aññathattaṃ. ^b^na tvevā^eb^ti imesaṃ hi catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññabhāvūpagamanena siyā aññathattaṃ, ariyasāvakassa pana na tveva siyāti dasseti. ettha ca ^b^aññathatta^eb^nti pasādaññathattañca gatiaññathattañca. tañhi tassa na hoti, bhāvaññathattaṃ pana hoti. ariyasāvako hi manusso hutvā devopi hoti brahmāpi. pasādo panassa bhavantarepi na vigacchati, na ca apāyagatisaṅkhātaṃ gatiaññathattaṃ pāpuṇāti. satthāpi tadeva dassento ^b^tatridaṃ aññathatta^eb^ntiādimāha. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^kāmadhātuvepakka^eb^nti kāmadhātuyā vipaccanakaṃ. ^b^kāmabhavo^eb^ti kāmadhātuyaṃ upapattibhavo. ^b^kammaṃ khetta^eb^nti kusalākusalakammaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena khettaṃ. ^b^viññāṇaṃ bīja^eb^nti sahajātaṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ viruhanaṭṭhena bījaṃ. ^b^taṇhā sneho^eb^ti paggaṇhanānubrūhanavasena taṇhā udakaṃ nāma. ^b^avijjānīvaraṇāna^eb^nti avijjāya āvaritānaṃ. ^b^taṇhāsaṃyojanāna^eb^nti taṇhābandhanena baddhānaṃ. ^b^hīnāya dhātuyā^eb^ti kāmadhātuyā. ^b^viññāṇaṃ patiṭṭhita^eb^nti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ. ^b^majjhimāya dhātuyā^eb^ti rūpadhātuyā. ^b^paṇītāya dhātuyā^eb^ti arūpadhātuyā. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[03] 78^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^cetanā^eb^ti kammacetanā. ^b^patthanā^eb^pi kammapatthanāva. sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0198^ea^ ^a^P2.0335^ea^ ^b^sīlabbata^eb^nti sīlañceva vatañca. ^b^jīvita^eb^nti dukkarakārikānuyogo. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti brahmacariyavāso. ^b^upaṭṭhānasāra^eb^nti upaṭṭhānena sāraṃ ^a^M2.0205^ea^, ``idaṃ varaṃ idaṃ niṭṭhā''ti evaṃ upaṭṭhitanti attho. ^b^saphala^eb^nti saudrayaṃ savaḍḍhikaṃ hotīti pucchati. ^b^na khvettha, bhante, ekaṃsenā^eb^ti, bhante, na kho ettha ekaṃsena byākātabbanti attho. ^b^upaṭṭhānasāraṃ sevato^eb^ti idaṃ sāraṃ varaṃ niṭṭhāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ sevamānassa. ^b^aphala^eb^nti iṭṭhaphalena aphalaṃ. ettāvatā kammavādikiriyavādīnaṃ pabbajjaṃ ṭhapetvā seso sabbopi bāhirakasamayo gahito hoti. ^b^saphala^eb^nti iṭṭhaphalena saphalaṃ saudrayaṃ. ettāvatā imaṃ sāsanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbāpi kammavādikiriyavādīnaṃ pabbajjā gahitā. ^b^na ca panassa sulabharūpo samasamo paññāyā^eb^ti evaṃ sekkhabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā pañhaṃ kathento assa ānandassa paññāya samasamo na sulabhoti dasseti. imasmiṃ sutte sekkhabhūmi nāma kathitāti.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto dasabalassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano divāvihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ``imasmiṃ loke mūlagandho nāma atthi, sāragandho nāma atthi, pupphagandho nāma atthi. ime pana tayopi gandhā anuvātaṃyeva gacchanti, na paṭivātaṃ. atthi nu kho kiñci, yassa paṭivātampi gandho gacchatī''ti cintetvā aṭṭhannaṃ varānaṃ gahaṇakāleyeva kaṅkhuppattisamaye upasaṅkamanavarassa gahitattā takkhaṇaṃyeva divāṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno uppannāya kaṅkhāya vinodanatthaṃ etaṃ ``tīṇimāni, bhante''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. tattha ^b^gandhajātānī^eb^ti gandhajātiyo. ^b^mūlagandho^eb^ti ^a^P2.0336^ea^ mūlavatthuko gandho, gandhasampannaṃ vā mūlameva mūlagandho. tassa hi gandho anuvātaṃ gacchati. gandhassa pana gandho nāma natthi. ^b^sāragandhapupphagandhesu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^atthānanda, kiñci gandhajāta^eb^nti ettha saraṇagamanādayo guṇavaṇṇabhāsanavasena disāgāmitāya gandhasadisattā gandhā, tesaṃ vatthubhūto puggalo gandhajātaṃ nāma. ^b^gandho gacchatī^eb^ti vaṇṇabhāsanavasena gacchati. ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti pañcasīlena vā dasasīlena vā sīlavā. ^b^kalyāṇadhammo^eb^ti teneva sīladhammena kalyāṇadhammo sundaradhammo. ^b^vigatamalamaccherenā^eb^tiādīnaṃ ^a^V2.0199^ea^ attho visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.160) vitthāritova. ^b^disāsū^eb^ti catūsu disāsu catūsu anudisāsu ^a^M2.0206^ea^. ^b^samaṇabrāhmaṇā^eb^ti samitapāpabāhitapāpā samaṇabrāhmaṇā.

[03] ^b^na pupphagandho paṭivātametī^eb^ti vassikapupphādīnaṃ gandho paṭivātaṃ na gacchati. ^b^na candanaṃ tagaramallikā vā^eb^ti candanatagaramallikānampi gandho paṭivātaṃ na gacchatīti attho. devalokepi phuṭasumanā nāma hoti, tassā pupphitadivase gandho yojanasataṃ ajjhottharati. sopi paṭivātaṃ vidatthimattampi ratanamattampi gantuṃ na sakkotīti vadanti. ^b^satañca gandho paṭivātametī^eb^ti satañca paṇḍitānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhaputtānaṃ sīlādiguṇagandho paṭivātaṃ gacchati. ^b^sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyatī^eb^ti sappuriso paṇḍito sīlādiguṇagandhena sabbā disā pavāyati, sabbā disā gandhena avattharatīti attho.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ dasamassa duvidho nikkhepo atthuppattikopi pucchāvasikopi. katarātthuppattiyaṃ kassa pucchāya kathitanti ce? aruṇavatisuttantātthuppattiyaṃ (saṃ0 ni0 1.185 ādayo) ānandattherassa pucchāya kathitaṃ. aruṇavatisuttanto kena kathitoti? dvīhi ^a^P2.0337^ea^ buddhehi kathito sikhinā ca bhagavatā amhākañca satthārā. imasmā hi kappā ekatiṃsakappamatthake aruṇavatinagare aruṇavato rañño pabhāvatiyā nāma mahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattitvā paripakke ñāṇe mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā sikhī bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko aruṇavatiṃ nissāya viharanto ekadivasaṃ pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro ``aruṇavatiṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmī''ti nikkhamitvā vihāradvārakoṭṭhakasamīpe ṭhito abhibhuṃ nāma aggasāvakaṃ āmantesi -- ``atippago kho, bhikkhu, aruṇavatiṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ, yena aññataro brahmaloko tenupasaṅkamissāmā''ti. yathāha --

[02] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho abhibhuṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi -- `āyāma, brāhmaṇa, yena aññataro brahmaloko ^a^M2.0207^ea^ tenupasaṅkamissāma, na tāva bhattakālo bhavissatī'ti. `evaṃ, bhante'ti kho, bhikkhave, abhibhū bhikkhu sikhissa ^a^V2.0200^ea^ bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa paccassosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho abhibhū ca bhikkhu yena aññataro brahmaloko tenupasaṅkamiṃsū''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.185).

[03] tattha mahābrahmā sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā attamano paccuggamanaṃ katvā brahmāsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi, therassāpi anucchavikaṃ āsanaṃ paññāpayiṃsu. nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane, theropi attano paññattāsane nisīdi. mahābrahmāpi dasabalaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.

[03] atha kho, bhikkhave, sikhī bhagavā abhibhuṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi -- ``paṭibhātu taṃ, brāhmaṇa, brahmuno ca brahmaparisāya ca brahmapārisajjānañca dhammīkathāti. `evaṃ, bhante'ti kho, bhikkhave, abhibhū bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa paṭissuṇitvā brahmuno ca brahmaparisāya ca brahmapārisajjānañca dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. there dhammaṃ kathente brahmagaṇā ujjhāyiṃsu ^a^P2.0338^ea^ -- ``cirassañca mayaṃ satthu brahmalokāgamanaṃ labhimha, ayañca bhikkhu ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ sayaṃ dhammakathaṃ ārabhī''ti.

[03] satthā tesaṃ anattamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā abhibhuṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca -- ``ujjhāyanti kho te, brāhmaṇa, brahmā ca brahmaparisā ca brahmapārisajjā ca. tena hi tvaṃ -- brāhmaṇa, bhiyyosomattāya saṃvejehī''ti. thero satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā anekavihitaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ katvā sahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpento ``ārambhatha nikkamathā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.185) gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi. kiṃ pana katvā thero sahassilokadhātuṃ viññāpesīti? nīlakasiṇaṃ tāva samāpajjitvā sabbattha andhakāraṃ phari, tato ``kimidaṃ andhakāra''nti sattānaṃ ābhoge uppanne ālokaṃ dassesi. ``kiṃ āloko aya''nti vicinantānaṃ attānaṃ dassesi, sahassacakkavāḷe devamanussā añjaliṃ paggaṇhitvā paggaṇhitvā theraṃyeva namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. thero ``mahājano mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desentassa saraṃ suṇātū''ti imā ^a^M2.0208^ea^ gāthā abhāsi. sabbe osaṭāya parisāya majjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentassa viya saddaṃ assosuṃ. atthopi nesaṃ pākaṭo ahosi.

[03] atha kho bhagavā saddhiṃ therena aruṇavatiṃ paccāgantvā piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto ^a^V2.0201^ea^ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchi -- ``assuttha no tumhe, bhikkhave, abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke ṭhitassa gāthāyo bhāsamānassā''ti. te ``āma, bhante''ti paṭijānitvā sutabhāvaṃ āvikarontā tadeva gāthādvayaṃ udāhariṃsu. satthā ``sādhu sādhū''ti sādhukāraṃ datvā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi. evaṃ tāva idaṃ suttaṃ ito ekatiṃsakappamatthake sikhinā bhagavatā kathitaṃ.

[03] amhākaṃ pana bhagavā sabbaññutaṃ patto pavattitavaradhammacakko sāvatthiṃ upanissāya jetavane viharanto jeṭṭhamūlamāsapuṇṇamadivase bhikkhū āmantetvā imaṃ aruṇavatisuttaṃ ^a^P2.0339^ea^ paṭṭhapesi. ānandatthero bījaniṃ gahetvā bījayamāno ṭhitakova ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā ekabyañjanampi ahāpetvā sakalasuttaṃ uggaṇhi. so punadivase piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto dasabalassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano divāvihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā saddhivihārikantevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā pakkantesu hiyyo kathitaṃ aruṇavatisuttaṃ āvajjento nisīdi. athassa sabbaṃ suttaṃ vibhūtaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. so cintesi -- ``sikhissa bhagavato aggasāvako brahmaloke ṭhatvā cakkavāḷasahasse andhakāraṃ vidhametvā sarīrobhāsaṃ dassetvā attano saddaṃ sāvento dhammakathaṃ kathesīti hiyyo satthārā kathitaṃ, sāvakassa tāva visayo evarūpo, dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto pana sammāsambuddho kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ sarena viññāpeyyā''ti. so evaṃ uppannāya vimatiyā vinodanatthaṃ taṅkhaṇeyeva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi. etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^atha kho āyasmā ānando^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^sammukhā^eb^ti sammukhībhūtena mayā etaṃ sutaṃ, na anussavena, na dūtaparamparāyāti iminā adhippāyena evamāha. ^b^kīvatakaṃ pahoti sarena viññāpetu^eb^nti kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ sarīrobhāsena vihatandhakāraṃ katvā sarena viññāpetuṃ sakkoti. ^b^sāvako so, ānanda, appameyyā tathāgatā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0209^ea^ idaṃ bhagavā iminā adhippāyenāha -- ānanda, tvaṃ kiṃ vadesi, so padesañāṇe ṭhito sāvako. tathāgatā pana dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattā appameyyā. so tvaṃ nakhasikhāya paṃsuṃ gahetvā mahāpathavipaṃsunā saddhiṃ upamento viya kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadesi. añño hi sāvakānaṃ visayo, añño buddhānaṃ. añño sāvakānaṃ gocaro, añño buddhānaṃ. aññaṃ sāvakānaṃ balaṃ, aññaṃ buddhānanti. iti bhagavā iminā adhippāyena appameyyabhāvaṃ vatvā tuṇhī ahosi.

[03] thero ^a^V2.0202^ea^ ^a^P2.0340^ea^ dutiyampi pucchi. satthā, ``ānanda, tvaṃ tāḷacchiddaṃ gahetvā anantākāsena upamento viya, cātakasakuṇaṃ gahetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikena supaṇṇarājena upamento viya, hatthisoṇḍāya udakaṃ gahetvā mahāgaṅgāya upamento viya, caturatanike āvāṭe udakaṃ gahetvā sattahi sarehi upamento viya, nāḷikodanamattalābhiṃ manussaṃ gahetvā cakkavattiraññā upamento viya, paṃsupisācakaṃ gahetvā sakkena devaraññā upamento viya, khajjopanakappabhaṃ gahetvā sūriyappabhāya upamento viya kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadesīti dīpento dutiyampi appameyyabhāvameva vatvā tuṇhī ahosi. tato thero cintesi -- ``satthā mayā pucchito na tāva kathesi, handa naṃ yāvatatiyaṃ yācitvā buddhasīhanādaṃ nadāpessāmī''ti. so tatiyampi yāci. taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^tatiyampi kho^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. athassa bhagavā byākaronto ^b^sutā te ānandā^eb^tiādimāha. thero cintesi -- ``satthā me `sutā te, ānanda, sahassī cūḷanikā lokadhātū'ti ettakameva vatvā tuṇhī jāto, idāni buddhasīhanādaṃ nadissatī''ti so satthāraṃ yācanto ^b^etassa bhagavā kālo^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] bhagavāpissa vitthārakathaṃ kathetuṃ ^b^tena hānandā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ. ^b^candimasūriyā^eb^ti candimā ca sūriyo ca. ^b^pariharantī^eb^ti vicaranti. ^b^disā bhantī^eb^ti sabbadisā obhāsanti. ^b^virocanā^eb^ti virocamānā. ettāvatā ekacakkavāḷaṃ paricchinditvā dassitaṃ hoti. idāni taṃ sahassaguṇaṃ katvā dassento ^b^tāva sahassadhā loko^eb^ti āha. ^b^tasmiṃ sahassadhā loke^eb^ti tasmiṃ sahassacakkavāḷe. ^b^sahassaṃ cātumahārājikāna^eb^nti ^a^M2.0210^ea^ sahassaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ devalokānaṃ. yasmā pana ekekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe cattāro cattāro mahārājāno ^a^P2.0341^ea^, tasmā ^b^cattāri mahārājasahassānī^eb^ti vuttaṃ. iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. ^b^cūḷanikā^eb^ti khuddikā. ayaṃ sāvakānaṃ visayo. kasmā panesā ānītāti? majjhimikāya lokadhātuyā paricchedadassanatthaṃ.

[03] ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti yattakā. ^b^tāva sahassadhā^eb^ti tāva sahassabhāgena. ^b^dvisahassī majjhimikā lokadhātū^eb^ti ayaṃ sahassacakkavāḷāni sahassabhāgena gaṇetvā dasasatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇā dvisahassī majjhimikā nāma lokadhātu. ayaṃ sāvakānaṃ avisayo, buddhānameva visayo. ettakepi hi ṭhāne tathāgatā andhakāraṃ vidhametvā sarīrobhāsaṃ dassetvā sarena viññāpetuṃ sakkontīti dīpeti. ettakena buddhānaṃ jātikkhettaṃ nāma dassitaṃ. bodhisattānañhi pacchimabhave ^a^V2.0203^ea^ devalokato cavitvā mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase ca kucchito nikkhamanadivase ca mahābhinikkhamanadivase ca sambodhidhammacakkappavattanāayusaṅkhāravossajjanaparinibbānadivasesu ca ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ kampati.

[03] ^b^tisahassī mahāsahassī^eb^ti sahassito paṭṭhāya tatiyāti tisahassī, sahassaṃ sahassadhā katvā gaṇitaṃ majjhimikaṃ sahassadhā katvā gaṇitattā mahantehi sahassehi gaṇitāti mahāsahassī. ettāvatā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇo loko dassito hoti. bhagavā ākaṅkhamāno ettake ṭhāne andhakāraṃ vidhametvā sarīrobhāsaṃ dassetvā sarena viññāpeyyāti. gaṇakaputtatissatthero pana evamāha -- ``na tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuyā evaṃ parimāṇaṃ. idañhi ācariyānaṃ sajjhāyamuḷhakaṃ vācāya parihīnaṭṭhānaṃ, dasakoṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātu nāmā''ti. ettāvatā hi bhagavatā āṇākkhettaṃ nāma dassitaṃ. etasmiñhi ^a^P2.0342^ea^ antare āṭānāṭiyaparittaisigiliparittadhajaggaparittabojjhaṅgaparittakhandhaparitta- moraparittamettaparittaratanaparittānaṃ āṇā pharati. ^b^yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyā^eb^ti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ iccheyya, iminā visayakkhettaṃ ^a^M2.0211^ea^ dasseti. buddhānañhi visayakkhettassa pamāṇaparicchedo nāma natthi, natthikabhāve cassa imaṃ opammaṃ āharanti -- koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷamhi yāva brahmalokā sāsapehi pūretvā sace koci puratthimāya disāya ekacakkavāḷe ekaṃ sāsapaṃ pakkhipanto āgaccheyya, sabbepi te sāsapā parikkhayaṃ gaccheyyuṃ, na tveva puratthimāya disāya cakkavāḷāni. dakkhiṇādīsupi eseva nayo. tattha buddhānaṃ avisayo nāma natthi.

[03] evaṃ vutte thero cintesi -- ``satthā evamāha -- `ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, tathāgato tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpeyya, yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyā'ti. visamo kho panāyaṃ loko, anantāni cakkavāḷāni, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sūriyo uggato hoti, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne majjhe ṭhito, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne atthaṅgato. ekasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭhamayāmo hoti, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne majjhimayāmo, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pacchimayāmo. sattāpi kammappasutā, khiḍḍāpasutā, āhārappasutāti evaṃ tehi tehi kāraṇehi vikkhittā ca pamattā ca honti. kathaṃ nu kho te satthā sarena viññāpeyyā''ti. so evaṃ cintetvā vimaticchedanatthaṃ tathāgataṃ pucchanto ^b^yathā kathaṃ panā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] athassa ^a^V2.0204^ea^ satthā byākaronto ^b^idhānanda, tathāgato^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^obhāsena phareyyā^eb^ti sarīrobhāsena phareyya. pharamāno panesa kiṃ kareyyāti? yasmiṃ ṭhāne sūriyo paññāyati, tattha naṃ attano ānubhāvena atthaṃ gameyya. yattha pana na paññāyati, tattha naṃ uṭṭhāpetvā majjhe ṭhapeyya ^a^P2.0343^ea^. tato yattha sūriyo paññāyati, tattha manussā ``adhunāva sūriyo paññāyittha, so idāneva atthaṅgamito, nāgāvaṭṭo nu kho ayaṃ, bhūtāvaṭṭayakkhāvaṭṭadevatāvaṭṭānaṃ aññataro''ti vittakkaṃ uppādeyyuṃ. yattha pana na paññāyati, tattha manussā ``adhunāva sūriyo atthaṅgamito, svāyaṃ idāneva uṭṭhito, kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ nāgāvaṭṭabhūtāvaṭṭayakkhāvaṭṭadevatāvaṭṭānaṃ aññataro''ti vitakkaṃ uppādeyyuṃ. tato tesu manussesu ālokañca andhakārañca āvajjitvā ``kiṃ paccayā nu kho ida''nti pariyesamānesu satthā nīlakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā ^a^M2.0212^ea^ bahalandhakāraṃ patthareyya. kasmā? tesaṃ kammādippasutānaṃ sattānaṃ santāsajananatthaṃ. atha nesaṃ santāsaṃ āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā odātakasiṇasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā paṇḍaraṃ ghanabuddharasmiṃ vissajjento candasahassasūriyasahassauṭṭhānakālo viya ekappahāreneva sabbaṃ ekālokaṃ kareyya. tañca kho tilabījamattena kāyappadesena obhāsaṃ muñcanto. yo hi cakkavāḷapathaviṃ dīpakapallakaṃ katvā mahāsamudde udakaṃ telaṃ katvā sineruṃ vaṭṭiṃ katvā aññasmiṃ sinerumuddhani ṭhapetvā jāleyya, so ekacakkavāḷeyeva ālokaṃ kareyya. tato paraṃ vidatthimpi obhāsetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. tathāgato pana tilaphalappamāṇena sarīrappadesena obhāsaṃ muñcitvā tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ ekobhāsaṃ kareyya tato vā pana bhiyyo. evaṃ mahantā hi buddhaguṇāti.

[03] ^b^taṃ ālokaṃ sañjāneyyu^eb^nti taṃ ālokaṃ disvā ``yena sūriyo atthañceva gamito uṭṭhāpito ca, bahalandhakārañca vissaṭṭhaṃ, esa so puriso idāni ālokaṃ katvā ṭhito, aho acchariyapuriso''ti añjaliṃ paggayha namassamānā nisīdeyyuṃ. ^b^saddamanussāveyyā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0344^ea^ dhammakathāsaddamanussāveyya. yo hi ekaṃ cakkavāḷapabbataṃ bheriṃ katvā mahāpathaviṃ bhericammaṃ katvā sineruṃ daṇḍaṃ katvā aññasmiṃ sinerumatthake ṭhapetvā ākoṭeyya, so ekacakkavāḷeyeva taṃ saddaṃ sāveyya, parato vidatthimpi atikkāmetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya. tathāgato pana pallaṅke vā pīṭhe vā nisīditvā tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpeti, tato vā pana bhiyyo, evaṃ mahānubhāvā tathāgatāti. iti bhagavā iminā ettakena visayakkhettameva dasseti.

[03] imañca ^a^V2.0205^ea^ pana buddhasīhanādaṃ sutvā therassa abbhantare balavapīti uppannā, so pītivasena udānaṃ udānento ^b^lābhā vata me^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yassa me satthā evaṃmahiddhiko^eb^ti yassa mayhaṃ satthā evaṃmahiddhiko, tassa mayhaṃ evaṃmahiddhikassa satthu paṭilābho lābhā ceva suladdhañcāti attho. atha vā yvāhaṃ evarūpassa satthuno pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicarituṃ, pādaparikammaṃ piṭṭhiparikammaṃ kātuṃ, mukhadhovanaudakanhānodakāni dātuṃ, gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ sammajjituṃ, uppannāya kaṅkhāya pañhaṃ pucchituṃ, madhuradhammakathañca ^a^M2.0213^ea^ sotuṃ labhāmi, ete sabbepi mayhaṃ lābhā ceva suladdhañcātipi sandhāya evamāha. ettha ca bhagavato andhakārālokasaddasavanasaṅkhātānaṃ iddhīnaṃ mahantatāya mahiddhikatā, tāsaṃyeva anupharaṇena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā. ^b^udāyī^eb^ti lāḷudāyitthero. so kira pubbe upaṭṭhākatthere āghātaṃ bandhitvā carati. tasmā idāni okāsaṃ labhitvā imasmiṃ buddhasīhanādapariyosāne jalamānaṃ dīpasikhaṃ nibbāpento viya carantassa goṇassa tuṇḍe pahāraṃ dento viya bhattabharitaṃ ^a^P2.0345^ea^ pātiṃ avakujjanto viya therassa pasādabhaṅgaṃ karonto evamāha.

[03] ^b^evaṃ vutte bhagavā^eb^ti evaṃ udāyittherena vutte bhagavā yathā nāma papātataṭe ṭhatvā pavedhamānaṃ purisaṃ ekamante ṭhito hitesī puriso ``ito ehi ito ehī''ti punappunaṃ vadeyya, evamevaṃ udāyittheraṃ tasmā vacanā nivārento ^b^mā hevaṃ udāyi, mā hevaṃ udāyī^eb^ti āha. tattha ^b^hī^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, mā evaṃ avacāti attho. ^b^mahārajja^eb^nti cakkavattirajjaṃ. nanu ca satthā ekassa sāvakassa dhammadesanāya uppannapasādassa mahānisaṃsaṃ aparicchinnaṃ akāsi, so kasmā imassa buddhasīhanādaṃ ārabbha uppannassa pasādassa ānisaṃsaṃ paricchindatīti? ariyasāvakassa ettakāttabhāvaparimāṇattā. dandhapaññopi hi sotāpanno sattakkhattuṃ devesu ca manussesu ca attabhāvaṃ paṭilabhati, tenassa gatiṃ paricchindanto evamāha. ^b^diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve ṭhatvā. ^b^parinibbāyissatī^eb^ti appaccayaparinibbānena parinibbāyissati. iti nibbānena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto imaṃ sīhanādasuttaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti.
[06] ānandavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0206^ea^ paṭhame ^b^samaṇiyānī^eb^ti samaṇasantakāni. ^b^samaṇakaraṇīyānī^eb^ti samaṇena kattabbakiccāni. ^b^adhisīlasikkhāsamādāna^eb^ntiādīsu samādānaṃ vuccati gahaṇaṃ, adhisīlasikkhāya samādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ pūraṇaṃ ^a^M2.0214^ea^ adhisīlasikkhāsamādānaṃ. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. ettha ca sīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ, cittaṃ adhicittaṃ, paññā adhipaññāti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. tattha pañcasīlaṃ sīlaṃ ^a^P2.0346^ea^ nāma, taṃ upādāya dasasīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ nāma, tampi upādāya catupārisuddhisīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ nāma. apica sabbampi lokiyasīlaṃ sīlaṃ nāma, lokuttarasīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ, tadeva sikkhitabbato sikkhāti vuccati. kāmāvacaracittaṃ pana cittaṃ nāma, taṃ upādāya rūpāvacaraṃ adhicittaṃ nāma, tampi upādāya arūpāvacaraṃ adhicittaṃ nāma. apica sabbampi lokiyacittaṃ cittameva, lokuttaraṃ adhicittaṃ. paññāyapi eseva nayo. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā imāni tīṇi samaṇakaraṇīyāni, tasmā. ^b^tibbo^eb^ti bahalo. ^b^chando^eb^ti kattukamyatākusalacchando. iti imasmiṃ suttante tisso sikkhā lokiyalokuttarā kathitāti.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^piṭṭhito piṭṭhito^eb^ti pacchato pacchato. ^b^ahampi dammo ahampi dammo^eb^ti ahampi ``dammo dammamāno''ti vadamāno gāvīti. ^b^seyyathāpi gunna^eb^nti yathā gāvīnaṃ. gāvo hi kāḷāpi rattāpi setādivaṇṇāpi honti, gadrabhassa pana tādiso vaṇṇo nāma natthi. yathā ca vaṇṇo, evaṃ saropi padampi aññādisameva. sesaṃ uttānatthameva. imasmimpi sutte tisso sikkhā missikāva kathitāti.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V2.0207^ea^ ^b^paṭikaccevā^eb^ti paṭhamameva. ^b^sukaṭṭhaṃ karotī^eb^ti naṅgalena sukaṭṭhaṃ karoti. ^b^sumatikata^eb^nti matiyā suṭṭhu samīkataṃ. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti vapitabbayuttakālena. sesaṃ uttānameva. idhāpi tisso sikkhā missikāva kathitā.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M2.0215^ea^ ^b^vajjiputtako^eb^ti vajjirājakulassa putto. ^b^diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasata^eb^nti paṇṇāsādhikaṃ sikkhāpadasataṃ. tasmiṃ samaye paññattāni sikkhāpadāneva sandhāyetaṃ ^a^P2.0347^ea^ vuttaṃ. so kira bhikkhu ajjavasampanno ujujātiko avaṅko akuṭilo, tasmā ``ahaṃ ettakāni sikkhāpadāni rakkhituṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ vā na vā''ti cintetvā satthu ārocesi. ^b^sakkomaha^eb^nti sakkomi ahaṃ. so kira ``ettakesu sikkhāpadesu sikkhantassa agaru tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhitu''nti maññamāno evamāha. atha bhagavā yathā nāma paññāsa tiṇakalāpiyo ukkhipituṃ asakkontassa kalāpiyasataṃ bandhitvā sīse ṭhapeyya, evameva ekissāpi sikkhāya sikkhituṃ asakkontassa aparā dvepi sikkhā upari pakkhipanto ^b^tasmātiha tvaṃ bhikkhū^eb^tiādimāha. sukhumālo kira uttaro nāma jānapadamanusso lohapāsādavihāre vasati. atha naṃ daharabhikkhū āhaṃsu -- ``uttara, aggisālā ovassati, tiṇaṃ kappiyaṃ katvā dehī''ti. taṃ ādāya aṭaviṃ gantvā tena lāyitaṃ tiṇaṃyeva karaḷe bandhitvā ``paññāsa karaḷe gahetuṃ sakkhissasi uttarā''ti āhaṃsu. so ``na sakkhissāmī''ti āha. asītiṃ pana sakkhissasīti? na sakkhissāmi, bhanteti. ekaṃ karaḷasataṃ sakkhissasīti? āma, bhante, gaṇhissāmīti. daharabhikkhū karaḷasataṃ bandhitvā tassa sīse ṭhapayiṃsu. so ukkhipitvā nitthunanto gantvā aggisālāya samīpe pātesi. atha naṃ bhikkhū ``kilantarūposi uttarā''ti āhaṃsu. āma, bhante, daharā bhikkhū maṃ vañcesuṃ, imaṃ ekampi karaḷasataṃ ukkhipituṃ asakkontaṃ maṃ ``paṇṇāsa karaḷe ukkhipāhī''ti vadiṃsu. āma, uttara, vañcayiṃsu tanti. evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. idhāpi tisso sikkhā missikāva kathitā.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V2.0208^ea^ ^b^ujumaggānusārino^eb^ti ujumaggo vuccati ariyamaggo, taṃ anussarantassa paṭipannakassāti attho. ^b^khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti paṭhamameva maggañāṇaṃ uppajjati. maggo hi kilesānaṃ khepanato khayo nāma, taṃsampayuttaṃ ^a^M2.0216^ea^ ñāṇaṃ khayasmiṃ ñāṇaṃ nāma. ^b^tato^eb^ ^a^P2.0348^ea^ ^b^aññā anantarā^eb^ti tato catutthamaggañāṇato anantarā aññā uppajjati, arahattaphalaṃ uppajjatīti attho. ^b^aññāvimuttassā^eb^ti arahattaphalavimuttiyā vimuttassa. ^b^ñāṇaṃ ve hotī^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ hoti. iti suttepi gāthāsupi satta sekhā kathitā. avasāne pana khīṇāsavo dassitoti.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^attakāmā^eb^ti attano hitakāmā. ^b^yatthetaṃ sabbaṃ samodhānaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti yāsu sikkhāsu sabbametaṃ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ saṅgahaṃ gacchati. ^b^paripūrakārī hotī^eb^ti samattakārī hoti. ^b^mattaso kārī^eb^ti pamāṇena kārako, sabbena sabbaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti attho. ^b^khuddānukhuddakānī^eb^ti cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā sesasikkhāpadāni. tatrāpi saṅghādisesaṃ khuddakaṃ, thullaccayaṃ anukhuddakaṃ nāma. thullaccayañca khuddakaṃ, pācittiyaṃ anukhuddakaṃ nāma, pācittiyañca khuddakaṃ, pāṭidesaniyadukkaṭadubbhāsitāni anukhuddakāni nāma. ime pana aṅguttaramahānikāyavaḷañjanakāacariyā ``cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi khuddānukhuddakānī''ti vadanti. ^b^tāni āpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipī^eb^ti ettha pana khīṇāsavo tāva lokavajjaṃ nāpajjati, paṇṇattivajjameva āpajjati. āpajjanto ca kāyenapi vācāyapi cittenapi āpajjati. kāyena āpajjanto kuṭikārasahaseyyādīni āpajjati, vācāya āpajjanto sañcarittapadasodhammādīni, cittena āpajjanto rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āpajjati. sekkhesupi eseva nayo. ^b^na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, na hi mayā ettha evarūpaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjane ca vuṭṭhāne ca ariyapuggalassa abhabbatā kathitā. ^b^ādibrahmacariyakānī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0349^ea^ maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāni cattāri mahāsīlasikkhāpadāni. ^b^brahmacariyasāruppānī^eb^ti tāniyeva catumaggabrahmacariyassa sāruppāni anucchavikāni. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu sikkhāpadesu. ^b^dhuvasīlo^eb^ti nibaddhasīlo. ^b^ṭhitasīlo^eb^ti patiṭṭhitasīlo. ^b^sotāpanno^eb^ti sotasaṅkhātena ^a^V2.0209^ea^ maggena phalaṃ ^a^M2.0217^ea^ āpanno. ^b^avinipātadhammo^eb^ti catūsu apāyesu apatanasabhāvo. ^b^niyato^eb^ti sotāpattimagganiyāmena niyato. ^b^sambodhiparāyaṇo^eb^ti uparimaggattayasambodhiparāyaṇo.

[03] ^b^tanuttā^eb^ti tanubhāvo. sakadāgāmino hi rāgādayo abbhapaṭalaṃ viya macchikāpattaṃ viya ca tanukā honti, na bahalā. ^b^orambhāgiyāna^eb^nti heṭṭhābhāgiyānaṃ. ^b^saṃyojanāna^eb^nti bandhanānaṃ. ^b^parikkhayā^eb^ti parikkhayena. ^b^opapātiko hotī^eb^ti uppannako hoti. ^b^tattha parinibbāyī^eb^ti heṭṭhā anotaritvā upariyeva parinibbānadhammo. ^b^anāvattidhammo^eb^ti yonigativasena anāgamanadhammo.

[03] ^b^padesaṃ padesakārī^eb^tiādīsu padesakārī puggalo nāma sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī ca anāgāmī ca, so padesameva sampādeti. paripūrakārī nāma arahā, so paripūrameva sampādeti. ^b^avañjhānī^eb^ti atucchāni saphalāni saudrayānīti attho. idhāpi tisso sikkhā missakāva kathitā.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^kolaṃkolo^eb^ti kulā kulaṃ gamanako. ^b^kula^eb^nti cettha bhavo adhippeto, tasmā ``dve vā tīṇi vā kulānī''ti etthapi dve vā tayo vā bhaveti attho veditabbo. ayañhi dve vā bhave sandhāvati tayo vā, uttamakoṭiyā cha vā. tasmā dve vā tīṇi vā cattāri vā pañca vā cha vāti evamettha vikappo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^ekabījī^eb^ti ekasseva bhavassa bījaṃ etassa atthīti ekabījī. ^b^uddhaṃsoto^eb^tiādīsu atthi uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, atthi ^a^P2.0350^ea^ uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī, atthi na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, atthi na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī. tattha yo idha anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā avihādīsu nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā uparūpari nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. yo pana avihādīsu nibbatto tattheva aparinibbāyitvā akaniṭṭhampi appatvā uparimabrahmaloke parinibbāyati, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. yo ito cavitvā ^a^M2.0218^ea^ akaniṭṭheyeva nibbattati, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. yo pana avihādīsu catūsu aññatarasmiṃ nibbattitvā tattheva parinibbāyati, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.

[03] yattha ^a^V2.0210^ea^ katthaci uppanno pana sasaṅkhārena sappayogena arahattaṃ patto ^b^sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. asaṅkhārena appayogena patto ^b^asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. yo pana kappasahassāyukesu avihesu nibbattitvā pañcamaṃ kappasataṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ patto, ayaṃ ^b^upahaccaparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. atappādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^antarāparinibbāyī^eb^ti yo āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā parinibbāyati, so tividho hoti. kappasahassāyukesu tāva avihesu nibbattitvā eko nibbattadivaseyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. no ce nibbattadivase pāpuṇāti, paṭhamassa pana kappasatassa matthake pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ paṭhamo antarāparinibbāyī. aparo evaṃ asakkonto dvinnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ dutiyo. aparo evampi asakkonto catunnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ tatiyo antarāparinibbāyī. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā catuvīsati sotāpannā, dvādasa sakadāgāmino, aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino, dvādasa ca arahanto kathetabbā. imasmiṃ hi sāsane saddhādhuraṃ paññādhuranti ^a^P2.0351^ea^ dve dhurāni, dukkhapaṭipadādandhābhiññādayo catasso paṭipadā. tattheko saddhādhurena abhinivisitvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā ekameva bhavaṃ nibbattitvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayameko ekabījī. so paṭipadāvasena catubbidho hoti. yathā cesa, evaṃ paññādhurena abhiniviṭṭhopīti aṭṭha ekabījino. tathā kolaṃkolā sattakkhattuparamā cāti ime ^b^catuvīsati sotāpannā^eb^ nāma. tīsu pana vimokkhesu suññatavimokkhena sakadāgāmibhūmiṃ pattā catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena cattāro sakadāgāmino, tathā animittavimokkhena pattā cattāro, appaṇihitavimokkhena pattā cattāroti ime ^b^dvādasa sakadāgāmino^eb^. avihesu pana tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyī, eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca anāgāmino, te asaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañca, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañcāti dasa honti, tathā atappādīsu. akaniṭṭhesu pana uddhaṃsoto natthi ^a^M2.0219^ea^, tasmā tattha cattāro sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, cattāro asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti aṭṭha, ime ^b^aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino^eb^. yathā pana sakadāgāmino, tatheva ^b^arahantopi dvādasa^eb^ veditabbā. idhāpi tisso sikkhā missikāva kathitā.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0211^ea^ ^b^taṃ vā pana anabhisambhavaṃ appaṭivijjha^eb^nti taṃ arahattaṃ apāpuṇanto appaṭivijjhanto. iminā nayena sabbaṭṭhānesu attho veditabbo. idhāpi tisso sikkhā missikāva kathitā. navamaṃ uttānatthameva. idhāpi tisso sikkhā missikāva kathitā.
[03] 91^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^āsavānaṃ khayā^eb^ti ettha arahattamaggo adhipaññāsikkhā nāma. phalaṃ pana sikkhitasikkhassa uppajjanato sikkhāti na vattabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^P2.0352^ea^ ^b^pure tathā pacchā^eb^ti yathā paṭhamaṃ tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhati, pacchā tatheva sikkhatīti attho. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^yathā adho tathā uddha^eb^nti yathā heṭṭhimakāyaṃ asubhavasena passati, uparimakāyampi tatheva pharati. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^yathā divā tathā ratti^eb^nti yathā divā tisso sikkhā sikkhati, rattimpi tatheva sikkhatīti attho. ^b^abhibhuyya disā sabbā^eb^ti sabbā disā ārammaṇavasena abhibhavitvā. ^b^appamāṇasamādhinā^eb^ti arahattamaggasamādhinā.

[03] ^b^sekkha^eb^nti sikkhamānaṃ sakaraṇīyaṃ. ^b^paṭipada^eb^nti paṭipannakaṃ. ^b^saṃsuddhacāriya^eb^nti saṃsuddhacaraṇaṃ parisuddhasīlaṃ. ^b^sambuddha^eb^nti catusaccabuddhaṃ. ^b^dhīraṃ paṭipadantagu^eb^nti khandhadhīrāayatanadhīravasena dhīraṃ dhitisampannaṃ paṭipattiyā antaṃ gataṃ. ^b^viññāṇassā^eb^ti carimakaviññāṇassa. ^b^taṇhākkhayavimuttino^eb^ti taṇhākkhayavimuttisaṅkhātāya arahattaphalavimuttiyā samannāgatassa. ^b^pajjotasseva nibbāna^eb^nti padīpanibbānaṃ viya. ^b^vimokkho hoti cetaso^eb^ti cittassa vimutti vimuccanā appavattibhāvo hoti. taṇhākkhayavimuttino hi khīṇāsavassa carimakaviññāṇanirodhena ^a^M2.0220^ea^ parinibbānaṃ viya cetaso vimokkho hoti, na gataṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati, apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamoyeva hotīti attho.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^a^V2.0212^ea^ ^b^saṅkavā nāma kosalānaṃ nigamo^eb^ti ^b^saṅkavā^eb^ti evaṃnāmako kosalaraṭṭhe nigamo. ^b^āvāsiko^eb^ti bhārahāro nave āvāse samuṭṭhāpeti, purāṇe paṭijaggati. ^b^sikkhāpadapaṭisaṃyuttāyā^eb^ti sikkhāsaṅkhātehi padehi paṭisaṃyuttāya, tīhi sikkhāhi samannāgatāyāti attho. ^b^sandassetī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0353^ea^ sammukhe viya katvā dasseti. ^b^samādapetī^eb^ti gaṇhāpeti. ^b^samuttejetī^eb^ti samussāheti. ^b^sampahaṃsetī^eb^ti paṭiladdhaguṇehi vaṇṇaṃ kathento vodāpeti. ^b^adhisallikhate^eb^ti ativiya sallikhati, ativiya sallikhitaṃ katvā saṇhaṃ saṇhaṃ kathetīti attho.

[03] ^b^accayo^eb^ti aparādho. ^b^maṃ accagamā^eb^ti maṃ atikkamma adhibhavitvā pavatto. ^b^ahudeva akkhantī^eb^ti ahosiyeva anadhivāsanā. ^b^ahu appaccayo^eb^ti ahosi atuṭṭhākāro. ^b^paṭiggaṇhātū^eb^ti khamatu. ^b^āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā^eb^ti anāgate saṃvaratthāya, puna evarūpassa aparādhassa dosassa khalitassa vā akaraṇatthāyāti attho. ^b^tagghā^eb^ti ekaṃsena. ^b^yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosī^eb^ti yathā dhammo ṭhito, tathā karosi, khamāpesīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā^eb^ti taṃ tava aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma. ^b^vuddhihesā, kassapa, ariyassa vinaye^eb^ti esā kassapa buddhassa bhagavato sāsane vuddhi nāma. katamā? yāyaṃ accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā. desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto ``yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī''ti āha. ^b^na sikkhākāmo^eb^ti tisso sikkhā na kāmeti na pattheti na piheti. ^b^sikkhāsamādānassā^eb^ti sikkhāparipūraṇassa. ^b^na vaṇṇavādī^eb^ti guṇaṃ na katheti. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti yuttappayuttakālena. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] samaṇavaggo catuttho.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0213^ea^ ^a^M2.0221^ea^ ^a^P2.0354^ea^ paṭhame ^b^accāyikānī^eb^ti atipātikāni. ^b^karaṇīyānī^eb^ti avassakiccāni. yañhi na avassaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ kiccanti vuccati. avassaṃ kātabbaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāma. ^b^sīghaṃ sīgha^eb^nti vegena vegena. ^b^tassa kho ta^eb^nti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^natthi sā iddhi vā ānubhāvo vā^eb^ti sā vā iddhi so vā ānubhāvo natthi. ^b^uttarasve^eb^ti tatiyadivase. ^b^utupariṇāminī^eb^ti laddhautupariṇāmāni hutvā. ^b^jāyantipī^eb^ti tatiyadivase nikkhantasetaṅkurāni honti, sattāhe patte nīlaṅkurāni honti. ^b^gabbhīnipi hontī^eb^ti diyaḍḍhamāsaṃ patvā gahitagabbhāni honti. ^b^paccantipī^eb^ti tayo māse patvā paccanti. idāni yasmā buddhānaṃ gahapatikena vā sassehi vā attho natthi, sāsane pana tappaṭirūpakaṃ puggalaṃ vā atthaṃ vā dassetuṃ taṃ taṃ opammaṃ āharanti. tasmā yamatthaṃ dassetukāmena etaṃ ābhataṃ, taṃ dassento ^b^evameva kho^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ atthato uttānameva. sikkhā pana idhāpi missikā eva kathitā.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^cīvarapaviveka^eb^nti cīvaraṃ nissāya uppajjanakakilesehi vivittabhāvaṃ. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^sāṇānī^eb^ti sāṇavākacelāni. ^b^masāṇānī^eb^ti missakacelāni. ^b^chavadussānī^eb^ti matasarīrato chaḍḍitavatthāni, erakatiṇādīni vā ganthetvā katanivāsanāni. ^b^paṃsukūlānī^eb^ti pathaviyaṃ chaḍḍitanantakāni. ^b^tirīṭānī^eb^ti rukkhatacavatthāni. ^b^ajinānī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0355^ea^ ajinamigacammāni. ^b^ajinakkhipa^eb^nti tadeva majjhe phālitaṃ, sahakhurakantipi vadanti. ^b^kusacīra^eb^nti kusatiṇāni ganthetvā katacīraṃ. ^b^vākacīraphalakacīresu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^kesakambala^eb^nti manussakesehi katakambalaṃ. ^b^vālakambala^eb^nti assavālādīhi katakambalaṃ. ^b^ulūkapakkhika^eb^nti ulūkapattāni ganthetvā katanivāsanaṃ.

[03] ^b^sākabhakkhā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0214^ea^ ^a^M2.0222^ea^ allasākabhakkhā. ^b^sāmākabhakkhā^eb^ti sāmākataṇḍulabhakkhā. ^b^nīvārā^eb^dīsu ^b^nīvārā^eb^ nāma araññe sayaṃ jātavīhijāti. ^b^daddula^eb^nti cammakārehi cammaṃ likhitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ. ^b^haṭaṃ^eb^ vuccati silesopi sevālopi kaṇikārādirukkhaniyyāsopi. ^b^kaṇa^eb^nti kuṇḍakaṃ. ^b^ācāmo^eb^ti bhattaukkhalikāya laggo jhāmaodano. taṃ chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne gahetvā khādanti, odanakañjiyantipi vadanti. ^b^piññākā^eb^dayo pākaṭāva. ^b^pavattaphalabhojī^eb^ti patitaphalabhojī. ^b^bhusāgāra^eb^nti khalasālaṃ.

[03] ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti catupārisuddhisīlena samannāgato. ^b^dussīlyañcassa pahīnaṃ hotī^eb^ti pañca dussīlyāni pahīnāni honti. ^b^sammādiṭṭhiko^eb^ti yāthāvadiṭṭhiko. ^b^micchādiṭṭhī^eb^ti ayāthāvadiṭṭhi. ^b^āsavā^eb^ti cattāro āsavā. ^b^aggappatto^eb^ti sīlaggappatto. ^b^sārappatto^eb^ti sīlasāraṃ patto. ^b^suddho^eb^ti parisuddho. ^b^sāre patiṭṭhito^eb^ti sīlasamādhipaññāsāre patiṭṭhito.

[03] ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^ti yathā nāma. ^b^sampanna^eb^nti ^a^P2.0356^ea^ paripuṇṇaṃ paripakkasālibharitaṃ. ^b^saṅgharāpeyyā^eb^ti saṅkaḍḍhāpeyya. ^b^ubbahāpeyyā^eb^ti khalaṭṭhānaṃ āharāpeyya. ^b^bhusika^eb^nti bhusaṃ. ^b^koṭṭāpeyyā^eb^ti udukkhale pakkhipāpetvā musalehi paharāpeyya. ^b^aggappattānī^eb^ti taṇḍulaggaṃ pattāni. ^b^sārappattā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. sesaṃ uttānameva. yaṃ panettha ``dussīlyañcassa pahīnaṃ micchādiṭṭhi cassa pahīnā''ti vuttaṃ, taṃ sotāpattimaggena pahīnabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^viddhe^eb^ti valāhakavigamena dūrībhūte. ^b^deve^eb^ti ākāse. ^b^abhivihaccā^eb^ti abhivihanitvā. ^b^yato^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^viraja^eb^nti rāgarajādirahitaṃ. tesaṃyeva malānaṃ vigatattā ^b^vītamalaṃ. dhammacakkhu^eb^nti catusaccadhammapariggāhakaṃ sotāpattimaggacakkhuṃ. ^b^natthi taṃ saṃyojana^eb^nti duvidhamevassa saṃyojanaṃ natthi, itarampi pana puna imaṃ lokaṃ ānetuṃ asamatthatāya natthīti vuttaṃ. imasmiṃ sutte jhānānāgāmī nāma kathitoti.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V2.0215^ea^ ^b^na bāhulikā hontī^eb^ti paccayabāhullikā na honti. ^b^na sāthalikā^eb^ti tisso sikkhā sithilaṃ katvā na gaṇhanti. ^b^okkamane nikkhittadhurā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0223^ea^ okkamanaṃ vuccati avagamanaṭṭhena pañca nīvaraṇāni, tesu nikkhittadhurā. ^b^paviveke pubbaṅgamā^eb^ti kāyacittaupadhivivekasaṅkhāte tividhepi viveke pubbaṅgamā. ^b^vīriyaṃ ārabhantī^eb^ti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanti. ^b^appattassā^eb^ti jhānavipassanāmaggaphalasaṅkhātassa appattavisesassa. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^pacchimā^eb^ ^a^P2.0357^ea^ ^b^janatā^eb^ti saddhivihārikāntevāsikādayo. ^b^diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti ācariyupajjhāyehi kataṃ anukaroti. yaṃ tāya janatāya ācariyupajjhāyesu diṭṭhaṃ, tassa anugatiṃ āpajjati nāma. ^b^ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, aggavatī parisā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, ayaṃ parisā aggapuggalavatī nāma vuccati.

[03] ^b^bhaṇḍanajātā^eb^ti jātabhaṇḍanā. ^b^kalahajātā^eb^ti jātakalahā. bhaṇḍananti cettha kalahassa pubbabhāgo, hatthaparāmāsādivasena vītikkamo kalaho nāma. ^b^vivādāpannā^eb^ti viruddhavādaṃ āpannā. ^b^mukhasattīhī^eb^ti guṇavijjhanaṭṭhena pharusā vācā ``mukhasattiyo''ti vuccanti, tāhi mukhasattīhi. ^b^vitudantā viharantī^eb^ti vijjhantā vicaranti.

[03] ^b^samaggā^eb^ti sahitā. ^b^sammodamānā^eb^ti samappavattamodā. ^b^khīrodakībhūtā^eb^ti khīrodakaṃ viya bhūtā. ^b^piyacakkhūhī^eb^ti upasantehi mettacakkhūhi. ^b^pīti jāyatī^eb^ti pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjati. ^b^kāyo passambhatī^eb^ti nāmakāyopi rūpakāyopi vigatadaratho hoti. ^b^passaddhakāyo^eb^ti asāraddhakāyo. ^b^sukhaṃ vediyatī^eb^ti kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ vediyati. ^b^samādhiyatī^eb^ti ārammaṇe sammā ṭhapīyati.

[03] ^b^thullaphusitake^eb^ti mahāphusitake. ^b^pabbatakandarapadarasākhā^eb^ti ettha ^b^kandaro^eb^ nāma ``ka''nti laddhanāmena udakena dārito udakabhinno pabbatappadeso, yo ``nitambho''tipi ``nadikuñjo''tipi vuccati. ^b^padaraṃ^eb^ nāma aṭṭha māse deve avassante phalito bhūmippadeso. ^b^sākhā^eb^ti kusobbhagāminiyo khuddakamātikāyo. ^b^kusobbhā^eb^ti khuddakāavāṭā. ^b^mahāsobbhā^eb^ti mahāāvāṭā. ^b^kunnadiyo^eb^ti khuddakanadiyo. ^b^mahānadiyo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0358^ea^ gaṅgāyamunādikā mahāsaritā.

[03] 97-99^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V2.0216^ea^ ^a^M2.0224^ea^ ^b^aṅgehī^eb^ti guṇaṅgehi. ^b^rājāraho^eb^ti rañño araho anucchaviko. ^b^rājabhoggo^eb^ti rañño upabhogabhūto. ^b^rañño aṅga^eb^nti rañño hatthapādādiaṅgasamatāya aṅganteva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. ^b^vaṇṇasampanno^eb^ti sarīravaṇṇena sampanno. ^b^balasampanno^eb^ti kāyabalena sampanno. ^b^āhuneyyo^eb^ti āhutisaṅkhātaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto. ^b^pāhuneyyo^eb^ti pāhunakabhattassa anucchaviko. ^b^dakkhiṇeyyo^eb^ti dasavidhadānavatthupariccāgavasena saddhādānasaṅkhātāya dakkhiṇāya anucchaviko. ^b^añjalikaraṇīyo^eb^ti añjalipaggahaṇassa anucchaviko. ^b^anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā^eb^ti sabbalokassa asadisaṃ puññaviruhanaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03] ^b^vaṇṇasampanno^eb^ti guṇavaṇṇena sampanno. ^b^balasampanno^eb^ti vīriyabalena sampanno. ^b^javasampanno^eb^ti ñāṇajavena sampanno. ^b^thāmavā^eb^ti ñāṇathāmena samannāgato. ^b^daḷhaparakkamo^eb^ti thiraparakkamo. ^b^anikkhittadhuro^eb^ti aṭṭhapitadhuro paggahitadhuro, aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ appatvā vīriyadhuraṃ na nikkhipissāmīti evaṃ paṭipanno. imasmiṃ sutte catusaccavasena sotāpattimaggo, sotāpattimaggena ca ñāṇajavasampannatā kathitāti. chaṭṭhe tīṇi ca maggāni tīṇi ca phalāni, tīhi maggaphalehi ca ñāṇajavasampannatā kathitā. sattame arahattaphalaṃ, arahattaphaleneva ca maggakiccaṃ kathitaṃ. phalaṃ pana javitajavena uppajjanato javoti ca vattuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^P2.0359^ea^ ^b^navo^eb^ti karaṇaṃ upādāya vuccati. ^b^potthako^eb^ti vākamayavatthaṃ. ^b^majjhimo^eb^ti paribhogamajjhimo. ^b^jiṇṇo^eb^ti paribhogajiṇṇo. ^b^ukkhaliparimajjana^eb^nti ukkhaliparipuñchanaṃ ^b^dussīlo^eb^ti nissīlo. ^b^dubbaṇṇatāyā^eb^ti guṇavaṇṇābhāvena dubbaṇṇatāya. ^b^diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti tena kataṃ anukaronti. ^b^na mahapphalaṃ hotī^eb^ti vipākaphalena mahapphalaṃ na hoti. ^b^na mahānisaṃsa^eb^nti vipākānisaṃseneva na mahānisaṃsaṃ. ^b^appagghatāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0225^ea^ vipākagghena appagghatāya. ^b^kāsikaṃ vattha^eb^nti tīhi kappāsāṃsūhi suttaṃ kantitvā katavatthaṃ, tañca kho kāsiraṭṭheyeva uṭṭhitaṃ. sesaṃ uttānameva. sīlaṃ panettha missakaṃ kathitanti.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V2.0217^ea^ ^b^yathā yathāya^eb^nti yathā yathā ayaṃ. ^b^tathā tathā ta^eb^nti tathā tathā taṃ kammaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yo evaṃ vadeyya -- ``yathā yathā kammaṃ karoti, tathā tathāssa vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyateva. na hi sakkā katassa kammassa vipākaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ. tasmā yattakaṃ kammaṃ karoti, tattakassa vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyatevā''ti. ^b^evaṃ santa^eb^nti evaṃ sante. ^b^brahmacariyavāso na hotī^eb^ti yaṃ maggabhāvanato pubbe upapajjavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, tassa avassaṃ paṭisaṃvedanīyattā brahmacariyaṃ vutthampi avutthameva hoti. ^b^okāso na paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā^eb^ti yasmā ca evaṃ sante tena kammāyūhanañceva vipākānubhavanā ca hoti, tasmā hetunā nayena vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyāya okāso na paññāyati nāma.

[03] ^b^yathā yathā vedanīya^eb^nti yena yenākārena veditabbaṃ. ^b^tathā^eb^ ^a^P2.0360^ea^ ^b^tathāssa vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyatī^eb^ti tena tenākārena assa vipākaṃ paccanubhoti. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yadetaṃ sattasu javanesu paṭhamajavanakammaṃ sati paccaye vipākavāraṃ labhantameva diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti, asati ahosikammaṃ nāma. yañca sattamajavanakammaṃ sati paccaye upapajjavedanīyaṃ hoti, asati ahosikammaṃ nāma. yañca majjhe pañcajavanakammaṃ yāva saṃsārappavatti, tāva aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ nāma hoti. etesu ākāresu yena yenākārena veditabbaṃ kammaṃ ayaṃ puriso karoti, tena tenevassa vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyati nāma. aṭṭhakathāyañhi laddhavipākavārameva kammaṃ yathāvedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ. ^b^evaṃ santaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyavāso hotī^eb^ti kammakkhayakarassa brahmacariyassa khepetabbakammasambhavato vāso nāma hoti, vutthaṃ suvutthameva hotīti ^a^M2.0226^ea^ attho. ^b^okāso paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā^eb^ti yasmā evaṃ sante tena tena maggena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena tesu tesu bhavesu āyatiṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ na uppajjati, tasmā okāso paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.

[03] idāni taṃ yathāvedanīyakammasabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^appamattaka^eb^nti parittaṃ thokaṃ mandaṃ lāmakaṃ. ^b^tādisaṃyevā^eb^ti taṃsarikkhakameva. ^b^diṭṭhadhammavedanīya^eb^nti tasmiṃ kammeyeva diṭṭhadhamme vipaccitabbaṃ vipākavāraṃ labhantaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti. ^b^nāṇupi khāyatī^eb^ti dutiye attabhāve aṇupi na khāyati, aṇumattampi dutiye attabhāve ^a^V2.0218^ea^ vipākaṃ na detīti attho. ^b^bahudevā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0361^ea^ bahukaṃ pana vipākaṃ kimeva dassatīti adhippāyo. ^b^abhāvitakāyo^eb^tiādīhi kāyabhāvanārahito vaṭṭagāmī puthujjano dassito. ^b^paritto^eb^ti parittaguṇo. ^b^appātumo^eb^ti ātumā vuccati attabhāvo, tasmiṃ mahantepi guṇaparittatāya appātumoyeva. ^b^appadukkhavihārī^eb^ti appakenapi pāpena dukkhavihārī. ^b^bhāvitakāyo^eb^tiādīhi khīṇāsavo dassito. so hi kāyānupassanāsaṅkhātāya kāyabhāvanāya bhāvitakāyo nāma. kāyassa vā vaḍḍhitattā bhāvitakāyo. ^b^bhāvitasīlo^eb^ti vaḍḍhitasīlo. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. pañcadvārabhāvanāya vā bhāvitakāyo. etena indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ, bhāvitasīloti iminā sesāni tīṇi sīlāni. ^b^aparitto^eb^ti na parittaguṇo. ^b^mahatto^eb^ti attabhāve parittepi guṇamahantatāya mahatto. ^b^appamāṇavihārī^eb^ti khīṇāsavassetaṃ nāmameva. so hi pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ abhāvena appamāṇavihārī nāma.

[03] ^b^paritte^eb^ti khuddake. ^b^udakamallake^eb^ti udakasarāve. ^b^orabbhiko^eb^ti urabbhasāmiko. ^b^urabbhaghātako^eb^ti sūnakāro. ^b^jāpetuṃ vā^eb^ti dhanajāniyā jāpetuṃ. jhāpetuntipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. ^b^yathāpaccayaṃ vā kātu^eb^nti yathā icchati, tathā kātuṃ. ^b^urabbhadhana^eb^nti eḷakāgghanakamūlaṃ. so panassa sace icchati, deti. no ce icchati, gīvāyaṃ gahetvā ^a^M2.0227^ea^ nikkaḍḍhāpeti. sesaṃ ^a^P2.0362^ea^ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. imasmiṃ pana sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^dhovatī^eb^ti vikkhāleti. ^b^sandhovatī^eb^ti suṭṭhu dhovati, punappunaṃ dhovati. ^b^niddhovatī^eb^ti niggaṇhitvā dhovati. ^b^aniddhantakasāva^eb^nti anīhatadosaṃ anapanītakasāvaṃ. ^b^pabhaṅgū^eb^ti pabhijjanasabhāvaṃ, adhikaraṇīyaṃ ṭhapetvā muṭṭhikāya pahaṭamattaṃ bhijjati. ^b^paṭṭikāyā^eb^ti suvaṇṇapaṭṭakāya. ^b^gīveyyake^eb^ti gīvālaṅkāre.

[03] ^b^adhicitta^eb^nti samathavipassanācittaṃ. ^b^anuyuttassā^eb^ti bhāventassa. ^b^sacetaso^eb^ti cittasampanno. ^b^dabbajātiko^eb^ti paṇḍitajātiko. ^b^kāmavitakkā^eb^dīsu kāme ārabbha uppanno vitakko kāmavitakko. byāpādavihiṃsasampayuttā vitakkā byāpādavihiṃsavitakkā nāma. ñātivitakkādīsu ``amhākaṃ ñātakā bahū puññavantā''tiādinā nayena ñātake ārabbha uppanno ^a^V2.0219^ea^ vitakko ^b^ñātivitakko^eb^. ``asuko janapado khemo subhikkho''tiādinā nayena janapadamārabbha uppanno vitakko ^b^janapadavitakko^eb^. ``aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyu''nti evaṃ uppanno vitakko ^b^anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko^eb^ nāma. ^b^dhammavitakkāvasissantī^eb^ti dhammavitakkā nāma dasavipassanupakkilesavitakkā. ^b^so hoti samādhi na ceva santo^eb^ti so avasiṭṭhadhammavitakko vipassanāsamādhi avūpasantakilesattā santo na hoti. ^b^na paṇīto^eb^ti na atappako. ^b^nappaṭippassaddhiladdho^eb^ti ^a^P2.0363^ea^ na kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā laddho. ^b^na ekodibhāvādhigato^eb^ti na ekaggabhāvappatto. ^b^sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato^eb^ti sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese niggaṇhitvā vāretvā vārito, na kilesānaṃ chinnante uppanno, kilese pana vāretvā uppanno.

[03] ^b^hoti^eb^ ^a^M2.0228^ea^ ^b^so, bhikkhave, samayo^eb^ti ettha samayo nāma utusappāyaṃ āhārasappāyaṃ senāsanasappāyaṃ puggalasappāyaṃ dhammassavanasappāyanti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ sappāyānaṃ paṭilābhakālo. ^b^yaṃ taṃ citta^eb^nti yasmiṃ samaye taṃ vipassanācittaṃ. ^b^ajjhattaṃyeva santiṭṭhatī^eb^ti attaniyeva tiṭṭhati. niyakajjhattañhi idha ajjhattaṃ nāma. gocarajjhattampi vaṭṭati. puthuttārammaṇaṃ pahāya ekasmiṃ nibbānagocareyeva tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^sannisīdatī^eb^ti suṭṭhu nisīdati. ^b^ekodi hotī^eb^ti ekaggaṃ hoti. ^b^samādhiyatī^eb^ti sammā ādhiyati. ^b^santo^eb^tiādīsu paccanīkakilesavūpasamena ^b^santo^eb^. atappakaṭṭhena ^b^paṇīto^eb^. kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā laddhattā ^b^paṭippassaddhaladdho^eb^. ekaggabhāvaṃ gatattā ^b^ekodibhāvādhigato^eb^. kilesānaṃ chinnante uppannattā na sappayogena kilese niggaṇhitvā vāretvā vāritoti ^b^na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato^eb^. ettāvatā ayaṃ bhikkhu vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto nāma hoti.

[03] idāni khīṇāsavassa sato abhiññāpaṭipadaṃ dassento ^b^yassa yassa cā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassā^eb^ti abhijānitvā paccakkhaṃ kātabbassa. ^b^sati satiāyatane^eb^ti pubbahetusaṅkhāte ceva idāni ca paṭiladdhabbe abhiññāpādakajjhānādibhede ca sati satikāraṇe. vitthārato ^a^P2.0364^ea^ pana ayaṃ abhiññākathā visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 2.365 ādayo) vuttanayeneva veditabbā. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayā^eb^tiādi cettha phalasamāpattivasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ekādasamepi ^a^V2.0220^ea^ ^b^adhicittaṃ^eb^ samathavipassanācittameva. ^b^tīṇi nimittānī^eb^ti tīṇi kāraṇāni. ^b^kālena kāla^eb^nti kāle kāle, yuttakāleti attho. ^b^kālena kālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasikātabba^eb^ntiādīsu taṃ taṃ kālaṃ sallakkhetvā ekaggatāya yuttakāle ekaggatā manasikātabbā. ekaggatā hi idha samādhinimittanti vuttā. tatra vacanattho -- samādhiyeva nimittaṃ samādhinimittaṃ. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^paggaho^eb^ti pana vīriyassa nāmaṃ, ^b^upekkhā^eb^ti majjhattabhāvassa. tasmā ^a^M2.0229^ea^ vīriyassa yuttakāle vīriyaṃ manasikātabbaṃ, majjhattabhāvassa yuttakāle majjhattabhāve ṭhātabbanti. ^b^ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyyā^eb^ti kāraṇaṃ vijjati yena taṃ cittaṃ kosajjabhāve tiṭṭheyya. itaresupi eseva nayo. ^b^upekkhānimittaṃyeva manasi kareyyā^eb^ti ettha ca ñāṇajavaṃ upekkheyyāti ayamattho. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayāyā^eb^ti arahattaphalatthāya.

[03] ^b^ukkaṃ bandheyyā^eb^ti aṅgārakapallaṃ sajjeyya. ^b^ālimpeyyā^eb^ti tattha aṅgāre pakkhipitvā aggiṃ datvā nāḷikāya dhamanto aggiṃ gāhāpeyya. ^b^ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyā^eb^ti aṅgāre viyūhitvā aṅgāramatthake vā ṭhapeyya, mūsāya vā pakkhipeyya. ^b^ajjhupekkhatī^eb^ti pakkāpakkabhāvaṃ upadhāreti.

[03] ^b^sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāyā^eb^ti arahattaphalatthāya sammā ṭhapīyati. ettāvatā ^a^P2.0365^ea^ hi vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattappatto bhikkhu dassito. idāni tassa khīṇāsavassa abhiññāya paṭipadaṃ dassento ^b^yassa yassa cā^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
[06] loṇakapallavaggo pañcamo.
[06] dutiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0221^ea^ ^a^M2.0230^ea^ paṭhame ^b^pubbeva sambodhā^eb^ti sambodhito pubbeva, ariyamaggappattito aparabhāgeyevāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^anabhisambuddhassā^eb^ti appaṭividdhacatusaccassa. ^b^bodhisattasseva sato^eb^ti bujjhanakasattasseva sato, sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ ārabhantasseva sato, sambodhiyā vā sattasseva laggasseva sato. dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena abhinīhārasamiddhito pabhuti tathāgato sammāsambodhiṃ satto laggo ``pattabbā mayā esā''ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṃ amuñcantoyeva āgato, tasmā bodhisattoti vuccati. ^b^ko nu kho^eb^ti katamo nu kho. ^b^loko^eb^ti saṅkhāraloko. ^b^assādo^eb^ti madhurākāro. ^b^ādīnavo^eb^ti anabhinanditabbākāro. ^b^tassa mayha^eb^nti tassa evaṃ bodhisattasseva sato mayhaṃ. ^b^chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahāna^eb^nti nibbānaṃ āgamma ārabbha paṭicca chandarāgo vinayaṃ gacchati pahīyati, tasmā nibbānaṃ ``chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahāna''nti vuccati. ^b^idaṃ lokanissaraṇa^eb^nti idaṃ nibbānaṃ lokato nissaṭattā lokanissaraṇanti vuccati. ^b^yāvakīva^eb^nti ^a^P2.0366^ea^ yattakaṃ pamāṇaṃ kālaṃ. ^b^abbhaññāsi^eb^nti abhivisiṭṭhena ariyamaggañāṇena aññāsiṃ. ^b^ñāṇañca pana me dassana^eb^nti dvīhipi padehi paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. sesamettha uttānamevāti.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^assādapariyesanaṃ acari^eb^nti assādapariyesanatthāya acariṃ. kuto paṭṭhāyāti? sumedhakālato paṭṭhāya. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya. ^b^sudiṭṭho^eb^ti suppaṭividdho. iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. tatiyaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M2.0231^ea^ ^a^V2.0222^ea^ ^b^sāmaññattha^eb^nti catubbidhaṃ ariyaphalaṃ. itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. sāmaññatthena vā cattāro maggā, brahmaññatthena cattāri phalāni. imesu pana catūsupi suttesu khandhalokova kathito.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ pañcamaṃ atthuppattiyā nikkhittaṃ. katarāya atthuppattiyā? chabbaggiyānaṃ anācāre. te kira gāyantā naccantā hasantā vicariṃsu. bhikkhū dasabalassa ārocayiṃsu. satthā te pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ ovādatthāya idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^ruṇṇa^eb^nti roditaṃ. ^b^ummattaka^eb^nti ummattakakiriyā. ^b^komāraka^eb^nti kumārakehi kattabbakiccaṃ. ^b^dantavidaṃsakahasita^eb^nti dante dassetvā pāṇiṃ paharantānaṃ mahāsaddena hasitaṃ. ^b^setughāto gīte^eb^ti gīte vo paccayaghāto hotu, sahetukaṃ gītaṃ pajahathāti dīpeti. ^b^nacce^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^ala^eb^nti yuttaṃ. ^b^dhammappamoditānaṃ sata^eb^nti ettha dhammo vuccati kāraṇaṃ, kenacideva kāraṇena pamuditānaṃ santānaṃ. ^b^sitaṃ sitamattāyā^eb^ti tasmiṃ sitakāraṇe sati yaṃ sitaṃ karotha, taṃ vo sitamattāya aggadante dassetvā pahaṭṭhākāramattadassanāyayeva ^a^P2.0367^ea^ yuttanti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^soppassā^eb^ti niddāya. ^b^paṭisevanāya natthi tittī^eb^ti yathā yathā paṭisevati, tathā tathā ruccatiyevāti titti nāma natthi. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. sace hi mahāsamudde udakaṃ surā bhaveyya, surāsoṇḍo ca maccho hutvā nibbatteyya, tassa tattha carantassapi sayantassapi titti nāma na bhaveyya. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^avassutaṃ hotī^eb^ti tintaṃ hoti. ^b^na bhaddakaṃ maraṇaṃ hotī^eb^ti apāye paṭisandhipaccayatāya na laddhakaṃ hoti. ^b^kālakiriyā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. sukkapakkhe sagge paṭisandhipaccayatāya ^a^V2.0223^ea^ bhaddakaṃ hoti ^a^M2.0232^ea^ laddhakaṃ. taṃ pana ekantena sotāpannādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ariyasāvakānaṃyeva vaṭṭati. sesamettha uttānamevāti.
[03] 111^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^byāpanna^eb^nti pakatibhāvaṃ jahitvā ṭhitaṃ. sesaṃ purimasutte vuttanayameva.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^nidānānī^eb^ti kāraṇāni. ^b^kammānaṃ samudayāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ piṇḍakaraṇatthāya. ^b^lobhapakata^eb^nti lobhena pakataṃ. ^b^sāvajja^eb^nti sadosaṃ. ^b^taṃ kammaṃ kammasamudayāya saṃvattatī^eb^ti taṃ kammaṃ aññesampi vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya saṃvattati. ^b^na taṃ kammaṃ kammanirodhāyā^eb^ti taṃ pana kammaṃ vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ nirodhatthāya na saṃvattati. sukkapakkhe ^a^P2.0368^ea^ ^b^kammānaṃ samudayāyā^eb^ti vivaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ samudayatthāya. iminā nayena sabbaṃ atthato veditabbaṃ.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^kammāna^eb^nti vaṭṭagāmikammānameva. ^b^chandarāgaṭṭhāniye^eb^ti chandarāgassa kāraṇabhūte. ^b^ārabbhā^eb^ti āgamma sandhāya paṭicca. ^b^chando^eb^ti taṇhāchando. ^b^yo cetaso sārāgo^eb^ti yo cittassa rāgo rajjanā rajjitattaṃ, etamahaṃ saṃyojanaṃ vadāmi, bandhanaṃ vadāmīti attho. sukkapakkhe ^b^kammāna^eb^nti vivaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ. ^b^tadabhinivattetī^eb^ti taṃ abhinivatteti. yadā vā tena vipāko ñāto hoti vidito, tadā te ceva dhamme tañca vipākaṃ abhinivatteti. iminā ca padena vipassanā kathitā, ^b^tadabhinivattetvā^eb^ti iminā maggo. ^b^cetasā abhinivijjhitvā^eb^ti iminā ca maggova. ^b^paññāya ativijjha passatī^eb^ti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya nibbijjhitvā passati. evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo. imasmiṃ pana sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
[06] sambodhavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0224^ea^ ^a^M2.0233^ea^ paṭhame apāyaṃ gacchissantīti ^b^āpāyikā^eb^. nirayaṃ gacchissantīti ^b^nerayikā. idamappahāyā^eb^ti idaṃ brahmacāripaṭiññatādiṃ pāpadhammattayaṃ avijahitvā. ^b^brahmacāripaṭiñño^eb^ti ^a^P2.0369^ea^ brahmacāripaṭirūpako, tesaṃ vā ākappaṃ avijahanena ``ahampi brahmacārī''ti evaṃpaṭiñño. ^b^anuddhaṃsetī^eb^ti akkosati paribhāsati codeti. ^b^natthi kāmesu doso^eb^ti kilesakāmena vatthukāme sevantassa natthi doso. ^b^pātabyata^eb^nti pivitabbataṃ paribhuñjitabbataṃ nirāsaṅkena cittena pipāsitassa pānīyapivanasadisaṃ paribhuñjitabbataṃ. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
[03] 115^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^kataññū katavedī^eb^ti ``iminā mayhaṃ kata''nti tena katakammaṃ ñatvā viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā paṭikaraṇakapuggalo.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ tatiye sukhena metabboti ^b^suppameyyo^eb^. dukkhena metabboti ^b^duppameyyo^eb^. pametuṃ na sakkotīti ^b^appameyyo. unnaḷo^eb^ti uggatanaḷo, tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitoti attho. ^b^capalo^eb^ti pattamaṇḍanādinā cāpallena samannāgato. ^b^mukharo^eb^ti mukhakharo. ^b^vikiṇṇavāco^eb^ti asaññatavacano. ^b^asamāhito^eb^ti cittekaggatārahito. ^b^vibbhantacitto^eb^ti bhantacitto bhantagāvibhantamigasappaṭibhāgo. ^b^pākatindriyo^eb^ti vivaṭindriyo. sesamettha uttānamevāti.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V2.0225^ea^ ^b^tadassādetī^eb^ti taṃ jhānaṃ assādeti. ^b^taṃ nikāmetī^eb^ti tadeva pattheti. ^b^tena ca vittiṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti tena jhānena tuṭṭhiṃ āpajjati. ^b^tatra ṭhito^eb^ti tasmiṃ jhāne ṭhito. ^b^tadadhimutto^eb^ti tattheva adhimutto. ^b^tabbahulavihārī^eb^ti tena bahulaṃ viharanto. ^b^sahabyataṃ upapajjatī^eb^ti sahabhāvaṃ upapajjati, tasmiṃ devaloke nibbattatīti attho ^a^M2.0234^ea^. ^b^nirayampi gacchatī^eb^tiādi nirayādīhi avippamuttattā aparapariyāyavasena tattha gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. na ^a^P2.0370^ea^ hi tassa upacārajjhānato balavataraṃ akusalaṃ atthi, yena anantaraṃ apāye nibbatteyya. ^b^bhagavato pana sāvako^eb^ti sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmīnaṃ aññataro. ^b^tasmiṃyeva bhave^eb^ti tattheva arūpabhave. ^b^parinibbāyatī^eb^ti appaccayaparinibbānena parinibbāyati. ^b^adhippayāso^eb^ti adhikappayogo. sesamettha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. imasmiṃ pana sutte puthujjanassa upapattijjhānaṃ kathitaṃ, ariyasāvakassa tadeva upapattijjhānañca vipassanāpādakajjhānañca kathitaṃ.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^sīlavipattī^eb^ti sīlassa vipannākāro. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^natthi dinna^eb^nti dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^yiṭṭhaṃ^eb^ vuccati mahāyogo. ^b^huta^eb^nti paheṇakasakkāro adhippeto. tampi ubhayaṃ phalābhāvameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati. ^b^sukatadukkaṭāna^eb^nti sukatadukkatānaṃ, kusalākusalānanti attho. ^b^phalaṃ vipāko^eb^ti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti vā vuccati, taṃ natthīti vadati. ^b^natthi ayaṃ loko^eb^ti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi, ^b^natthi paro loko^eb^ti idha loke ṭhitassāpi paraloko natthi, sabbe tattha tattheva ucchijjantīti dasseti. ^b^natthi mātā natthi pitā^eb^ti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena vadati. ^b^natthi sattā opapātikā^eb^ti cavitvā uppajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadati. ^b^sampadā^eb^ti pāripūriyo. ^b^sīlasampadā^eb^ti sīlassa paripuṇṇāvekallabhāvo. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^atthi dinna^eb^ntiādi vuttapaṭipakkhanayena gahetabbaṃ.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V2.0226^ea^ ^a^P2.0371^ea^ ^b^apaṇṇako maṇī^eb^ti chahi talehi samannāgato pāsako. ^b^sugatiṃ sagga^eb^nti cātumahārājikādīsu aññataraṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ. imasmiṃ sutte sīlañca sammādiṭṭhi cāti ubhayampi missakaṃ kathitaṃ. sattamaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0235^ea^ ^b^soceyyānī^eb^ti sucibhāvā. ^b^kāyasoceyya^eb^nti kāyadvāre sucibhāvo. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. imesu pana paṭipāṭiyā catūsu suttesu agārikapaṭipadā kathitā. sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi vaṭṭati.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti niyakajjhattaṃ. ^b^kāmacchanda^eb^nti kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ. ^b^byāpādā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. gāthāya pana ^b^kāyasuci^eb^nti kāyadvāre suciṃ, kāyena vā suciṃ. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^ninhātapāpaka^eb^nti sabbe pāpe ninhāpetvā dhovitvā ṭhitaṃ. iminā suttenapi gāthāyapi khīṇāsavova kathitoti.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^moneyyānī^eb^ti munibhāvā. ^b^kāyamoneyya^eb^nti kāyadvāre munibhāvo sādhubhāvo paṇḍitabhāvo. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kāyamoneyya^eb^nti idaṃ tividhakāyaduccaritappahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ nāma. apica tividhaṃ kāyasucaritampi kāyamoneyyaṃ, tathā kāyārammaṇaṃ ^a^P2.0372^ea^ ñāṇaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyapariññā kāyamoneyyaṃ, pariññāsahagato maggo kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāye chandarāgassa pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyasaṅkhāranirodho catutthajjhānasamāpatti kāyamoneyyaṃ. ^b^vacīmoneyye^eb^pi eseva nayo.

[03] ayaṃ ^a^V2.0227^ea^ panettha viseso -- yathā idha catutthajjhānasamāpatti, evaṃ tattha vacīsaṅkhāranirodho dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyyanti veditabbā. manomoneyyampi imināva nayena atthaṃ ñatvā cittasaṅkhāranirodho saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti manomoneyyanti veditabbā. ^b^kāyamuni^eb^nti kāyadvāre muniṃ uttamaṃ parisuddhaṃ, kāyena vā muniṃ. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^sabbappahāyina^eb^nti khīṇāsavaṃ. khīṇāsavo hi sabbappahāyī nāmāti.
[06] āpāyikavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0228^ea^ ^a^M2.0236^ea^ paṭhame ^b^kusinārāya^eb^nti evaṃnāmake nagare. ^b^baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe^eb^ti evaṃnāmake vanasaṇḍe. tattha kira bhūtabalikaraṇatthaṃ baliṃ haranti, tasmā baliharaṇanti vuccati. ^b^ākaṅkhamāno^eb^ti icchamāno. ^b^sahatthā^eb^ti sahatthena. ^b^sampavāretī^eb^ti alaṃ alanti vācāya ceva hatthavikārena ca paṭikkhipāpeti. ^b^sādhu vata māya^eb^nti sādhu vata maṃ ayaṃ. ^b^gathito^eb^ti taṇhāgedhena gathito. ^b^mucchito^eb^ti ^a^P2.0373^ea^ taṇhāmucchanāyayeva mucchito. ^b^ajjhopanno^eb^ti taṇhāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā pavatto. ^b^anissaraṇapañño^eb^ti chandarāgaṃ pahāya saṃkaḍḍhitvā paribhuñjanto nissaraṇapañño nāma hoti, ayaṃ na tādiso, sacchandarāgo paribhuñjatīti anissaraṇapañño. sukkapakkho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. nekkhammavitakkādayo panettha missakā kathitāti veditabbā.
[03] 125^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^pajahiṃsū^eb^ti pajahanti. ^b^bahulamakaṃsū^eb^ti punappunaṃ karonti. idhāpi tayo vitakkā missakāva kathitā.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^gotamake cetiye^eb^ti gotamakayakkhassa bhavane. tathāgato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni kadāci cāpāle cetiye, kadāci sārandade, kadāci bahuputte, kadāci gotamaketi evaṃ yebhuyyena devakulesuyeva vihāsi. imasmiṃ pana kāle vesāliṃ upanissāya gotamakassa yakkhassa bhavanaṭṭhāne vihāsi. tena vuttaṃ -- ``gotamake cetiye''ti. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti etaṃ ``abhiññāyāha''ntiādikaṃ suttaṃ avoca.
