[03] idañca ^a^V2.0229^ea^ bhagavatā suttaṃ atthuppattiyaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. katarātthuppattiyanti? mūlapariyāyātthuppattiyaṃ (ma0 ni0 1.1 ādayo). sambahulā kira brāhmaṇapabbajitā attanā ^a^M2.0237^ea^ uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ nissāya jānanamadaṃ uppādetvā dhammassavanaggaṃ na gacchanti -- ``sammāsambuddho kathento amhehi ñātameva kathessati, no aññāta''nti. bhikkhū tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ. satthā te bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā mukhapaṭiññaṃ gahetvā mūlapariyāyaṃ desesi. te bhikkhū desanāya neva āgataṭṭhānaṃ, na gataṭṭhānaṃ addasaṃsu. apassantā ``sammāsambuddho `mayhaṃ kathā niyyātī'ti mukhasampattameva kathetī''ti cintayiṃsu. satthā tesaṃ manaṃ jānitvā imaṃ suttantaṃ ārabhi.

[03] tattha ^b^abhiññāyā^eb^ti ``ime pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa ^a^P2.0374^ea^ dhātuyo, bāvīsatindriyāni, cattāri saccāni, nava hetū, satta phassā, satta vedanā, satta cetanā, satta saññā, satta cittānī''ti jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā, tathā -- ``ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''tiādinā nayena te te dhamme jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhameva katvāti attho. ^b^sanidāna^eb^nti sappaccayameva katvā kathemi, no appaccayaṃ. ^b^sappāṭihāriya^eb^nti paccanīkapaṭiharaṇena sappāṭihāriyameva katvā kathemi, no appāṭihāriyaṃ. ^b^alañca pana vo^eb^ti yuttañca pana tumhākaṃ. ^b^tuṭṭhiyā^eb^ti ``sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho''ti tīṇi ratanāni guṇato anussarantānaṃ tumhākaṃ yuttameva tuṭṭhiṃ kātunti attho. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^akampitthā^eb^ti chahi ākārehi akampittha. evarūpo hi pathavikampo bodhimaṇḍepi ahosi. bodhisatte kira dakkhiṇadisābhāgena bodhimaṇḍaṃ abhiruḷhe dakkhiṇadisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi, uttarabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṃ abhihananto viya. pacchimadisaṃ gate pacchimabhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi, pācīnabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṃ abhihananto viya. uttaradisaṃ gate uttaradisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya, dakkhiṇadisābhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṃ abhihananto viya. pācīnadisaṃ gate pācīnadisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya, pacchimabhāgo uggantvā bhavaggaṃ abhihananto viya. bodhirukkhopi sakiṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya, sakiṃ uggantvā bhavaggaṃ abhihananto viya. tasmimpi divase evaṃ chahi ākārehi cakkavāḷasahassī mahāpathavī akampittha.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V2.0230^ea^ ^a^M2.0238^ea^ ^b^kevalakappa^eb^nti sakalakappaṃ. ^b^anvāhiṇḍanto^eb^ti vicaranto. ^b^nāddasā^eb^ti kiṃ kāraṇā na addasa? ayaṃ kira bharaṇḍu kālāmo sakyānaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ khādanto vicarati. tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampattakāle ekā dhammadesanā samuṭṭhahissatīti ^a^P2.0375^ea^ ñatvā bhagavā evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi, yathā añño āvasatho na paññāyittha. tasmā na addasa. ^b^purāṇasabrahmacārī^eb^ti porāṇako sabrahmacārī. so kira āḷārakālāmakāle tasmiṃyeva assame ahosi, taṃ sandhāyevamāha. ^b^santharaṃ paññāpehī^eb^ti santharitabbaṃ santharāhīti attho. ^b^santharaṃ paññāpetvā^eb^ti kappiyamañcake paccattharaṇaṃ paññāpetvā. ^b^kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpetī^eb^ti ettha pariññā nāma samatikkamo, tasmā kāmānaṃ samatikkamaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ paññāpeti. ^b^na rūpānaṃ pariñña^eb^nti rūpānaṃ samatikkamabhūtaṃ arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ na paññāpeti. ^b^na vedanānaṃ pariñña^eb^nti vedanānaṃ samatikkamaṃ nibbānaṃ na paññāpeti. ^b^niṭṭhā^eb^ti gati nipphatti. ^b^udāhu puthū^eb^ti udāhu nānā.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^abhikkantāya rattiyā^eb^ti ettha abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpābbhanumodanādīsu dissati. tattha ``abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho, uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha''nti evamādīsu khaye dissati. ``ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā''ti evamādīsu (a0 ni0 4.100) sundare.
[21] ``ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ.
[22] abhikkantena vaṇṇena, sabbā obhāsayaṃ disā''ti.. (vi0 va0 857) --

[25] evamādīsu abhirūpe. ``abhikkantaṃ, bho gotamā''ti evamādīsu (pārā0 15) abbhanumodane. idha pana sundare. tena ^b^abhikkantāya rattiyā^eb^ti iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya rattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^abhikkantavaṇṇā^eb^ti idha abhikkantasaddo abhirūpe, vaṇṇasaddo ^a^P2.0376^ea^ pana chavithutikulavaggakāraṇasaṇṭhānapamāṇarūpāyatanādīsu dissati. tattha ``suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā''ti ^a^V2.0231^ea^ ^a^M2.0239^ea^ evamādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.399; su0 ni0 553) chaviyaṃ. ``kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā''ti evamādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.77) thutiyaṃ. ``cattārome, bho gotama, vaṇṇā''ti evamādīsu (dī0 ni0 3.115) kulavagge. ``atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī''ti evamādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 1.234) kāraṇe. ``mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā''ti evamādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 1.138) saṇṭhāne. ``tayo pattassa vaṇṇā''ti evamādīsu (pārā0 602) pamāṇe. ``vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā''ti evamādīsu rūpāyatane. so idha chaviyā daṭṭhabbo. tena ^b^abhikkantavaṇṇā^eb^ti abhirūpacchavi, iṭṭhavaṇṇā manāpavaṇṇāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^kevalakappa^eb^nti ettha ^b^kevala^eb^saddo anavasesayebhuyyābyāmissānatirekadaḷhatthavisaṃyogādianekattho. tathā hissa ``kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariya''nti evamādīsu (pārā0 1) anavasesatā attho. ``kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī''ti evamādīsu (mahāva0 43) yebhuyyatā. ``kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti evamādīsu (vibha0 225) abyāmissatā. ``kevalaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ nūna ayamāyasmā''ti evamādīsu (mahāva0 244) anatirekatā. ``āyasmato, bhante, anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito''ti evamādīsu (a0 ni0 4.243) daḷhatthatā. ``kevalī vusitavā uttamapurisoti vuccatī''ti evamādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 3.57) visaṃyogo. idha ^a^P2.0377^ea^ pana anavasesatā atthoti adhippetā.

[03] ^b^kappa^eb^saddo panāyaṃ abhisaddahanavohārakālapaññattichedanavikappalesasamantabhāvādianekattho. tathā hissa ``okappaniyametaṃ bhoto gotamassa, yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā''ti evamādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.387) abhisaddahanamattho. ``anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu''nti evamādīsu (cūḷava0 250) vohāro. ``yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī''ti evamādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.387) kālo. ``iccāyasmā kappo''ti evamādīsu (su0 ni0 1098; cūḷani0 kappamāṇavapucchā 117, kappamāṇavapucchāniddeso 61) paññatti ^a^M2.0240^ea^. ``alaṅkato kappitakesamassū''ti evamādīsu (jā0 2.22.1368; vi0 va0 1094) chedanaṃ. ``kappati dvaṅgulakappo''ti evamādīsu (cūḷava0 446) vikappo. ``atthi kappo nipajjitu''nti evamādīsu (a0 ni0 8.80) leso. ``kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ ^a^V2.0232^ea^ obhāsetvā''ti evamādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 1.94) samantabhāvo. idha panassa samantabhāvo attho adhippeto. tasmā ^b^kevalakappaṃ jetavana^eb^nti ettha anavasesaṃ samantato jetavananti attho.

[03] ^b^obhāsetvā^eb^ti ābhāya pharitvā. ^b^vālukāyā^eb^ti saṇhāya vālukāya. ^b^na saṇṭhātī^eb^ti na patiṭṭhāti. ^b^oḷārika^eb^nti brahmadevatāya hi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhānakāle attabhāvo oḷāriko māpetuṃ vaṭṭati pathavī vā, tasmā evamāha. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti iminā pubbe uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ dasseti. ^b^nappavattino ahesu^eb^nti sajjhāyamūḷhakā vācā parihīnāyeva ahesuṃ. ^b^appaṭivāno^eb^ti ^a^P2.0378^ea^ anivatto anukkaṇṭhito.

[03] ^b^dassanassā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇena dassanassa. ^b^upaṭṭhānassā^eb^ti catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhānassa. ^b^adhisīla^eb^nti dasavidhaṃ sīlaṃ. tañhi pañcasīlaṃ upādāya adhisīlanti vuccati. ^b^avihaṃ gato^eb^ti avihabrahmaloke nibbattosmīti dasseti.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^goyogapilakkhasmi^eb^nti gāvīnaṃ vikkayaṭṭhāne uṭṭhitapilakkhassa santike. ^b^rittassāda^eb^nti jhānasukhābhāvena rittassādaṃ. ^b^bāhirassāda^eb^nti kāmaguṇasukhavasena bāhirassādaṃ. ^b^kaṭuviya^eb^nti ucchiṭṭhaṃ. ^b^āmagandhenā^eb^ti kodhasaṅkhātena vissagandhena. ^b^avassuta^eb^nti tintaṃ. ^b^makkhikā^eb^ti kilesamakkhikā. ^b^nānupatissantī^eb^ti uṭṭhāya na anubandhissanti. ^b^nānvāssavissantī^eb^ti anubandhitvā na khādissanti. ^b^saṃvegamāpādī^eb^ti sotāpanno jāto.

[03] ^b^kaṭuviyakato^eb^ti ucchiṭṭhakato. ^b^ārakā hotī^eb^ti dūre hoti. ^b^vighātasseva bhāgavā^eb^ti dukkhasseva bhāgī. ^b^caretī^eb^ti carati gacchati. ^b^dummedho^eb^ti duppañño. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ, gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti. sattame vaṭṭameva bhāsitaṃ.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0233^ea^ ^a^M2.0241^ea^ ^b^idaṃ te mānasmi^eb^nti ayaṃ te navavidhena vaḍḍhitamānoti attho. ^b^idaṃ te uddhaccasmi^eb^nti idaṃ tava uddhaccaṃ cittassa uddhatabhāvo. ^b^idaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0379^ea^ ^b^te kukkuccasmi^eb^nti idaṃ tava kukkuccaṃ.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^āvahantī^eb^ti niyyanti. ^b^paṭicchanno āvahatī^eb^ti paṭicchannova hutvā niyyāti. ^b^vivaṭo virocatī^eb^ti ettha ekato ubhato attato sabbatthakatoti catubbidhā vivaṭatā veditabbā. tattha ^b^ekato vivaṭaṃ^eb^ nāma asādhāraṇasikkhāpadaṃ. ^b^ubhato vivaṭaṃ^eb^ nāma sādhāraṇasikkhāpadaṃ. ^b^attato vivaṭaṃ^eb^ nāma paṭiladdhadhammaguṇo. ^b^sabbatthakavivaṭaṃ^eb^ nāma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^abhiṇha^eb^nti abhikkhaṇaṃ nirantaraṃ. ^b^āgāḷhenā^eb^ti gāḷhena kakkhaḷena. ^b^pharusenā^eb^ti pharusavacanena. gāḷhaṃ katvā pharusaṃ katvā vuccamānopīti attho. ^b^amanāpenā^eb^ti manaṃ anallīyantena avaḍḍhantena. ^b^sandhiyatimevā^eb^ti ghaṭiyatiyeva. ^b^saṃsandatimevā^eb^ti nirantarova hoti. ^b^sammodatimevā^eb^ti ekībhāvameva gacchati. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] kusināravaggo tatiyo.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0234^ea^ paṭhame yuddhaṃ upajīvatīti ^b^yodhājīvo. rājāraho^eb^ti rañño anucchaviko. ^b^rājabhoggo^eb^ti rañño upabhogaparibhogo. ^b^aṅganteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti hattho viya pādo viya ca avassaṃ icchitabbattā aṅganti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. ^b^dūre pātī hotī^eb^ti udake usabhamattaṃ ^a^M2.0242^ea^, thale aṭṭhusabhamattaṃ, tato vā uttarinti dūre kaṇḍaṃ pāteti. duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayassa hi yodhājīvo navausabhamattaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pātesi, pacchimabhave bodhisatto yojanappamāṇaṃ. ^b^akkhaṇavedhī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0380^ea^ avirādhitavedhī, akkhaṇaṃ vā vijju vijjantarikāya vijjhituṃ samatthoti attho. ^b^mahato kāyassa padāletā^eb^ti ekatobaddhaṃ phalakasatampi mahiṃsacammasatampi aṅguṭṭhapamāṇabahalaṃ lohapaṭṭampi caturaṅgulabahalaṃ asanapadarampi vidatthibahalaṃ udumbarapadarampi dīghantena vālikasakaṭampi vinivijjhituṃ samatthoti attho. ^b^yaṃkiñci rūpa^eb^ntiādi visuddhimagge vitthāritameva. ^b^netaṃ mamā^eb^tiādi taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^sammappaññāya passatī^eb^ti sammā hetunā kāraṇena sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya passati. ^b^padāletī^eb^ti arahattamaggena padāleti.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^ukkācitavinītā^eb^ti appaṭipucchitvā vinītā dubbinītaparisā. ^b^paṭipucchāvinītā^eb^ti pucchitvā vinītā suvinītaparisā. ^b^yāvatāvinītā^eb^ti pamāṇavasena vinītā, pamāṇaṃ ñatvā vinītaparisāti attho. ``yāvatajjhā''ti pāḷiyā pana yāva ajjhāsayāti attho, ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā vinītaparisāti vuttaṃ hoti. tatiyaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V2.0235^ea^ ^b^dhammaṭṭhitatā^eb^ti sabhāvaṭṭhitatā. ^b^dhammaniyāmatā^eb^ti sabhāvaniyāmatā. ^b^sabbe saṅkhārā^eb^ti catubhūmakasaṅkhārā. ^b^aniccā^eb^ti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā. ^b^dukkhā^eb^ti sampaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā. ^b^anattā^eb^ti avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā. iti imasmiṃ sutte tīṇi lakkhaṇāni missakāni kathitāni.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^tantāvutānaṃ vatthāna^eb^nti paccatte sāmivacanaṃ, tantehi vāyitavatthānīti attho. ^b^kesakambalo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0381^ea^ manussakesehi vāyitakambalo ^a^M2.0243^ea^. ^b^puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇavādāna^eb^nti idampi paccatte sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^paṭikiṭṭho^eb^ti pacchimako lāmako. ^b^moghapuriso^eb^ti tucchapuriso. ^b^paṭibāhatī^eb^ti paṭisedheti. ^b^khippaṃ uḍḍeyyā^eb^ti kuminaṃ oḍḍeyya. chaṭṭhasattamāni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^assakhaḷuṅko^eb^ti assapoto. ^b^idamassa javasmiṃ vadāmī^eb^ti ayamassa ñāṇajavoti vadāmi. ^b^idamassa vaṇṇasmiṃ vadāmī^eb^ti ayamassa guṇavaṇṇoti vadāmi. ^b^idamassa ārohapariṇāhasmi^eb^nti ayamassa uccabhāvo parimaṇḍalabhāvoti vadāmīti.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^assaparasse^eb^ti assesu parasse. ^b^purisaparasse^eb^ti purisesu parasse, purisapuriseti attho. imasmiṃ sutte tīṇi maggaphalāni kathitāni. tattha ayaṃ tīhi maggehi ñāṇajavasampannoti veditabbo.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V2.0236^ea^ ^b^bhadre^eb^ti bhaddake. ^b^assājānīye^eb^ti kāraṇākāraṇaṃ jānanake asse. ^b^purisājānīyesu^eb^pi eseva nayo. imasmiṃ sutte arahattaphalaṃ kathitaṃ. tatrāyaṃ arahattamaggena ñāṇajavasampannoti veditabbo.
[03] 144^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^accantaniṭṭho^eb^ti antaṃ atikkantaniṭṭho, akuppaniṭṭho dhuvaniṭṭhoti attho. sesaṃ sadisameva.
[03] 145^b^.^eb^ dvādasame ^b^iddhipāṭihāriyenā^eb^ti ijjhanakapāṭihāriyena. ^b^ādesanāpāṭihāriyenā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0382^ea^ ādisitvā apadisitvā kathanānukathanakathāpāṭihāriyena.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ terasame ^a^M2.0244^ea^ ^b^sammādiṭṭhiyā^eb^ti phalasamāpattatthāya sammādiṭṭhiyā. ^b^sammāñāṇenā^eb^ti phalañāṇena. ^b^sammāvimuttiyā^eb^ti sesehi phalasamāpattidhammehi. imesu tīsupi suttesu khīṇāsavova kathitoti.
[06] yodhājīvavaggo catuttho.

[03] 147-155^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0237^ea^ paṭhame ^b^yathābhataṃ nikkhitto^eb^ti yathā ānetvā ṭhapito. dutiye ^b^sāvajjenā^eb^ti sadosena. tatiye ^b^visamenā^eb^ti sapakkhalanena. ^b^samenā^eb^ti apakkhalanena. catutthe ^b^asucinā^eb^ti gūthasadisena aparisuddhena amejjhena. ^b^sucinā^eb^ti parisuddhena mejjhena. pañcamādīni uttānāneva.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^sunakkhatta^eb^ntiādīsu yasmiṃ divase tayo sucaritadhammā pūritā honti, so divaso laddhanakkhattayogo nāma, tenassa sadā ^b^sunakkhattaṃ^eb^ nāma hotīti vuccati. sveva divaso katamaṅgalo nāma hoti, tenassa sadā ^b^sumaṅgala^eb^nti vuccati. pabhātampissa sadā ^b^suppabhāta^eb^meva, sayanato uṭṭhānampi ^b^suhuṭṭhita^eb^meva, khaṇopi ^b^sukkhaṇova,^eb^ muhuttopi ^b^sumuhuttova^eb^. ettha ca dasaccharapamāṇo ^a^P2.0383^ea^ kālo khaṇo nāma, tena khaṇena dasakkhaṇo kālo layo nāma, tena layena ca dasalayo kālo khaṇalayo nāma, tena dasaguṇo muhutto nāma, tena dasaguṇo khaṇamuhutto nāmāti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. ^b^suyiṭṭhaṃ brahmacārisū^eb^ti yasmiṃ divase tīṇi sucaritāni pūritāni, tadāssa seṭṭhacārīsu dinnadānaṃ suyiṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti ^a^M2.0245^ea^. ^b^padakkhiṇaṃ kāyakamma^eb^nti taṃ divasaṃ tena kataṃ kāyakammaṃ vaḍḍhikāyakammaṃ nāma hoti. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^padakkhiṇāni katvānā^eb^ti vaḍḍhiyuttāni kāyakammādīni katvā. ^b^labhantatthe padakkhiṇe^eb^ti padakkhiṇe vaḍḍhiattheyeva labhati. sesaṃ uttānamevāti.
[06] maṅgalavaggo pañcamo.
[06] tatiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 157-163^b^.^eb^ ito ^a^V2.0238^ea^ paresu ^b^āgāḷhā paṭipadā^eb^ti gāḷhā kakkhaḷā lobhavasena thiraggahaṇā. ^b^nijjhāmā^eb^ti attakilamathānuyogavasena suṭṭhu jhāmā santattā paritattā. ^b^majjhimā^eb^ti neva kakkhaḷā na jhāmā majjhe bhavā. ^b^acelako^eb^ti niccelo naggo. ^b^muttācāro^eb^ti vissaṭṭhācāro, uccārakammādīsu lokiyakulaputtācārena virahito ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karoti, passāvaṃ karoti, khādati bhuñjati. ^b^hatthāpalekhano^eb^ti hatthe piṇḍamhi niṭṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ ^a^P2.0384^ea^ apalekhati, uccārampi katvā hatthasmiṃyeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalekhati. bhikkhāya gahaṇatthaṃ ``ehi, bhadante''ti vutto na etīti ^b^na ehibhadantiko^eb^. ``tena hi tiṭṭha, bhante''ti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti ^b^na tiṭṭhabhadantiko^eb^. tadubhayampi kira so ``etassa vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī''ti na karoti. ^b^abhihaṭa^eb^nti puretaraṃ gahetvā āhaṭabhikkhaṃ. ^b^uddissakata^eb^nti idaṃ tumhe uddissa katanti evamārocitabhikkhaṃ. ^b^nimantana^eb^nti ``asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā''ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyati na gaṇhāti. ^b^na kumbhimukhā^eb^ti kumbhito uddharitvā dīyamānaṃ bhikkhampi na gaṇhāti. ^b^na kaḷopimukhā^eb^ti kaḷopīti ukkhali vā pacchi vā, tatopi na gaṇhāti. kasmā? ``kumbhikaḷopiyo maṃ nissāya kaṭacchunā pahāraṃ labhantī''ti. ^b^na eḷakamantara^eb^nti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā dīyamānaṃ na gaṇhāti. kasmā? ``ayaṃ maṃ nissāya antarakaraṇaṃ labhatī''ti. ^b^daṇḍamusalesu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^dvinna^eb^nti ^a^M2.0246^ea^ dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhāti. kasmā? kabaḷantarāyo hotīti.

[03] ^b^na gabbhiniyā^eb^tiādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati, pāyantiyā dārakassa khīrantarāyo hoti, purisantaragatāya ratiantarāyo hotīti na gaṇhāti. ^b^na saṅkittīsū^eb^ti saṅkittetvā katabhattesu. dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya tato tato taṇḍulādīni ^a^P2.0385^ea^ samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti, ukkaṭṭhācelako tato na paṭiggaṇhāti. ^b^na yattha sā^eb^ti yattha sunakho ``piṇḍaṃ labhissāmī''ti upaṭṭhito hoti, tattha tassa adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāti. kasmā? etassa piṇḍantarāyo hotīti. ^b^saṇḍasaṇḍacārinī^eb^ti samūhasamūhacārinī ^a^V2.0239^ea^. sace hi acelakaṃ disvā ``imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā''ti manussā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti, tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti, tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti. kasmā? ``maṃ nissāya makkhikānaṃ gocarantarāyo jāto''ti.

[03] ^b^thusodaka^eb^nti sabbasassasambhārehi katasovīrakaṃ. ettha ca surāpānameva sāvajjaṃ, ayaṃ pana sabbesu sāvajjasaññī. ^b^ekāgāriko^eb^ti yo ekasmiṃyeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā nivattati. ^b^ekālopiko^eb^ti ekeneva ālopena yāpeti. ^b^dvāgārikādīsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^ekissāpi dattiyā^eb^ti ekāya dattiyā. datti nāma ekā khuddakapāti hoti, yattha aggabhikkhaṃ pakkhipitvā ṭhapenti. ^b^ekāhika^eb^nti ekadivasantarikaṃ. ^b^addhamāsika^eb^nti addhamāsantarikaṃ. ^b^pariyāyabhattabhojana^eb^nti vārabhattabhojanaṃ, ekāhavārena dvīhavārena sattāhavārena addhamāsavārenāti evaṃ divasavārena ābhatabhattabhojanaṃ. ^b^sākabhakkho^eb^tiādīni vuttatthāneva.

[03] ^b^ubbhaṭṭhako^eb^ti uddhaṃ ṭhitako. ^b^ukkuṭikappadhānamanuyutto^eb^ti ukkuṭikavīriyamanuyutto, gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati. ^b^kaṇṭakāpassayiko^eb^ti ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ ^a^P2.0386^ea^ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karoti. ^b^seyya^eb^nti ^a^M2.0247^ea^ sayantopi tattheva seyyaṃ kappeti. sāyaṃ tatiyamassāti ^b^sāyatatiyakaṃ^eb^. pāto majjhanhike sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ ``pāpaṃ pavāhessāmī''ti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharati.

[03] ^b^kāye kāyānupassī^eb^tiādīni heṭṭhā ekakanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. ^b^ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogañca attakilamathānuyogañcāti dve ante anupagatā, sassatucchedantehi vā vimuttā majjhimā paṭipadāti veditabbā.
[06] acelakavaggo chaṭṭho.

[03] 164-184^b^.^eb^ ^b^samanuñño^eb^ti ^a^V2.0240^ea^ samānajjhāsayo. ^b^rāgassā^eb^ti pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa. ^b^abhiññāyā^eb^ti abhijānanatthaṃ. ^b^suññato samādhī^eb^tiādīhi tīhipi samādhīhi vipassanāva kathitā. vipassanā hi niccābhinivesa-niccanimitta-niccapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvā imāni nāmāni labhati. ^b^pariññāyā^eb^ti parijānanatthaṃ. sesapadesupi eseva nayoti.
